entries: The <$name$> can add {@dice 1d4} to its attack rolls against a creature for each non{@condition incapacitated} <$name$> ally within 5 feet of the target, up to a maximum of {@dice 3d4}.

optionalfeature.name: Thorn Lurker
entries: The <$name$> can attempt to hide even when it is only lightly obscured by foliage. Additionally, the nekker can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.

optionalfeature.name: Cavern Stalker
entries: The <$name$> can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by dim light.

optionalfeature.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The <$name$> can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

optionalfeature.name: Amphibious
entries: The <$name$> can breathe air and water.

optionalfeature.name: Water Breathing
entries: The <$name$> can breathe only underwater.

optionalfeature.name: Earth Glide
entries: The <$name$> can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the <$name$> doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

optionalfeature.name: Tunneler
entries: The <$name$> can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a {10}-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

optionalfeature.name: Darkness Incarnate
entries: The <$name$> can cast {@spell darkness} at will as a bonus action without expending verbal or material components.

optionalfeature.name: Starshine
entries: The <$name$> can choose to generate an aura of bright light in a 20-foot radius around it and dim light in another 20-foot radius beyond that. It can toggle this aura as a bonus action. Also, it can cast the light cantrip. These light sources count as natural sunlight. A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> must make a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s Starshine for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Spider Climb
entries: The <$name$> can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The <$name$> can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

optionalfeature.name: Multi limbed
entries: The <$name$> can draw multiple weapons as a free object interaction action.

optionalfeature.name: Liquid Form
entries: The <$name$> can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as l inch wide without squeezing.

optionalfeature.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The <$name$> can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

optionalfeature.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The <$name$> can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Strength check against it.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Rage (1/day)
entries: The <$name$> can heal {#} hit points as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Colossal Swing
entries: The <$name$> can hit up to 2 Large targets, or 3 Medium or smaller targets within 5 feet of each other with each maul attack. A separate attack roll is made for each target.

optionalfeature.name: Massive Swing
entries: The <$name$> can hit up to 2 Medium targets, or 3 Small or smaller targets within 5 feet of each other with each greataxe attack. A separate attack roll is made for each target.

optionalfeature.name: Hold Breath
entries: The <$name$> can hold its breath for <number> minutes/hour.

optionalfeature.name: Mariner
entries: The <$name$> can hold its breath underwater for twice as long and has proficiency with navigator's tools. The <$name$> is also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

optionalfeature.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The <$name$> can magically command any shark within {120} feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

optionalfeature.name: Detect Heat
entries: The <$name$> can magically sense the presence of heat sources, including warm-blooded creatures, up to 5 miles away. It knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

optionalfeature.name: Detect Life
entries: The <$name$> can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. <$name$> knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

optionalfeature.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The <$name$> can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within {120} feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

optionalfeature.name: Mimicry
entries: The <$name$> can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc #} Wisdom (Insight) check.

optionalfeature.name: Ice Walk
entries: The <$name$> can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

optionalfeature.name: Amorphous
entries: The <$name$> can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Form
entries: The <$name$> can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the <$name$> or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the <$name$> can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Nimbleness
entries: The <$name$> can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

optionalfeature.name: Swarm
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a <$name$>. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The <$name$> can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

optionalfeature.name: Iron Scent
entries: The <$name$> can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The <$name$> can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Indomitable (x/day)
entries: The <$name$> can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

optionalfeature.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The <$name$> can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

optionalfeature.name: Detect Sentience
entries: The <$name$> can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

optionalfeature.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The <$name$> can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

optionalfeature.name: Dimensional Bite
entries: The <$name$> can strike through a rift in space. When using an attack or multiattack action, it may attack any creature it can see within 120 ft. with its bite, independently of the bite's actual reach.

optionalfeature.name: Quick Draw
entries: The <$name$> can switch between wielding its weapons as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Reactive
entries: The <$name$> can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

optionalfeature.name: Nimble
entries: The <$name$> can take the {@action disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Lightfooted
entries: The <$name$> can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Ice Armor (2/day)
entries: The <$name$> can use a bonus action to coat its body in ice, giving it +2 AC for 1 minute, or until it takes 50 points of damage from a single creature on a turn.

optionalfeature.name: Wasteland Stride
entries: The <$name$> can use it to sink into and appear out of any sandy or rocky ground, and the range is only 30 ft. Using this ability replaces the <$name$>'s usual movement.

optionalfeature.name: Stealthy Traveler
entries: The <$name$> can use Stealth while traveling at a normal pace.

optionalfeature.name: Direction Change
entries: The <$name$> can use the Disengage action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Heavy Weapons
entries: The <$name$> can wield Large weapons without incurring disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Steadfast
entries: The <$name$> can't be {@condition frightened} while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The <$name$> can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

optionalfeature.name: Vigilant
entries: The <$name$> can't be surprised.

optionalfeature.name: Blind Senses
entries: The <$name$> can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

optionalfeature.name: Echolocation
entries: The <$name$> can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

optionalfeature.name: Slow and Purposeful
entries: The <$name$> can't use the Dash action.

optionalfeature.name: Ephemeral
entries: The <$name$> can't wear or carry anything.

optionalfeature.name: Water Bound
entries: The <$name$> cannot willingly leave the body of water to which it is bound. If forcibly removed, the <$name$> takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage every minute until it returns.

optionalfeature.name: Invoke Duplicity
entries: The <$name$> creates a perfect illusion of itself that lasts for 1 minute or until it loses its concentration, as if concentrating on a spell. The illusion appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of <$name$>. As a bonus action, <$name$> can move the illusion up to 30 feet to a space within 120 feet of <$name$> that it can see. Additionally, when both <$name$> and its illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against that creature.

optionalfeature.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The <$name$> creates an area of antimagic, as in the {@spell antimagic field} spell, in a x-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the beholder's own eye rays.

optionalfeature.name: Colossus Slayer (1/Turn)
entries: The <$name$> deals an additional 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage with its weapons when it hits a creature below its hit point maximum.

optionalfeature.name: Siege
entries: The <$name$> deals double damage to objects and structures made of wood or lighter materials.

optionalfeature.name: Siege Monster
entries: The <$name$> deals double damage to objects and structures.

optionalfeature.name: Dimensional Travel
entries: The <$name$> does not need to breathe and is immune to the hazards of outer space. It can fly beyond a planet's atmosphere and travel between planets. Travelling between planets using Dimensional Travel requires {@dice 2d10} days of travel time. Riders it carries while travelling through space are also protected from the void of outer space. It can also shift to other planes at will. This functions as the plane shift spell, but doesn't require material components.

optionalfeature.name: Flyby
entries: The <$name$> doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

optionalfeature.name: Survivor
entries: The <$name$> gains 10 temporary hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Mind
entries: The <$name$> gains a +1 bonus to its Intelligence and Wisdom for each <$name$> within 40 ft. of it, up to a maximum of +5.

optionalfeature.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The <$name$> has {#} sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points to gain one of the following benefts:

optionalfeature.name: Interrogator
entries: The <$name$> has a passive insight {score} against a creature speaking a lie in a language it knows.

optionalfeature.name: Burdock Allergy
entries: The <$name$> has a strong allergy to the burdock plant. If it comes within 20 feet of burdock flowers, it is {@condition poisoned} until it leaves the area.

optionalfeature.name: Slippery
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

optionalfeature.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

optionalfeature.name: Flanking
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the <$name$>'s allies with Flanking is within 10 feet of the creature and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}

optionalfeature.name: Grappler
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

optionalfeature.name: Bloodthirst
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are currently below their maximum hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Blend with Shadows
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in dim light or darkness.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Winter Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide while in snowy and icy terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

optionalfeature.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made while underwater.

optionalfeature.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

optionalfeature.name: Desert Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in desert terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Jungle Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in jungle terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Padded Feet
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to move silently.

optionalfeature.name: Cavern Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while underground in caves and caverns.

optionalfeature.name: Traveler in Darkness
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks made to know about shadow roads and shadow magic spells or items.

optionalfeature.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of Treachery
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that has one or more of its allies within 5 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

optionalfeature.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Insane
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the <$name$> to sleep.

optionalfeature.name: Monumental Stupidity
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}.

optionalfeature.name: Brave
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Sturdy
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition stunned}.

optionalfeature.name: Undead Resistance
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against disease.

optionalfeature.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

optionalfeature.name: Ungodly Resistance
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against spells or other magical effects cast or created by a cleric or paladin.

optionalfeature.name: Antimagic Shell
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature making a spell attack against the <$name$> has disadvantage on the attack roll. If the <$name$> succeeds on its saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses it, an additional effect might occur, as determined by rolling a {@dice d8}:

optionalfeature.name: Natural Swimmer
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to swim.

optionalfeature.name: Strength in Numbers
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Strength and Constitution checks and saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Sure Footed
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Smell
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom  ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

optionalfeature.name: Two Heads
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Tracker
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill survival}) checks to track prey.

optionalfeature.name: Three-Headed
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Sight
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on sight.

optionalfeature.name: Antennae
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

optionalfeature.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The <$name$> has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

optionalfeature.name: Talented Alchemist
entries: The <$name$> has proficiency with alchemist's supplies and its proficiency bonus is doubled for ability checks it makes using them.

optionalfeature.name: Vampire Weakness (Vampire)
entries: The <$name$> has the following flaws:,{@i Forbiddance}. The <$name$> can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.,{@i Harmed by Running Water}. The <$name$> takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.,{@i Stake to the Heart}. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the <$name$>'s heart while the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the <$name$> is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.,{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity}. The <$name$> takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

optionalfeature.name: Tail Spike Regrowth (Manticore)
entries: The <$name$> has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the <$name$> finishes a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Chaos Vulnerability
entries: The <$name$> have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells.

optionalfeature.name: Incorporeal Swarm
entries: The <$name$> host can occupy another creature's space and vice versa; it can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. Each creature it moves through takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The <$name$> host takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

optionalfeature.name: Wasteland Walk
entries: The <$name$> ignores difficult terrain caused by sand, gravel, or rocks.

optionalfeature.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The <$name$> ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

optionalfeature.name: Invisibility
entries: The <$name$> is {@condition invisible}  as per a {@spell greater invisibility} spell.

optionalfeature.name: Tomb Bound
entries: The <$name$> is bound to the area it defends. It can't move more than 100 feet from the place it is bound to protect.

optionalfeature.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The <$name$> is considered to be a one size category larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

optionalfeature.name: Innate Nondetection
entries: The <$name$> is extremely difficult to detect. It is affected as if under the permanent effect of a nondetection spell.

optionalfeature.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The <$name$> is given a quarry by its summoner. The <$name$> knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The <$name$> also knows the location of its summoner.

optionalfeature.name: Immunity to Temporal Effects
entries: The <$name$> is immune to all time-related spells and effects.

optionalfeature.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The <$name$> is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts without its consent. If the <$name$> is serving as a familiar, this trait is shared by its companion as long as its companion is wihtin 10 ft.

optionalfeature.name: Inscrutable
entries: The <$name$> is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the <$name$>'s intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Magic Immunity
entries: The <$name$> is immune to damage from spells. It has advantage on saving throws against all other magical effects.

optionalfeature.name: Living Construct
entries: The <$name$> is immune to disease. It does not need to eat or breathe, but can ingest food and drink if it wishes.

optionalfeature.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The <$name$> is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

optionalfeature.name: Bound
entries: The <$name$> is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the <$name$> and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the <$name$> to travel to it, and the <$name$> knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the <$name$> is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the <$name$>.

optionalfeature.name: Massive
entries: The <$name$> is not affected by difficult terrain  and can move into spaces already occupied by Large or smaller creatures. When it does so, creatures in those spaces must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d20}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.  <$name$> can't dash. Attacks that push, trip, or grapple are made with disadvantage against a flab giant.

optionalfeature.name: Forest Walk
entries: The <$name$> is not slowed by difficult terrain in natural forests.

optionalfeature.name: Briarstride
entries: The <$name$> is not slowed by forest terrain, can't be {@condition restrained} or slowed by entangle spells, and never takes damage from thorns, briars, or other hazardous plants in the terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Suppressed Power
entries: The <$name$> is unable to use its {trait/attack} while it is above half of its maximum hit points ({#}).

optionalfeature.name: Like Calls To Like
entries: The <$name$> knows if a creature within 30 feet of it is similarly-aligned or not.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The <$name$> knows if it hears a lie.

optionalfeature.name: Tamed
entries: The <$name$> never willingly attacks any reptilian humanoid, and if forced or magically compelled to do so it suffers disadvantage on attack rolls. Up to three Medium or one Large creatures can ride the <$name$>. This trait disappears if the <$name$> spends a month away from any reptilian humanoid.

optionalfeature.name: Potent Poison
entries: The <$name$> poison affects corporeal undead who are otherwise immune to poison.

optionalfeature.name: Void Traveler
entries: The <$name$> requires no air, warmth, ambient pressure, food, or water, enabling it to travel safely through interstellar space and similar voids.

optionalfeature.name: Brutal Critical
entries: The <$name$> rolls one additional weapon damage die when determining extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

optionalfeature.name: Flutterby
entries: The <$name$> seeker can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Fog Vision
entries: The <$name$> sees normally through light or heavy obscurement caused by fog, mist, clouds, or high wind.

optionalfeature.name: Sense Magic (Chuul)
entries: The <$name$> senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical

optionalfeature.name: Illumination
entries: The <$name$> sheds bright light in a <number>-foot radius and dim light for an additional <number> feet.

optionalfeature.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The <$name$> sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The <$name$> can alter the radius as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Brimstone
entries: The <$name$> takes <number> ({@damage }) necrotic damage when it activates this infusion. The <$name$> can breathe poison as an action. In addition, any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The <$name$> takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

optionalfeature.name: Ooze Cube
entries: The <$name$> takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the <$name$>'s Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.,Creatures inside the <$name$> can be seen but have total cover.,A creature within 5 feet of the <$name$> can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the <$name$>. Doing so requires a successful {@dc 12} Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.,The <$name$> can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

optionalfeature.name: Battle Ready
entries: The <$name$> uses its Intelligence modifer, instead of its Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls when attacking with a weapon (included in the attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Bonded Weapon
entries: The <$name$>'s bonded weapon is its {weapon}. The <$name$> cannot be disarmed if it is wielding its bonded weapon. As a bonus action, the <$name$> can magically teleport its bonded weapon into its hand.

optionalfeature.name: Standing Leap
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is up to {20} feet and its high jump is up to {10} feet, with or without a running start.

optionalfeature.name: Uncontrollable
entries: The <$name$>'s movement is never impeded by difficult terrain, and its speed can't be reduced by spells or magical effects. It can't be {@condition restrained} (per the condition), and it escapes automatically from any nonmagical restraints (such as chains, entanglement, or grappling) by spending 5 feet of movement. Being underwater imposes no penalty on its movement or attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Thick Hide
entries: The <$name$>'s skin is thick and tough, granting it a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This bonus is already factored into the <$name$>'s AC.

optionalfeature.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The <$name$>'s weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit.

optionalfeature.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The <$name$>'s weapon attacks are magical.

optionalfeature.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the <$name$> includes its Charisma bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Grip
entries: The body of a <$name$> generates intense heat. Any creature that starts its turn with one or more <$name$> onto it takes 2 fire damage for each of those <$name$>. Once a <$name$> has latched onto a character, it moves with that character when the character moves, as if the character was moving a {@condition grappled} character (half-speed). A <$name$> releases its grip when killed or when the character wins a Strength contest against it. Up to four lesser fire crabs can latch onto a Small character, and up to eight can latch onto a Medium character.

optionalfeature.name: Absorb Flesh
entries: The body of a creature that dies while {@condition grappled} by a <$name$> is completely absorbed into the <$name$>'s mass. No portion of it remains to be used in raise dead, reincarnate, and comparable spells that require touching the dead person's body.

optionalfeature.name: Armor-Piercing Bite
entries: The bony ridges that a <$name$> has for teeth can chew through metal or wood. When a <$name$> scores a critical hit with its bite attack, the target's armor or shield (GM's choice), if any, loses one point of armor protection; e.g., a damaged shield provides just one point of AC instead of two, or a chain shirt provides AC 12+Dex mod instead of AC 13+Dex mod. This damage is cumulative, but it can be repaired by an armorer for 20% of the armor or shield's new cost per critical hit inflicted on it. Magical properties continue to function while the armor or shield is damaged.

optionalfeature.name: Haunt
entries: The creature that kills <$name$> becomes the target for the following effect {effect}

optionalfeature.name: Flashback
entries: The creature will restore themselves with ½ health {@dice 1d6} rounds after they’ve dropped to 0 hp; doing so removes their highest availible unused spell slot or expendes a limited use ability

optionalfeature.name: Burning Tangle
entries: The ground within 10 feet of the <$name$>d is difficult terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Startling Speed
entries: The movements of a <$name$> are so swift that it is almost {@condition invisible} when in motion. If the quickstep moves at least 30 feet on its turn, attack rolls against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn unless the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}.

optionalfeature.name: Unlovely
entries: The skirmisher has disadvantage on Performance and Persuasion checks in interactions with <$name$>.

optionalfeature.name: Trap
entries: The specified number of normal Gems become Trap Gems associated with this card. When your opponent destroys one of your Trap Gems, its associated ability is triggered. If you match one of your Trap Gems which is caused by an ongoing effect, a new Gem becomes Trapped on your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Ingest
entries: The specified number of normal Gems of your opponent's color become Void Gems. Void Gems may be consumed by a Process ability, or matched on the board. Matching Void Gems only gives mana to cards with Devoid.

optionalfeature.name: Bursting Arrow
entries: The target and all other creatures within 10 feet of it take an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage each.

optionalfeature.name: Bursting Bolt
entries: The target and all other creatures within 15 feet of it take an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage each and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Invisible Hand
entries: The thief gains additional benefits when it casts {@spell mage hand}. For a creature to notice the hand or the tasks the hand is performing, it must succeed on a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

optionalfeature.name: Premonition
entries: The<$name$> has advantage on initiative checks and is never surprised.

optionalfeature.name: Awaken
entries: This creature was a creature with low mental development and was either {@spell Awaken|Awakened} or through other means evolved.

optionalfeature.name: Awaken Plants (1/Month)
entries: This plant can magically awaken one plant it touches. The effect is identical to the awaken spell, but only live plants can be awakened.

optionalfeature.name: Unholy Aura
entries: Unless <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}, it and the undead creatures of its choice within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

optionalfeature.name: Menace
entries: Unless the attacker has an ally within 10ft of <$name$>, their attack rolls are at disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Buried
entries: Until it does something to reveal its presence, a buried <$name$> is treated as if it's {@condition invisible}.

optionalfeature.name: Swarming
entries: Up to {#} <$name$> can share the same space at the same time. The <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls if it is sharing its space with another <$name$> that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Wither, Superior
entries: Upon a successful attack <$name$> additionally deals d4 Ability damage to either Strength, or Constitution (which ever is largest)

optionalfeature.name: Dethrone
entries: When <$name$> attacks a player's character, it crits on a 19 or 20.

optionalfeature.name: Frenzy
entries: When <$name$> attacks, and does not, between its turn and the next does not take any damage. <$name$> gains +2 to hit until end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Flyby Attack
entries: When <$name$> attacks, it does not provoke an opportunity attack from the target when moving out of its reach.

optionalfeature.name: Provoke
entries: When <$name$> attacks, it may bonus action to get all creatures within striking range to spend their reaction to attack it at disadvantage unless they make a Wisdom {@dc 14} saving throw. Any creature that attacks <$name$> may be attacked at advantage until the end of the turn.

optionalfeature.name: Intimidate
entries: When <$name$> attacks, its target (if a different creature type) must save vs cannot disengage,

optionalfeature.name: Absorb the Weave
entries: When <$name$> counters or dispels a spell, it heals damage equal to twice the spell level.

optionalfeature.name: Embalm
entries: When <$name$> dies, if an ally spends mana/spell slots it will return it returns as itself with Max Hit Points, but is now a celestial (immune to radiant).

optionalfeature.name: Cumulative Upkeep
entries: When <$name$> enters combat make a constitution check each round DC 8 + 2 per round. When the creature fails, it falls {@condition prone} and becomes {@incapicitated} until it can successfully save.

optionalfeature.name: Spell-Slayer
entries: When <$name$> hits a spellcaster with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra <number> ({@damage }) damage of the weapon's type.

optionalfeature.name: Abyssal Essence
entries: When <$name$> is damaged, a thick, stringy, black ichor made from the essence of the deep Abyss flows from the wounds in response. Any creature that deals damage to the <$name$> with a melee attack must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and be {@condition restrained} until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Woad War Paint
entries: When <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points or scores a critical hit, it generates 1 shared legendary action for the Garden of Badb (see Garden of Badb sidebar).

optionalfeature.name: Exploit
entries: When <$name$> kills a creature allied with other creatures; all its allies suffer -- losing 2d10 temporary hp (Temp HP only) and their first roll before the end of their next turn is at disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Rampage
entries: When <$name$> reduces a target to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, <$name$> can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a {specific} attack.

optionalfeature.name: Dredge
entries: When <$name$> successfully attacks; it removes the lowest availible level spell slot; sorcerery point; a use of a single use of a limited use class feature (such as Second wind; Divination; Ki) or unused HD.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Blood
entries: When <$name$> takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the takes ({@damage }) acid damage.

optionalfeature.name: Awesome Charge
entries: When <$name$> uses a dash action, creatures that try to use reactions or readied actions against it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or cannot use the action or reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When <$name$>'s body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After {@dice 1d6} days it returns to life, if its body was destroyed the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Rage
entries: When a <$name$> takes fire damage, it has advantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn. If it takes more than 5 fire damage, it has advantage on its attack rolls for 2 rounds.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Aura
entries: When a creature hits the <$name$> with a melee attack, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Blinding Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the <$name$> eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$>, the <$name$> can force it to make a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw if the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails, the creature is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the <$name$> until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the <$name$> in the meantime, it must immediately make the saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Simulacra
entries: When a simulacrum drops to O hit points or is subjected to a successful dispel magic spell (DC 17), it reverts to its constructed components.

optionalfeature.name: Aura Of Life
entries: When an undead creature starts its turn within 30 feet of <$name$>, it must succeed on a {@dc } Wisdom saving throw or be turned until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fortify
entries: When entrenched inside a object with structural points/HP - the item's threshold increases by 1.

optionalfeature.name: Woodfriend
entries: When in a forest, <$name$> leave no tracks and automatically discern true north.

optionalfeature.name: Misty Escape (Vampire)
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the <$name$> transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.,While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its <$name$> form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its <$name$> form. It is then {@condition paralyzed} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

optionalfeature.name: Blood Savant
entries: When subjected to a disease or poison effect that allows a Constitution saving throw to take only half damage, the <$name$> instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

optionalfeature.name: Echo
entries: When Summoning <$name$>, the creature summoning it must maintain concentration until its next turn, when it must us an action - if the summoner is not able to do so the summoned creature disintegrates.

optionalfeature.name: Breakaway
entries: When the <$name$> (shell) reaches 0 hit points it breaks away revealing the <$name$> (true form).

optionalfeature.name: Twisted
entries: When the <$name$> attacks a creature from hiding, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Nature's Fury
entries: When the <$name$> casts a druid spell, it can make one natural attack as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Alter Energy Type (1/Turn)
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell with a spell slot and the spell deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage, it can substitute that damage with one other type from that list.

optionalfeature.name: Alter Saving Throw (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell with a spell slot and the spell requires a saving throw, it can change the saving throw from one ability score to another of its choice.

optionalfeature.name: Death Burst
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a burst of {material}. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw,  taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Death Throes
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc #} Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the <$name$>'s weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Unearthly Recovery
entries: When the <$name$> has fewer than {#} hit points, it can use a bonus action to regain {#} hit points. (Recharges after a Long Rest)

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Shot (x/period)
entries: When the <$name$> hits a creature with a ranged weapon attack, it can apply one of the following effects to the target in addition to the damage of the attack:

optionalfeature.name: Totem of the Wolf (1/turn)
entries: When the <$name$> hits a Large or smaller creature with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to force the target to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. The target falls {@condition prone} on a failed save.

optionalfeature.name: Weapon Mastery
entries: When the <$name$> hits with a melee weapon, it deals one extra die of the weapon's damage, plus an additional {#} damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the <$name$> hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Blood Vision
entries: When the <$name$> ingests the blood of another creature, it is {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn. During that time, the <$name$> experiences a memory of the creature through its own eyes which may or may not be of the incident which caused the creature to bleed. The older the blood, the foggier and more obscure the memory is likely to be. Once the <$name$> has consumed a creature's blood in this way, the same creature's blood will never again produce a memory for that blood mage.

optionalfeature.name: Magma Armor
entries: When the <$name$> is below half of its maximum hp, its body cools and AC increases by +4.

optionalfeature.name: Unbroken Spirit
entries: When the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points or dies, the nearest ally of the <$name$> gains 10 temporary hit points and advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Incorporeal Jaunt
entries: When the <$name$> moves, it becomes temporarily incorporeal. It can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage and is pushed to the closest unoccupied space if it ends its turn inside an object.

optionalfeature.name: Reactive Strike
entries: When the <$name$> takes 10 damage or more from a single hit, it immediately uses its {specific attack/trait}

optionalfeature.name: Circle of Mortality
entries: When the <$name$> would normally roll one or more dice to restore hit points with a spell to a creature at 0 hit points, it instead uses the highest number possible for each die.

optionalfeature.name: Wild Magic Surge
entries: When the creature casts a spell of 1st-level or higher, it rolls twice on the Wild Magic Surge Table (PHB pg. 104) and uses either number.

optionalfeature.name: Afterlife (x)
entries: When this creature is dropped to 0HP, its corpse breaks apart making {#} number of CR 1/2 versions of <$name$>

optionalfeature.name: Fight
entries: When two creatures Fight, each creature deals damage equal to its power to the other creature.

optionalfeature.name: Runner
entries: When using a dash action, the <$name$> moves three times its speed instead of twice.

optionalfeature.name: Saga
entries: When you play a Saga, the first chapter's effects are triggered. At the start of each of your turns, the next chapter's effects are triggered. A Saga is Destroyed at the end of a turn in which its final chapter was triggered. Reinforcing a Saga triggers the current chapter but does not advance to the next chapter.

optionalfeature.name: Undying
entries: When you would make a death saving throw, you can instead spring back to your feet with a burst of radiant energy. You immediately stand up (if you so choose), and you regain hit points equal to half your hit point maximum. All hostile creatures within 30 feet of you take 10 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage and are blinded until the end of your turn. [recharge 1]

optionalfeature.name: Absorption, <type>
entries: Whenever <$name$> is subjected to {Dmg_Type} damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hitpoints equal to the {Dmg_Type} damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Absorption, Necrotic
entries: Whenever <$name$> is subjected to necrotic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hitpoints equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Clockworker's Charm
entries: Whenever the <$name$> casts a spell that animates, creates, or modifies an object, the spell's duration is increased by 3 minutes, if it has a duration.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Absorption
entries: Whenever the <$name$> is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the <$name$> is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the <$name$> is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Burrowing Roots
entries: Whenever the <$name$> makes a root attack, it can choose a point on the ground within 120 feet of it. The root bursts from the ground, and that point becomes the attack's point of origin. After attacking, the exposed root protrudes from that point, and the <$name$> gains a reaction each turn that it can only use to make an opportunity attack with that root. A root has AC 15, 45 hp, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the <$name$> starts its turn with {60} hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the <$name$> goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the <$name$> attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the <$name$> attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the <$name$> goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the <$name$> starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the <$name$> goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the <$name$> attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the <$name$> attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the <$name$> goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.,The <$name$>'s creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk <$name$>, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The <$name$> must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. If the check succeeds, the <$name$> ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the <$name$> might go berserk again.

optionalfeature.name: Weakly Armored
entries: Whenever the <$name$> takes more than {#} damage in a single turn, a piece of its armor chips off, reducing their AC by 1. This reduction is cumulative, but cannot reduce their AC below 10.

optionalfeature.name: Heroic
entries: Whenever you cast a spell targeting your creature with Heroic, its associated Heroic effect is triggered.

optionalfeature.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While <$name$> is on the same plane of existence as its master/bonded, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of Submission
entries: While <$name$> is wielding the Ruby Rod, a creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 27} Wisdom saving throw, unless <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature must kneel and bow before <$name$> until the start of its next turn. Until this kneeling and bowing ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to <$name$>'s Aura of Submission for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Champion
entries: While <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} or dead, other creatures of its type that are within 30ft of it have advantage against effects that {@condition charmed|charm} or {@condition frightened|frighten}. When it dies, its allies have disadvantage against effects that {@condition charmed|charm} or {@condition frightened|frighten}.

optionalfeature.name: False Appearance
entries: While <$name$> remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from {stated item}.

optionalfeature.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the <$name$> is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impoose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Snowy Stealth
entries: While in a snowy environment, the <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in bright light created by sunlight, the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

optionalfeature.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, <$name$> knows the exact location of any creature in contact with the same web.

optionalfeature.name: Sunlight Aversion
entries: While in natural sunlight (a daylight spell does not suffice), the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws and ability checks.

optionalfeature.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the <$name$> has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The <$name$> dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

optionalfeature.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

optionalfeature.name: Blatant Dismissal
entries: While in the courts or castles of the fey, a <$name$> that scores a successful hit with its longsword can try to force the substitution of the target with a shadow double. The target must succeed at a {@dc 10} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition invisible}, silent, and {@condition paralyzed}, while an illusory version of itself remains visible and audible—and under the monolith footman's control, shouting for a retreat or the like. Outside fey locales, this ability does not function.

optionalfeature.name: Wounded Fury
entries: While it has {#} hit points or fewer, <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra {#} ({@damage }) {Damage type} damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

optionalfeature.name: Horsemanship
entries: While mounted, <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures that are smaller than its mount, and can force an attack targeted at its mount to target itself instead.

optionalfeature.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: While mounted, <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures that are smaller than its mount, and can force an attack targeted at its mount to target itself instead.

optionalfeature.name: Infantry Slayer
entries: While mounted, <$name$> has advantage on melee weapon attacks against creatures that are Medium or smaller and are not mounted.

optionalfeature.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the <$name$> has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Clumsy Moves
entries: While the <$name$> is neither flying nor swimming, attack rolls against it have advantage.

optionalfeature.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the <$name$> is wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, its AC equals 10 + its Dexterity modifier + its Wisdom modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the <$name$> is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of the Threshold
entries: While the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated}, allies within 30 feet of it have advantage on death saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Mucous Cloud (Aboleth)
entries: While underwater, the <$name$> is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the <$name$> or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

optionalfeature.name: Ferocious
entries: While you control a creature with a base power of at least 5, all of your creatures in play with Ferocious have their associated Ferocious effect active.

optionalfeature.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the <$name$> can long jump up to {25} feet.

optionalfeature.name: Detect Invisibility
entries: Within {50} feet of <$name$>, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the it's sight.

optionalfeature.name: Historic
entries: Your cards with the Historic ability have their associated effect triggered by any Legendary card, Artifact, or Saga being played on your side, or being in play on your side.

optionalfeature.name: Rally
entries: Your creatures with Rally have their associated effects triggered whenever you bring a creature with the Ally subtype into play.

optionalfeature.name: Treasure
entries: Your effects which find Treasures bring the specified number of Treasure Tokens into play on your side. Once you have four Treasure tokens, one of your existing Treasure Tokens is reinforced rather than a new one being created. Matching your Treasure Token adds 3 mana to a random card in your hand. Matching your opponent's Treasure Token adds 2 mana to a random card in your hand, and 2 mana to a random card in your opponent's hand.

optionalfeature.name: Leader
entries: Your Leader creature Exiles your Token creatures of the specified subtype and converts each one into a reinforcement of itself. This effect occurs both as the Leader enters play, and as you play any Token creatures of the specified subtype.

optionalfeature.name: No Luck
entries: A creature hit by a cat sith's claws must succeed at a {@dc 11} Wisdom save or be stricken with lucklessness. The affected creature can't benefit from inspiration, luckstone, halfling's luck or any specific attribute or class level bonus.
optionalfeature.effect: A creature hit by a cat sith's claws must succeed at a {@dc 11} Wisdom save or be stricken with lucklessness. The affected creature can't benefit from inspiration, luckstone, halfling's luck or any specific attribute or class level bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Shining Feathers
entries: Hostile creatures that attack the songbird must make a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw. If they fail, the attack misses.
optionalfeature.effect: Hostile creatures that attack the songbird must make a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw. If they fail, the attack misses.

optionalfeature.name: False Curse
entries: Once per day, a cat sith can fool a creature into believing it has been cursed by the cat sith's black magic. The target must be within 60 feet and must be able to see the cat sith to be affected by the false curse (Charisma {@dc 12} negates) - as if {@spell Bestow Curse} has been cast. Because this effect is not a true curse, the target gains a new saving throw to end the effect at the beginning of each day. This is a language-dependent, mind-affecting effect that can be affected by remove curse.
optionalfeature.effect: Once per day, a cat sith can fool a creature into believing it has been cursed by the cat sith's black magic. The target must be within 60 feet and must be able to see the cat sith to be affected by the false curse (Charisma {@dc 12} negates) - as if {@spell Bestow Curse} has been cast. Because this effect is not a true curse, the target gains a new saving throw to end the effect at the beginning of each day. This is a language-dependent, mind-affecting effect that can be affected by remove curse.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Dweller
entries: The dimcat is always considered to be lightly obscured by magical darkness, unless it chooses to allow a creature to see through this effect. Whenever the dimcat enters the space of a hostile creature, the creature's eyes are covered by this magical dimness until the dimcat is no longer within its space.
optionalfeature.effect: The dimcat is always considered to be lightly obscured by magical darkness, unless it chooses to allow a creature to see through this effect. Whenever the dimcat enters the space of a hostile creature, the creature's eyes are covered by this magical dimness until the dimcat is no longer within its space.

optionalfeature.name: You Shall Not Pass!
entries: The dvarapala can make an opportunity attack when a hostile creature moves within its reach as well as when a hostile creature moves out of its reach. It gets one extra reaction that be used only for opportunity attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: The dvarapala can make an opportunity attack when a hostile creature moves within its reach as well as when a hostile creature moves out of its reach. It gets one extra reaction that be used only for opportunity attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Executioner's Dive
entries: The harrowing hawk can move straight downward without expending movement. Whenever the hawk moves more than 100 feet during its turn, its first attack before the start of its next turn inflicts {@dice 2d10} force damage.
optionalfeature.effect: The harrowing hawk can move straight downward without expending movement. Whenever the hawk moves more than 100 feet during its turn, its first attack before the start of its next turn inflicts {@dice 2d10} force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Hunter's Shriek
entries: The hawk can let out a piercing cry as a bonus action, alerting all creatures within 500 feet to its exact location.
optionalfeature.effect: The hawk can let out a piercing cry as a bonus action, alerting all creatures within 500 feet to its exact location.

optionalfeature.name: Seek Knowledge
entries: The record-hunter intuitively knows the layout of any mundane library it enters, and the location of all written works within libraries other than the Archive.
optionalfeature.effect: The record-hunter intuitively knows the layout of any mundane library it enters, and the location of all written works within libraries other than the Archive.

optionalfeature.name: Swarm Construct
entries: The scribeant swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a tiny scarab. The swarm can regain hit points from magic and resting, or from the mending cantrip at a rate of 1 hit point per casting.
optionalfeature.effect: The scribeant swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a tiny scarab. The swarm can regain hit points from magic and resting, or from the mending cantrip at a rate of 1 hit point per casting.

optionalfeature.name: Arachnid's Grace
entries: The shade widow can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check, and it ignores movement restrictions or difficult terrain caused by webbing.
optionalfeature.effect: The shade widow can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check, and it ignores movement restrictions or difficult terrain caused by webbing.

optionalfeature.name: Web Weaver
entries: The shade widow can produce enough natural webbing per minute to cover a 10-foot radius. This webbing adheres to creatures and objects. If a creature falls {@condition prone} in a space covered in webbing, or is shoved into a wall covered in webbing, its movement speed is halved until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: The shade widow can produce enough natural webbing per minute to cover a 10-foot radius. This webbing adheres to creatures and objects. If a creature falls {@condition prone} in a space covered in webbing, or is shoved into a wall covered in webbing, its movement speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Skyward Grasp
entries: The spark seeker can cast either levitate or gust of wind (spell save {@dc 13}) without expending a spell slot. Once it does so, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: The spark seeker can cast either levitate or gust of wind (spell save {@dc 13}) without expending a spell slot. Once it does so, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Fearsome Buzz
entries: The swarm's orderly yet chaotic humming can cause fear in the hearts of lesser creatures. Whenever a creature with a CR of 1/4th or lower is in a space occupied by the swarm, it is {@condition frightened} of the swarm and must attempt to move out of the swarm's space during its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: The swarm's orderly yet chaotic humming can cause fear in the hearts of lesser creatures. Whenever a creature with a CR of 1/4th or lower is in a space occupied by the swarm, it is {@condition frightened} of the swarm and must attempt to move out of the swarm's space during its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Corpse Thief
entries: When the wanderer is touching the corpse of a beast or humanoid with a CR of 2 or less, it can use an action to enter and animate the body like a puppet. While inside, it gains temporary hit points equal to half the maximum hit points of the dead creature. When these temporary hit points are reduced to zero, the corpse is destroyed and the wanderer is ejected. The wanderer can choose to leave as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wanderer is touching the corpse of a beast or humanoid with a CR of 2 or less, it can use an action to enter and animate the body like a puppet. While inside, it gains temporary hit points equal to half the maximum hit points of the dead creature. When these temporary hit points are reduced to zero, the corpse is destroyed and the wanderer is ejected. The wanderer can choose to leave as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Nameless Love
entries: Whenever an ally within 30 feet of the shard would be reduced to 0 hit points, the shard can use a reaction to sacrifice itself, restoring that ally to 1 hit point and destroying the shard.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever an ally within 30 feet of the shard would be reduced to 0 hit points, the shard can use a reaction to sacrifice itself, restoring that ally to 1 hit point and destroying the shard.

optionalfeature.name: Forked Words
entries: Whenever the cobra is touching a friendly creature, both the cobra and the other creature gain advantage on Deception checks.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the cobra is touching a friendly creature, both the cobra and the other creature gain advantage on Deception checks.

optionalfeature.name: Nightmare Feast
entries: Whenever the dimcat is touching a creature that is {@condition unconscious}, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} until the dimcat is no longer touching it, even if the creature wakes.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the dimcat is touching a creature that is {@condition unconscious}, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} until the dimcat is no longer touching it, even if the creature wakes.

optionalfeature.name: Feline Inspiration
entries: (2/Short or Long Rest). As a bonus action, the felyne sounds its horn inspiring a target within 30 feet of it. The target gains an Inspiration die, a {@dice d4}. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes.
optionalfeature.effect: (2/Short or Long Rest). As a bonus action, the felyne sounds its horn inspiring a target within 30 feet of it. The target gains an Inspiration die, a {@dice d4}. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes.

optionalfeature.name: Flying
entries: <$name$> can Fly
optionalfeature.effect: <$name$> can Fly

optionalfeature.name: Wind Form
entries: <$name$> can shift between his humanoid body and a body made of wind and mist as an action; he can never be forced to shift forms. In wind form, it can use a whirlwind blast attack and use his spells, but no weapon attack. Truesight reveals both forms at once.
optionalfeature.effect: <$name$> can shift between his humanoid body and a body made of wind and mist as an action; he can never be forced to shift forms. In wind form, it can use a whirlwind blast attack and use his spells, but no weapon attack. Truesight reveals both forms at once.

optionalfeature.name: Fear
entries: <$name$> can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.
optionalfeature.effect: <$name$> can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.

optionalfeature.name: Chaos Mutations
entries: 50% of rift swine have additional mutant features. Choose or roll {@dice 1d6} on the table below.
optionalfeature.effect: 50% of rift swine have additional mutant features. Choose or roll {@dice 1d6} on the table below.

optionalfeature.name: Feed on Fear
entries: A {@condition frightened} creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the banderhobb takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage, unless the banderhobb is {@condition incapacitated}. Each time a creature takes damage this way, the banderhobb regains 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points and gains advantage on melee attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: A {@condition frightened} creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the banderhobb takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage, unless the banderhobb is {@condition incapacitated}. Each time a creature takes damage this way, the banderhobb regains 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points and gains advantage on melee attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Fog
entries: A 20-foot-radius sphere of acid fog surrounds the dolgotha. The fog spreads around corners. Its area is heavily obscured. When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 23 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Strong wind disperses the fog for {@dice 1d4} turns before it returns.
optionalfeature.effect: A 20-foot-radius sphere of acid fog surrounds the dolgotha. The fog spreads around corners. Its area is heavily obscured. When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 23 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Strong wind disperses the fog for {@dice 1d4} turns before it returns.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Oil
entries: A bagiennik can automatically stabilize a dying creature by using an action to smear some of its oily secretion on the dying creature's flesh. A similar application on an already-stable creature or one with 1 or more hit points acts as a potion of healing, restoring {@dice 2d4 + 2} hit points. Alternatively, the bagiennik's secretion can have the effect of a lesser restoration spell. However, any creature receiving a bagiennik's Healing Oil must make a successful {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be slowed for 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: A bagiennik can automatically stabilize a dying creature by using an action to smear some of its oily secretion on the dying creature's flesh. A similar application on an already-stable creature or one with 1 or more hit points acts as a potion of healing, restoring {@dice 2d4 + 2} hit points. Alternatively, the bagiennik's secretion can have the effect of a lesser restoration spell. However, any creature receiving a bagiennik's Healing Oil must make a successful {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be slowed for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Sylvan Warrior
entries: A banshrae's armor class is 10 + its Charisma modifier + its Dexterity modifier.
optionalfeature.effect: A banshrae's armor class is 10 + its Charisma modifier + its Dexterity modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Savage Hunger
entries: A beggar ghoul that hits with its bite attack against a creature that hasn't acted yet in this combat scores a critical hit.
optionalfeature.effect: A beggar ghoul that hits with its bite attack against a creature that hasn't acted yet in this combat scores a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Rock Thrower
entries: A biclops without spears can throw boulders, tables, or any other large objects instead, with the same attack and damage statistics as its spear attack.
optionalfeature.effect: A biclops without spears can throw boulders, tables, or any other large objects instead, with the same attack and damage statistics as its spear attack.

optionalfeature.name: Bone Bite
entries: A bite attack roll the <$name$> makes is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
optionalfeature.effect: A bite attack roll the <$name$> makes is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

optionalfeature.name: Cold Vulnerability
entries: A blood pudding that takes cold damage has its speed halved, it cant grapple (a {@condition grappled} creature is immediately released), and damage from disgorgement is halved.
optionalfeature.effect: A blood pudding that takes cold damage has its speed halved, it cant grapple (a {@condition grappled} creature is immediately released), and damage from disgorgement is halved.

optionalfeature.name: Host Sense
entries: A bloodsuckle automatically senses the location of any hosts within 100 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: A bloodsuckle automatically senses the location of any hosts within 100 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Create Host
entries: A bloodsuckle that grapples a living target injects its poison sap into the victim. The target creature must make a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become dominated by the bloodsuckle, as if the plant had cast dominate person on the victim. Immunity or resistance to poison applies normally to this sap. Domination is permanent until broken by a successful save or by the death of the bloodsuckle. The host does not get additional saving throws when it takes damage; instead, a host with an Intelligence of 3 or higher is allowed another {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw with tactical advantage to break the bloodsuckle's control when it is commanded to act in a manner inconsistent with its alignment or to turn against its allies.
optionalfeature.effect: A bloodsuckle that grapples a living target injects its poison sap into the victim. The target creature must make a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become dominated by the bloodsuckle, as if the plant had cast dominate person on the victim. Immunity or resistance to poison applies normally to this sap. Domination is permanent until broken by a successful save or by the death of the bloodsuckle. The host does not get additional saving throws when it takes damage; instead, a host with an Intelligence of 3 or higher is allowed another {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw with tactical advantage to break the bloodsuckle's control when it is commanded to act in a manner inconsistent with its alignment or to turn against its allies.

optionalfeature.name: Blue Shield
entries: A blue energy shield surrounds the eye representing its resistances. If the resistances are eliminated, the blue shield disappears.
optionalfeature.effect: A blue energy shield surrounds the eye representing its resistances. If the resistances are eliminated, the blue shield disappears.

optionalfeature.name: Bonestripping
entries: A bone cobbler can strip all the flesh from the corpse of a Medium creature in three minutes using its claws and hammers. For each size category larger or smaller than Medium a corpse is, add or subtract 1 minute. Once stripped, the bone cobbler devours the flesh and collects the victim's bones to use in its sculptures. A creature slain in this manner can be brought back to life only by a wish or resurrection spell.
optionalfeature.effect: A bone cobbler can strip all the flesh from the corpse of a Medium creature in three minutes using its claws and hammers. For each size category larger or smaller than Medium a corpse is, add or subtract 1 minute. Once stripped, the bone cobbler devours the flesh and collects the victim's bones to use in its sculptures. A creature slain in this manner can be brought back to life only by a wish or resurrection spell.

optionalfeature.name: Bone Camouflage
entries: A bone crab has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while it's among bones.
optionalfeature.effect: A bone crab has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while it's among bones.

optionalfeature.name: Strength of Bone
entries: A bone swarm can choose to deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, and adds 1.5 × its Strength bonus on swarm damage rolls as bits and pieces of broken skeletons claw, bite, stab, and slam at the victim.
optionalfeature.effect: A bone swarm can choose to deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, and adds 1.5 × its Strength bonus on swarm damage rolls as bits and pieces of broken skeletons claw, bite, stab, and slam at the victim.

optionalfeature.name: Quick Reaction
entries: A boneclaw has advantage on initiative rolls.
optionalfeature.effect: A boneclaw has advantage on initiative rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Book Bound
entries: A bookkeeper makes all attacks, saving throws, and skill checks with advantage when its creator is within 60 feet of its book. The bookkeeper's hp maximum is reduced by 1 for every minute it is further than 60 feet from its book.
optionalfeature.effect: A bookkeeper makes all attacks, saving throws, and skill checks with advantage when its creator is within 60 feet of its book. The bookkeeper's hp maximum is reduced by 1 for every minute it is further than 60 feet from its book.

optionalfeature.name: Broken Tentacles
entries: A broken tentacle has had the bones protecting it destroyed reducing its AC by 2. (Size. Large, AC 20). Damaging a broken tentacle deals damage to the nakarkos. At the end of the nakarkos turn, a broken tentacle retracts into the ground. It reappears at the start of the nakarkos next turn with the bones of a new creature, roll a {@dice d4} to determine what type of tentacle it becomes. On a 1, Lagiacrus Tentacle; On a 2, Galvenus Tentacle; On a 3, Uragaan Tentacle; On a 4, Brachydios Tentacle.
optionalfeature.effect: A broken tentacle has had the bones protecting it destroyed reducing its AC by 2. (Size. Large, AC 20). Damaging a broken tentacle deals damage to the nakarkos. At the end of the nakarkos turn, a broken tentacle retracts into the ground. It reappears at the start of the nakarkos next turn with the bones of a new creature, roll a {@dice d4} to determine what type of tentacle it becomes. On a 1, Lagiacrus Tentacle; On a 2, Galvenus Tentacle; On a 3, Uragaan Tentacle; On a 4, Brachydios Tentacle.

optionalfeature.name: Shared Rage
