optionalfeature.name: Crypt Hive Aura
entries: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet learn the *Spare the Dying* cantrip, and can cast it as a 1st level spell caster using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.
optionalfeature.effect: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet learn the *Spare the Dying* cantrip, and can cast it as a 1st level spell caster using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

optionalfeature.name: Eyestalk Hive Aura
entries: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet sprout two eyestalks, and gain the *Eye Rays* action.
optionalfeature.effect: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet sprout two eyestalks, and gain the *Eye Rays* action.

optionalfeature.name: Winged Hive Aura
entries: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet sprout wings, and gain a fly speed of 30 feet
optionalfeature.effect: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet sprout wings, and gain a fly speed of 30 feet

optionalfeature.name: Toxin Hive Aura
entries: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet Talon attack now becomes poisonous. It gains
optionalfeature.effect: All other friendly slivers within 60 feet Talon attack now becomes poisonous. It gains

optionalfeature.name: Slime Bane
entries: All other slimes are {@condition frightened} of tar slimes even if they have immunity to the condition.
optionalfeature.effect: All other slimes are {@condition frightened} of tar slimes even if they have immunity to the condition.

optionalfeature.name: Charm Plants
entries: All plant creatures with Intelligence 3 or higher that come within 50 feet of a widow creeper must make a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by it for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: All plant creatures with Intelligence 3 or higher that come within 50 feet of a widow creeper must make a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by it for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Armor of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the armor serym can't have AC less than 16.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the armor serym can't have AC less than 16.

optionalfeature.name: Resistance of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the crystalline serym have the Crystalline Skin feature.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the crystalline serym have the Crystalline Skin feature.

optionalfeature.name: Might of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the might serym have advantage on Strength checks. Additionally, whenever a serym in that area rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack it makes with a melee weapon, it can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the might serym have advantage on Strength checks. Additionally, whenever a serym in that area rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack it makes with a melee weapon, it can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

optionalfeature.name: Queen of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the queen have immunity to {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the queen have immunity to {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Acidity of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the spitting serym can use the Acid Spray action.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the spitting serym can use the Acid Spray action.

optionalfeature.name: Virulence of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the virulent serym have the Poison Claw feature.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the virulent serym have the Poison Claw feature.

optionalfeature.name: Flight of the Hive
entries: All seryms within 120 feet of the winged serym have a fly speed of 60 ft. and the Flyby feature.
optionalfeature.effect: All seryms within 120 feet of the winged serym have a fly speed of 60 ft. and the Flyby feature.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of Desecration
entries: All undead within 20 feet of a cadaver lord gain tactical advantage against attempts to turn undead.
optionalfeature.effect: All undead within 20 feet of a cadaver lord gain tactical advantage against attempts to turn undead.

optionalfeature.name: Bearer of Resolve
entries: Allied creatures that can see the standard bearer have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.
optionalfeature.effect: Allied creatures that can see the standard bearer have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Corona Of Truth
entries: Allies within 10 feet of the eye of the gods have truesight of 20 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: Allies within 10 feet of the eye of the gods have truesight of 20 feet.

optionalfeature.name: The Law of Nature
entries: Allies within 20 feet have advantage on all saving throws.
optionalfeature.effect: Allies within 20 feet have advantage on all saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Idol of Worship
entries: Allies within 30 feet of the eidolon are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}.
optionalfeature.effect: Allies within 30 feet of the eidolon are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}.

optionalfeature.name: Foundation of All the World
entries: Allies within 60 feet of the Source cannot be moved against their will or knocked {@condition prone}.
optionalfeature.effect: Allies within 60 feet of the Source cannot be moved against their will or knocked {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Amplification Aura
entries: Allies' spells cast within 30 feet have their saving throw DC increased by > # <.
optionalfeature.effect: Allies' spells cast within 30 feet have their saving throw DC increased by > # <.

optionalfeature.name: Born of Darkness
entries: Alquam can take the Hide action as a bonus action on each turn while it is in dim light or darkness, even if it is being observed.
optionalfeature.effect: Alquam can take the Hide action as a bonus action on each turn while it is in dim light or darkness, even if it is being observed.

optionalfeature.name: Slowed by Electricity
entries: Although a froghemoth is immune to lightning damage, whenever it would otherwise take such damage, it is instead slowed for 1 round.
optionalfeature.effect: Although a froghemoth is immune to lightning damage, whenever it would otherwise take such damage, it is instead slowed for 1 round.

optionalfeature.name: Flying Leap
entries: Although it can no longer fly, the cruorhulk can still use its wings to increase the distance of its leaps. The cruorhulk's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start
optionalfeature.effect: Although it can no longer fly, the cruorhulk can still use its wings to increase the distance of its leaps. The cruorhulk's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start

optionalfeature.name: Sepulchral Scrying (1/Day)
entries: An {@condition invisible} magical eye is created under the haugbui's control, allowing it to watch its territory without leaving the burial mound. The eye travels at the speed of thought and can be up to 5 miles from the haugbui's location. The haugbui can see and hear as if it were standing at the eye's location, and it can use its innate spellcasting abilities as if it were at the eye's location. The eye can be noticed with a successful {@dc 18} Wisdom (Perception) check and can be dispelled as if it were 3rd-level spell. Spells that block other scrying spells work against Sepulchral Scrying as well. Unless dismissed by its creator or dispelled, lasts for up to 12 hours after its creation; only one can be created per 24-hour period.
optionalfeature.effect: An {@condition invisible} magical eye is created under the haugbui's control, allowing it to watch its territory without leaving the burial mound. The eye travels at the speed of thought and can be up to 5 miles from the haugbui's location. The haugbui can see and hear as if it were standing at the eye's location, and it can use its innate spellcasting abilities as if it were at the eye's location. The eye can be noticed with a successful {@dc 18} Wisdom (Perception) check and can be dispelled as if it were 3rd-level spell. Spells that block other scrying spells work against Sepulchral Scrying as well. Unless dismissed by its creator or dispelled, lasts for up to 12 hours after its creation; only one can be created per 24-hour period.

optionalfeature.name: Mage Armor
entries: An Aaztar-Ghola always has mage armor cast on itself.
optionalfeature.effect: An Aaztar-Ghola always has mage armor cast on itself.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Fatigue
entries: An Aaztar-Ghola gains {@dice 1d3} levels of {@condition exhaustion} when it uses its finger of death spell-like ability. It recovers fully after taking a short rest and consuming a fresh human body part.
optionalfeature.effect: An Aaztar-Ghola gains {@dice 1d3} levels of {@condition exhaustion} when it uses its finger of death spell-like ability. It recovers fully after taking a short rest and consuming a fresh human body part.

optionalfeature.name: Darkness Aura
entries: An adult or older cave dragon can generate an aura of darkness that fills its space and the surrounding 20 feet. This darkness prevents normal vision and darkvision from functioning. Blindsight and truesight function normally. Activating or deactivating the aura is a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: An adult or older cave dragon can generate an aura of darkness that fills its space and the surrounding 20 feet. This darkness prevents normal vision and darkvision from functioning. Blindsight and truesight function normally. Activating or deactivating the aura is a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Flawless Tracking
entries: An aerial servant can track any creature on the same plane of existence as itself across any terrain automatically.
optionalfeature.effect: An aerial servant can track any creature on the same plane of existence as itself across any terrain automatically.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Invisibility
entries: An aerial servant is permanently {@condition invisible}, and it remains {@condition invisible} even when attacking. This ability is inherent and can't be magically cancelled or dispelled. Invisibility is not factored into the aerial servant's +8 Stealth modifier; it gains the benefits of invisibility in addition. An aerial servant is visible on the Astral and Ethereal Planes, but it is always lightly obscured in those locales.
optionalfeature.effect: An aerial servant is permanently {@condition invisible}, and it remains {@condition invisible} even when attacking. This ability is inherent and can't be magically cancelled or dispelled. Invisibility is not factored into the aerial servant's +8 Stealth modifier; it gains the benefits of invisibility in addition. An aerial servant is visible on the Astral and Ethereal Planes, but it is always lightly obscured in those locales.

optionalfeature.name: Animate Trees
entries: An algoid can innately cast the animate objects spell at will, requiring no components. Each casting animates two trees, which are all the algoid can control at a time. A newly animated tree takes one full round to uproot itself. Once free, trees act on the algoid's turn.
optionalfeature.effect: An algoid can innately cast the animate objects spell at will, requiring no components. Each casting animates two trees, which are all the algoid can control at a time. A newly animated tree takes one full round to uproot itself. Once free, trees act on the algoid's turn.

optionalfeature.name: One With Wind
entries: An alkonost is immune to the effects of magical and natural wind, including effects that would force it to move, impose disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks, or force it to land when flying. In addition, its weapon attacks do an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage if it is within 1 mile of a lightning storm.
optionalfeature.effect: An alkonost is immune to the effects of magical and natural wind, including effects that would force it to move, impose disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks, or force it to land when flying. In addition, its weapon attacks do an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage if it is within 1 mile of a lightning storm.

optionalfeature.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied destrachan that starts its turn within 30 feet of the destrachan pack lord and can hear the destrachan pack lord gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided the destrachan pack lord isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: An allied destrachan that starts its turn within 30 feet of the destrachan pack lord and can hear the destrachan pack lord gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided the destrachan pack lord isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied shadow mastiff that starts its turn within 30 feet of the shadow mastiff pack lord and can hear the shadow mastiff pack lord gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided the shadow mastiff pack lord isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: An allied shadow mastiff that starts its turn within 30 feet of the shadow mastiff pack lord and can hear the shadow mastiff pack lord gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided the shadow mastiff pack lord isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Babble
entries: An allip constantly mutters and whines to itself, creating a hypnotic effect. A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the allip and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed}, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} and can't move or speak. At the end of each of its turns, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeded on the saving throw cannot be affected by the same allip's Babble ability for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: An allip constantly mutters and whines to itself, creating a hypnotic effect. A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the allip and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed}, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} and can't move or speak. At the end of each of its turns, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeded on the saving throw cannot be affected by the same allip's Babble ability for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Fluid Channel
entries: An ally slime can use 5 ft. of  movement to move to any space any pudding slime is occupying if they started in a space that any pudding slime is occupying.
optionalfeature.effect: An ally slime can use 5 ft. of  movement to move to any space any pudding slime is occupying if they started in a space that any pudding slime is occupying.

optionalfeature.name: Arcanesense
entries: An arcanoplasm can automatically detect the location of any arcane spellcaster within 100 feet. This ability is not blocked by any material.
optionalfeature.effect: An arcanoplasm can automatically detect the location of any arcane spellcaster within 100 feet. This ability is not blocked by any material.

optionalfeature.name: Rime
entries: An area covered in rime is difficult terrain. Additionally any creature that ends its turn while touching a frost covered area takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and is {@condition grappled} by the frost (Escape {@dc 22}).
optionalfeature.effect: An area covered in rime is difficult terrain. Additionally any creature that ends its turn while touching a frost covered area takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and is {@condition grappled} by the frost (Escape {@dc 22}).

optionalfeature.name: Partner
entries: An associated effect is triggered if you control a Vanguard support.
optionalfeature.effect: An associated effect is triggered if you control a Vanguard support.

optionalfeature.name: Mount
entries: An astral moth can carry a single Medium rider, two Small riders, or up to ten Tiny riders.
optionalfeature.effect: An astral moth can carry a single Medium rider, two Small riders, or up to ten Tiny riders.

optionalfeature.name: Astral Scent
entries: An astral shark is highly attuned to the energy of a traveler in the Astral Plane. It automatically detects all living creatures within 180 ft. of itself.
optionalfeature.effect: An astral shark is highly attuned to the energy of a traveler in the Astral Plane. It automatically detects all living creatures within 180 ft. of itself.

optionalfeature.name: Poisonous Blood
entries: An attacker who hits a spider of Leng with a melee attack from within 5 feet must make a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: An attacker who hits a spider of Leng with a melee attack from within 5 feet must make a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Unending Hunger
entries: An eater of dust can devour any substance with its mawblade, regardless of composition, and never get full. It can even gain nourishment from eating dust or soil (hence the name given to the race by various fiends). If an eater of dust's mawblade is ever stolen, lost, or destroyed, it slowly starves to death.
optionalfeature.effect: An eater of dust can devour any substance with its mawblade, regardless of composition, and never get full. It can even gain nourishment from eating dust or soil (hence the name given to the race by various fiends). If an eater of dust's mawblade is ever stolen, lost, or destroyed, it slowly starves to death.

optionalfeature.name: Glow
entries: An ectoplasm continually gives off light with the approximate brightness of a candle. It can't consciously extinguish this light. When an ectoplasm is killed, its light fades to darkness.
optionalfeature.effect: An ectoplasm continually gives off light with the approximate brightness of a candle. It can't consciously extinguish this light. When an ectoplasm is killed, its light fades to darkness.

optionalfeature.name: Silent
entries: An ectoplasm has tactical advantage on Stealth checks when those detecting it are depending chiefly on sound.
optionalfeature.effect: An ectoplasm has tactical advantage on Stealth checks when those detecting it are depending chiefly on sound.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Jump (3/Day)
entries: An elder shadow drake can travel between shadows as if by means of a dimension door spell. This magical transport must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness, and the distance must be no more than 60 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: An elder shadow drake can travel between shadows as if by means of a dimension door spell. This magical transport must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness, and the distance must be no more than 60 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Annoying
entries: An enemy in the same space as a mote must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check when it moves. On a failed save, the mote moves with it. While in the same space as a mote, enemies have disadvantage on Constitution checks to maintain concentration.
optionalfeature.effect: An enemy in the same space as a mote must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check when it moves. On a failed save, the mote moves with it. While in the same space as a mote, enemies have disadvantage on Constitution checks to maintain concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Spines
entries: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage.
optionalfeature.effect: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Carnage
entries: An evistro's weapon attacks deal +1 additional damage for each other evistro within 30 ft.
optionalfeature.effect: An evistro's weapon attacks deal +1 additional damage for each other evistro within 30 ft.

optionalfeature.name: Ioun Affinity
entries: An ioun wyrd may integrate a number of ioun stones into its body up to 1 + 1/2 its Hit Dice. Because an ioun wyrd sees all ioun stones as equal and gains no benefits from them, the wyrd's ioun stones can be swapped out by any creature the wyrd trusts.
optionalfeature.effect: An ioun wyrd may integrate a number of ioun stones into its body up to 1 + 1/2 its Hit Dice. Because an ioun wyrd sees all ioun stones as equal and gains no benefits from them, the wyrd's ioun stones can be swapped out by any creature the wyrd trusts.

optionalfeature.name: Knowing (3/Day)
entries: An orobas can predict actions and alter chance accordingly. Three times per day, it can choose to have advantage on any attack or skill check.
optionalfeature.effect: An orobas can predict actions and alter chance accordingly. Three times per day, it can choose to have advantage on any attack or skill check.

optionalfeature.name: Sage Advice
entries: An orobas sometimes twists responses to a divination. It softens the answer, leaves crucial information out of the response, manipulates a convoluted answer, or outright lies. An orobas always has advantage on Deception and Persuasion checks when revealing the result of a divination.
optionalfeature.effect: An orobas sometimes twists responses to a divination. It softens the answer, leaves crucial information out of the response, manipulates a convoluted answer, or outright lies. An orobas always has advantage on Deception and Persuasion checks when revealing the result of a divination.

optionalfeature.name: Terrible Agglomeration
entries: An slime that is subject to the Death Tar effect insantly dies, and the Tar slime gains that slimes traits, senses, actions, speeds, and reactions. The Tar slime gains half the hit points of the target as temporary hit points. Its AC cannot be raised above 15 with any traits gained by this trait.
optionalfeature.effect: An slime that is subject to the Death Tar effect insantly dies, and the Tar slime gains that slimes traits, senses, actions, speeds, and reactions. The Tar slime gains half the hit points of the target as temporary hit points. Its AC cannot be raised above 15 with any traits gained by this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Judging Aura
entries: An undead creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the ammut must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ammut's Judging Aura for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: An undead creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the ammut must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ammut's Judging Aura for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Positive Energy Lash
entries: An undead creature that touches the ravid takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage. This damage is already included in the ravid's melee attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: An undead creature that touches the ravid takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage. This damage is already included in the ravid's melee attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Mithral Shards
entries: Ancient mithral dragons can choose to retain the mithral shards of their breath weapon as a hazardous zone of spikes. Treat as a spike growth zone that does {@dice 2d8} magical slashing damage for every 5 feet travelled.
optionalfeature.effect: Ancient mithral dragons can choose to retain the mithral shards of their breath weapon as a hazardous zone of spikes. Treat as a spike growth zone that does {@dice 2d8} magical slashing damage for every 5 feet travelled.

optionalfeature.name: Olive Slime Infestation
entries: Any amount of olive slime that remains in contact with a potential victim for more than two minutes charms the victim and alters his or her thinking patterns so that the host's main concern becomes feeding and protecting the olive slime, including keeping the slime hidden from companions. If anyone tries to remove the olive slime from the host, the host does whatever is required to protect the slime, whether it's running away or fighting back. As long as the host is alive and conscious, it will do everything in its power to protect the slime, including knocking out or even killing its friends. An infested creature suffers the following effects.
optionalfeature.effect: Any amount of olive slime that remains in contact with a potential victim for more than two minutes charms the victim and alters his or her thinking patterns so that the host's main concern becomes feeding and protecting the olive slime, including keeping the slime hidden from companions. If anyone tries to remove the olive slime from the host, the host does whatever is required to protect the slime, whether it's running away or fighting back. As long as the host is alive and conscious, it will do everything in its power to protect the slime, including knocking out or even killing its friends. An infested creature suffers the following effects.

optionalfeature.name: On Your Skin
entries: Any attack that targets and hits the animate image inflicts full damage to the surface or creature that the image is covering, even if the image takes no damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Any attack that targets and hits the animate image inflicts full damage to the surface or creature that the image is covering, even if the image takes no damage.

optionalfeature.name: Peerless Rider
entries: Any attacks directed at the horseman's mount targets the horseman instead. Its mount gains the benefit of the rider's damage and condition immunities, and if the horseman passes a saving throw against an area effect, the mount takes no damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Any attacks directed at the horseman's mount targets the horseman instead. Its mount gains the benefit of the rider's damage and condition immunities, and if the horseman passes a saving throw against an area effect, the mount takes no damage.

optionalfeature.name: Unknowable Secrets
entries: Any attempt to form a mental link with the remnant cultist, scry the cultist, or cast {@spell speak with dead} on a cultist instantly fails, and the creature that initiated the attempt takes {@dice 6d6} psychic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Any attempt to form a mental link with the remnant cultist, scry the cultist, or cast {@spell speak with dead} on a cultist instantly fails, and the creature that initiated the attempt takes {@dice 6d6} psychic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Redemption
entries: Any caster brave enough to cast a knock spell on a chained angel can remove the creature's shackles—but this always exposes the caster to a blast of unholy flame as a reaction. The caster takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage and 16 ({@damage 3d10}) radiant damage, or half as much with a successful {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. If the caster survives that attack, the angel makes an immediate {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw; if it succeeds, the angel's chains fall away and it is restored to its senses and to a Good alignment. If the saving throw fails, any further attempts to cast knock on the angel's chains fail automatically for one week.
optionalfeature.effect: Any caster brave enough to cast a knock spell on a chained angel can remove the creature's shackles—but this always exposes the caster to a blast of unholy flame as a reaction. The caster takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage and 16 ({@damage 3d10}) radiant damage, or half as much with a successful {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. If the caster survives that attack, the angel makes an immediate {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw; if it succeeds, the angel's chains fall away and it is restored to its senses and to a Good alignment. If the saving throw fails, any further attempts to cast knock on the angel's chains fail automatically for one week.

optionalfeature.name: Horrifying Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the bloody bones that starts its turn within 10 feet of the bloody bones must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the bloody bones' Horrifying Aura for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature hostile to the bloody bones that starts its turn within 10 feet of the bloody bones must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the bloody bones' Horrifying Aura for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Soothing Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the droth that starts its turn within 20 feet of the droth must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn. Creatures with Intelligence 3 or lower automatically fail the saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature hostile to the droth that starts its turn within 20 feet of the droth must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn. Creatures with Intelligence 3 or lower automatically fail the saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Bringer of Death
entries: Any creature hostile to the king that starts its turn within 20 feet of the king must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the king is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature has disadvantage on all saving throws. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the king's Bringer of Death for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature hostile to the king that starts its turn within 20 feet of the king must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the king is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature has disadvantage on all saving throws. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the king's Bringer of Death for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Ophidiophobia Aura
entries: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of snakes and yuan-ti. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of snakes and yuan-ti. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Unbearable Stench
entries: Any creature other than a undead that starts its turn within 5 feet of the rotfiend must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned}, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature other than a undead that starts its turn within 5 feet of the rotfiend must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned}, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Fey Protection
entries: Any creature that attempts to damage the godling must first succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter and falls {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that attempts to damage the godling must first succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter and falls {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up.

optionalfeature.name: Nilbogism
entries: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Agony Aura
entries: Any creature that doesn't have all its hit points that starts its turn within 10 feet of the vampire must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that doesn't have all its hit points that starts its turn within 10 feet of the vampire must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Waters of Unfathomable Compulsion
entries: Any creature that drinks the water of an oozasis or eats fruit from the plants growing in it has a dream (as the spell, save {@dc 16}) the next time it sleeps. In this dream, the oozasis places a compulsion to carry out some activity as a torrent of images and sensations. When the creature awakens, it is affected by a geas spell (save {@dc 16}, cast as a 7th-level spell) in addition to the effects of dream.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that drinks the water of an oozasis or eats fruit from the plants growing in it has a dream (as the spell, save {@dc 16}) the next time it sleeps. In this dream, the oozasis places a compulsion to carry out some activity as a torrent of images and sensations. When the creature awakens, it is affected by a geas spell (save {@dc 16}, cast as a 7th-level spell) in addition to the effects of dream.

optionalfeature.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for l minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for l minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Caustic Fumes
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the crawler must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the crawler's fumes for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the crawler must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the crawler's fumes for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Intoxicating Scent
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the paeliryon and can smell the paeliryon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition charmed}. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the paeliryon's Intoxicating Scent for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the paeliryon and can smell the paeliryon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition charmed}. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the paeliryon's Intoxicating Scent for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Insanity Field
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of Uursovk must make a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a success, the creature becomes immune to Insanity Field for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of Uursovk must make a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a success, the creature becomes immune to Insanity Field for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Foul Odor
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the giant sloth must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll or ability check.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the giant sloth must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll or ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Warm Embrace
entries: Any creature that starts their turn within 5 feet of the boom slime takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that starts their turn within 5 feet of the boom slime takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Toxic Flesh
entries: Any creature that tastes the flesh of a shroom must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. If the save succeeds, the creature detects the poison and spits out the morsel before any damage is done. If the save fails, the character is overwhelmed by the deliciousness of the shroom and immediately downs a mouthful, then continues eating in a normal manner until full or until someone stops him or her. An hour after consuming even one bite of shroom flesh, the eater is affected as if by a feeblemind spell. The effect of the toxin can actually turn out to be beneficial in the long run; there is a 5 percent chance that a character who recovers or is restored to sanity after being feebleminded by shroom flesh permanently gains 1 point of Intelligence from the experience. A character can gain this benefit only once.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature that tastes the flesh of a shroom must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. If the save succeeds, the creature detects the poison and spits out the morsel before any damage is done. If the save fails, the character is overwhelmed by the deliciousness of the shroom and immediately downs a mouthful, then continues eating in a normal manner until full or until someone stops him or her. A character can gain this benefit only once.

optionalfeature.name: Faces of Terror
entries: Any creature who targets the wraith with an attack or a harmful spell must first succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the creature's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature who targets the wraith with an attack or a harmful spell must first succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the creature's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Soul Choir
entries: Any creature within 30 feet of the naglfar that isn't immune to be {@condition frightened} hears in its mind the screams of the hundreds of souls trapped in the ship. As a bonus action, the naglfar can force all affected creatures to make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature falls {@condition unconscious}. The effect ends on the creature if it is waked up by the lesser restoration spells or similar magic. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the Soul Choir for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature within 30 feet of the naglfar that isn't immune to be {@condition frightened} hears in its mind the screams of the hundreds of souls trapped in the ship. As a bonus action, the naglfar can force all affected creatures to make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature falls {@condition unconscious}. The effect ends on the creature if it is waked up by the lesser restoration spells or similar magic. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the Soul Choir for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Foul
entries: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Aspect of Juiblex must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Aspect of Juiblex must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Waterborne
entries: Any gerridae can run while on the surface of water, but not while on land or climbing. They treat stormy water as normal rather than difficult terrain. A gerridae takes one point of damage for every hour spent on dry land.
optionalfeature.effect: Any gerridae can run while on the surface of water, but not while on land or climbing. They treat stormy water as normal rather than difficult terrain. A gerridae takes one point of damage for every hour spent on dry land.

optionalfeature.name: Commander
entries: Any goblinoids within 60 feet of the hill goblin driver that can hear it add +1 damage to their attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: Any goblinoids within 60 feet of the hill goblin driver that can hear it add +1 damage to their attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Command
entries: Any hill goblins within 60 feet of the hill goblin warlord who can hear it can use their bonus action to make an attack with disadvantage.
optionalfeature.effect: Any hill goblins within 60 feet of the hill goblin warlord who can hear it can use their bonus action to make an attack with disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Deadly Strike (1/Turn)
entries: Any hit with a melee weapon attack the huskarl scores against a {@condition prone} creature is a critical hit.
optionalfeature.effect: Any hit with a melee weapon attack the huskarl scores against a {@condition prone} creature is a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Create Wraith
entries: Any humanoid that dies at the hands of a dream wraith rises 1 hour later as a wraith under the dream wraith's control.
optionalfeature.effect: Any humanoid that dies at the hands of a dream wraith rises 1 hour later as a wraith under the dream wraith's control.

optionalfeature.name: Alluring Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the spawn and can see the spawn's true form must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the spawn for 1 minute, ending early if the spawn harms them in any way. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the spawn's Alluring Appearance for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the spawn and can see the spawn's true form must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the spawn's Alluring Appearance for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Grippli Shaman
entries: Any large group of gripplis (12 or more) will be accompanied by one or more tribal shamans.
optionalfeature.effect: Any large group of gripplis (12 or more) will be accompanied by one or more tribal shamans.

optionalfeature.name: Ryven Shaman
entries: Any large group of ryvens (seven or more) will be accompanied by one or more tribal shamans.
optionalfeature.effect: Any large group of ryvens (seven or more) will be accompanied by one or more tribal shamans.

optionalfeature.name: Symbiotic Vermin
entries: Any living creature other than another giant beetle that ends its turn adjacent to a giant rhinoceros beetle must make a successful {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Any living creature other than another giant beetle that ends its turn adjacent to a giant rhinoceros beetle must make a successful {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Voracious Aura
entries: Any living creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the zombie or enters the affected area for the first time on a turn must succeed a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by 7 ({@dice 2d6}), and the zombie regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
optionalfeature.effect: Any living creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the zombie or enters the affected area for the first time on a turn must succeed a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by 7 ({@dice 2d6}), and the zombie regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

optionalfeature.name: Necrophage Stench
entries: Any living creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the necrophage ghast must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells cast by any necrophage ghast for 1 minute. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the stench of all necrophage ghasts for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any living creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the necrophage ghast must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells cast by any necrophage ghast for 1 minute. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the stench of all necrophage ghasts for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Cloak of Doom
entries: Any living creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of a valkyrie senses her unsettling presence and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 1d4} rounds. Those who succeed are immune to the effect for 24 hours. The valkyrie can suppress this aura at will.
optionalfeature.effect: Any living creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of a valkyrie senses her unsettling presence and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 1d4} rounds. Those who succeed are immune to the effect for 24 hours. The valkyrie can suppress this aura at will.

optionalfeature.name: Drowning Aura
entries: Any living, breathing creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the drowner must succeed a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature begins to drown and is {@condition restrained}. The target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target drops to 0 hit points. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the drowned dead's Drowning Aura for the next 24 hours. Amphibious creatures are not affected.
optionalfeature.effect: Any living, breathing creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the drowner must succeed a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature begins to drown and is {@condition restrained}. The target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target drops to 0 hit points. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the drowned dead's Drowning Aura for the next 24 hours. Amphibious creatures are not affected.

optionalfeature.name: Enticing Presence
entries: Any non-balhannoth creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the balhannoth must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the balhannoth for l minute. While {@condition charmed} by the balhannoth, a target is {@condition incapacitated}. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the balhannoth, the target can take the Dash action on its turn to move toward the balhannoth by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the balhannoth, a target can repeat the saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: Any non-balhannoth creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the balhannoth must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by the balhannoth for l minute. While {@condition charmed} by the balhannoth, a target is {@condition incapacitated}. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the balhannoth, the target can take the Dash action on its turn to move toward the balhannoth by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the balhannoth, a target can repeat the saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Grievous Presence
entries: Any non-undead creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the garkain must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws and vulnerability to all damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the vampire's Grievous Presence for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any non-undead creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the garkain must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws and vulnerability to all damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the vampire's Grievous Presence for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Foul Presence
entries: Any non-undead creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the vampire must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is failed by 5 or more, it's also {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the vampire's Foul Presence for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Any non-undead creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the vampire must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is failed by 5 or more, it's also {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the vampire's Foul Presence for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Consume Flame
entries: Any normal fire in the flame eater swarm's space at the end of the swarm's turn is extinguished. Magical fire (a flaming weapon or wall of fire spell, for example) is extinguished if the swarm makes a successful {@dc 13} Constitution check. Only the swarm's space is affected; fires larger than the swarm continue burning outside the swarm's space. For 1 minute after the swarm consumes any flame, its bite attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage and any creature that ends its turn in the swarm's space takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Any normal fire in the flame eater swarm's space at the end of the swarm's turn is extinguished. Magical fire (a flaming weapon or wall of fire spell, for example) is extinguished if the swarm makes a successful {@dc 13} Constitution check. Only the swarm's space is affected; fires larger than the swarm continue burning outside the swarm's space. For 1 minute after the swarm consumes any flame, its bite attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage and any creature that ends its turn in the swarm's space takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Flooded
entries: Any space that has been flooded by one of namielle's actions is filled with four to five feet of water, and it is difficult terrain for any creature without a innate or magical swimming speed. The flooded areas remain flooded for 24 hours, until the namielle absorbs the water, or until it is turned to steam.
optionalfeature.effect: Any space that has been flooded by one of namielle's actions is filled with four to five feet of water, and it is difficult terrain for any creature without a innate or magical swimming speed. The flooded areas remain flooded for 24 hours, until the namielle absorbs the water, or until it is turned to steam.

optionalfeature.name: Limited Mutability
entries: Any spell or effect that would alter the golem's form only alters it for 1 round. Afterwards, the manastorm golem returns to its humanoid-shaped cloud form.
optionalfeature.effect: Any spell or effect that would alter the golem's form only alters it for 1 round. Afterwards, the manastorm golem returns to its humanoid-shaped cloud form.

optionalfeature.name: Rider and Steed
entries: Any spell with a range of Self cast by a {@creature Kraghammer Goat-Knight|TalDorei|goatknight rider} who is mounted on a goat-knight steed also targets the goat-knight steed.
optionalfeature.effect: Any spell with a range of Self cast by a {@creature Kraghammer Goat-Knight|TalDorei|goatknight rider} who is mounted on a goat-knight steed also targets the goat-knight steed.

optionalfeature.name: Vengeance
entries: Any time the Arcadian avenger sees an ally fall she rolls her weapons' damage dice twice and chooses the higher result for one minute.
optionalfeature.effect: Any time the Arcadian avenger sees an ally fall she rolls her weapons' damage dice twice and chooses the higher result for one minute.

optionalfeature.name: Deflect Magic
entries: Any time the chilling eyes is targeted by a spell affecting its vision, the chilling eyes is unaffected and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the chilling eyes.
optionalfeature.effect: Any time the chilling eyes is targeted by a spell affecting its vision, the chilling eyes is unaffected and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the chilling eyes.

optionalfeature.name: Blinding Salt Spray
entries: Any time the golem is hit in combat, thousands of tiny salt crystals erupt from its body. All creatures within 5 feet of the golem must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for {@dice 1d3} rounds.
optionalfeature.effect: Any time the golem is hit in combat, thousands of tiny salt crystals erupt from its body. All creatures within 5 feet of the golem must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for {@dice 1d3} rounds.

optionalfeature.name: Reactive Carapace
entries: Any time the sliver is targeted by a melee weapon attack, ranged weapon attack, *magic missile* spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d12}. On a roll of 1 to 3, the sliver is unaffected. Otherwise, the sliver is affected as normal.
optionalfeature.effect: Any time the sliver is targeted by a melee weapon attack, ranged weapon attack, *magic missile* spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d12}. On a roll of 1 to 3, the sliver is unaffected. Otherwise, the sliver is affected as normal.

optionalfeature.name: Reactive Carapace, lesser (Recharge 6)
entries: Any time the sliver is targeted by a melee weapon attack, ranged weapon attack, *magic missile* spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d12}. On a roll of 1 to 3, the sliver is unaffected. Otherwise, the sliver is affected as normal. On a roll of 1, this ability recharges.

On a roll of 1 to 3, the sliver is unaffected. Otherwise, the sliver is affected as normal. On a roll of 1, this ability recharges.

optionalfeature.name: Untrackable
entries: Anyone trying to follow skulks through forest or underground territory has tactical disadvantage on skill checks for trailing or tracking.
optionalfeature.effect: Anyone trying to follow skulks through forest or underground territory has tactical disadvantage on skill checks for trailing or tracking.

optionalfeature.name: Swarm Prince
entries: Arbeyach can communicate with spawns of Arbeyach and all vermin and insects, including swarms and giant varieties, within 120 feet via pheromone transmission. In a hive, this range extends to cover the entire hive. This is a silent and instantaneous mode of communication that only Arbeyach, spawn of Arbeyach, insects, and vermin can understand. All these creatures follow Arbeyach's orders and will never harm the devil.
optionalfeature.effect: Arbeyach can communicate with spawns of Arbeyach and all vermin and insects, including swarms and giant varieties, within 120 feet via pheromone transmission. In a hive, this range extends to cover the entire hive. This is a silent and instantaneous mode of communication that only Arbeyach, spawn of Arbeyach, insects, and vermin can understand. All these creatures follow Arbeyach's orders and will never harm the devil.

optionalfeature.name: Death Bolt (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action after firing an arrow, the deathsworn can imbue the arrow with magical power, causing it to trail green fire. The arrow deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action after firing an arrow, the deathsworn can imbue the arrow with magical power, causing it to trail green fire. The arrow deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Ground-Shaking Movement
entries: As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 60-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difcult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground within the area that is concentrating must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 60-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difcult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground within the area that is concentrating must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken.

optionalfeature.name: Wood Aspect
entries: As a bonus action at the start of her turn, the spriggan can magically shapeshift into a wood aspect. The wood aspect lasts until the spriggan is {@condition incapacitated} or choose to end it. While transformed, the spriggan gains one of the following benefits of her choice:
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action at the start of her turn, the spriggan can magically shapeshift into a wood aspect. The wood aspect lasts until the spriggan is {@condition incapacitated} or choose to end it. While transformed, the spriggan gains one of the following benefits of her choice:

optionalfeature.name: Furnace
entries: As a bonus action at the start of its turn, a furnace golem can try to shove a {@condition grappled} opponent into its interior furnace. The furnace golem makes a Strength check that is opposed by the {@condition grappled} creature's Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. If the {@condition grappled} creature wins the contest, nothing happens. If the furnace golem wins the contest, the {@condition grappled} creature is shoved into the furnace, where it is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}. The trapped creature takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) fire damage and gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} at the start of each of its turns. The creature remains trapped until it uses an action to win an opposed Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check against the furnace golem's Constitution check. Alternatively, a creature outside the furnace golem can attempt a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check against the golem's Constitution check to drag the trapped character free, but the rescuer automatically takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) fire damage whether the attempt succeeds or fails. Only one creature of up to Medium size can be inside the golem's furnace.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action at the start of its turn, a furnace golem can try to shove a {@condition grappled} opponent into its interior furnace. The furnace golem makes a Strength check that is opposed by the {@condition grappled} creature's Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. If the {@condition grappled} creature wins the contest, nothing happens. If the furnace golem wins the contest, the {@condition grappled} creature is shoved into the furnace, where it is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}. The trapped creature takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) fire damage and gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} at the start of each of its turns. The creature remains trapped until it uses an action to win an opposed Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check against the furnace golem's Constitution check. Alternatively, a creature outside the furnace golem can attempt a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check against the golem's Constitution check to drag the trapped character free, but the rescuer automatically takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) fire damage whether the attempt succeeds or fails. Only one creature of up to Medium size can be inside the golem's furnace.

optionalfeature.name: Channel Aspect
entries: As a bonus action at the start of its turn, the leathdhia can magically channel an aspect of the goddess. The aspect lasts until the leathdhia is {@condition incapacitated}, channels another aspect, or chooses to end it. While channeling, the leathdhia gains one of the following benefits of its choice:
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action at the start of its turn, the leathdhia can magically channel an aspect of the goddess. The aspect lasts until the leathdhia is {@condition incapacitated}, channels another aspect, or chooses to end it. While channeling, the leathdhia gains one of the following benefits of its choice:

optionalfeature.name: Telepathic Foresight
entries: As a bonus action at the start of its turn, the ziphius can choose one creature within 120 feet that it can see. The ziphius' eyes glow, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or the ziphius creates a temporary mental bond with the target until the start of the ziphius' next turn. While bonded, the ziphius reads the creature's surface thoughts, choosing to either gain advantage on attacks against that target or cause the target to have disadvantage on attacks against the ziphius.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action at the start of its turn, the ziphius can choose one creature within 120 feet that it can see. The ziphius' eyes glow, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or the ziphius creates a temporary mental bond with the target until the start of the ziphius' next turn. While bonded, the ziphius reads the creature's surface thoughts, choosing to either gain advantage on attacks against that target or cause the target to have disadvantage on attacks against the ziphius.

optionalfeature.name: Night Terror (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action immediately after making a successful melee attack, a malphas storm crow can cast magic missile through his or her sword at the same target.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action immediately after making a successful melee attack, a malphas storm crow can cast magic missile through his or her sword at the same target.

optionalfeature.name: Chilling Howl
entries: As a bonus action on its first turn of combat, the wolf spirit swarm howls, emitting an unnatural and eerie cacophony that chills the blood. All creatures within 300 feet that hear the howl must make a successful {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the swarm's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action on its first turn of combat, the wolf spirit swarm howls, emitting an unnatural and eerie cacophony that chills the blood. All creatures within 300 feet that hear the howl must make a successful {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the swarm's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Compact Body
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the ankashar can fold in its wings and retract its legs. Whilst in the form, it cannot fly or use attack actions, but counts as Medium size and gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. It can end this form as a bonus action on subsequent turns.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action on its turn, the ankashar can fold in its wings and retract its legs. Whilst in the form, it cannot fly or use attack actions, but counts as Medium size and gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. It can end this form as a bonus action on subsequent turns.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Augment (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the crysmal charges its tail with cold, fire, or lightning.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action on its turn, the crysmal charges its tail with cold, fire, or lightning.

optionalfeature.name: Waxing Wind
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the quetzalcouatl can cause a wind to develop centered on a point the quetzalcouatl can see within 60 feet of it. For the next minute or until the quetzalcouatl uses this ability again, a 20-foot radius area centered on that point
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action on its turn, the quetzalcouatl can cause a wind to develop centered on a point the quetzalcouatl can see within 60 feet of it. For the next minute or until the quetzalcouatl uses this ability again, a 20-foot radius area centered on that point

optionalfeature.name: Fire Hazard
entries: As a bonus action or when it takes fire damage, the tar ghoul bursts into flame. The tar ghoul continues burning until it takes cold damage or is immersed in water. A creature that touches the tar ghoul or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it while it is burning takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action or when it takes fire damage, the tar ghoul bursts into flame. The tar ghoul continues burning until it takes cold damage or is immersed in water. A creature that touches the tar ghoul or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it while it is burning takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Fixating Form {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action the golothoma presents itself. Each creature within 20 feet of the golothoma that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw, or develop a permanent unhealthy obsession with shadows and shadowy illumination. While in bright light or darkness the creature becomes sickened by discomfort, becoming {@condition poisoned} until it enters an area of shadowy illumination. This effect can be removed with a dispel evil and good, dispel magic, heal or remove curse spell cast on the subject. Creatures that are immune to the {@condition charmed} condition are immune to this ability.

Each creature within 20 feet of the golothoma that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw, or develop a permanent unhealthy obsession with shadows and shadowy illumination. This effect can be removed with a dispel evil and good, dispel magic, heal or remove curse spell cast on the subject. Creatures that are immune to the {@condition charmed} condition are immune to this ability.

optionalfeature.name: Apothecary
entries: As a bonus action the kobold can select one of the following damage types: acid, cold, or fire. Until it uses this action again, the kobold has resistance to the chosen damage type. Additionally, the kobold is proficient with a poisoner's kit.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action the kobold can select one of the following damage types: acid, cold, or fire. Until it uses this action again, the kobold has resistance to the chosen damage type. Additionally, the kobold is proficient with a poisoner's kit.

optionalfeature.name: Web Swing
entries: As a bonus action the nerscylla can fire a string of webbing as thick as a rope towards an object or terrain that is above it and is within 60 feet of it. It can then use the webbing to pull itself up to 30 feet in the direction of the object or terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action the nerscylla can fire a string of webbing as thick as a rope towards an object or terrain that is above it and is within 60 feet of it. It can then use the webbing to pull itself up to 30 feet in the direction of the object or terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Stunning Shock
entries: As a bonus action the shocker lizard can deliver an electric shock to a creature within 5 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for 1 round. If the target has 13 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points or fewer it falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 hour. A creature awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an an action to shake or slap it awake.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action the shocker lizard can deliver an electric shock to a creature within 5 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for 1 round. If the target has 13 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points or fewer it falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 hour. A creature awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an an action to shake or slap it awake.

optionalfeature.name: One With Shadows
entries: As a bonus action when in an area of dim light or darkness, the pact lich can become {@condition invisible} until it moves or takes an action or reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action when in an area of dim light or darkness, the pact lich can become {@condition invisible} until it moves or takes an action or reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Ill Wind
entries: As a bonus action when in gaseous form, the al-Aeshma can befoul its space with a choking scent. When the al-Aeshma moves through another creature's space in gaseous form, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. Ill Wind lasts until the al-Aeshma leaves gaseous form or chooses to end the ability as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action when in gaseous form, the al-Aeshma can befoul its space with a choking scent. Ill Wind lasts until the al-Aeshma leaves gaseous form or chooses to end the ability as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Cloak Of Shadows
entries: As a bonus action while in dim light or darkness, the ankou becomes {@condition invisible}. The cloak of shadows ends when the ankou chooses to end it as a bonus action, when the ankou dies, or if the ankou ends its turn in bright light.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action while in dim light or darkness, the ankou becomes {@condition invisible}. The cloak of shadows ends when the ankou chooses to end it as a bonus action, when the ankou dies, or if the ankou ends its turn in bright light.

optionalfeature.name: Cloak Of Ghostly Shadows
entries: As a bonus action while in dim light or darkness, the ankou becomes {@condition invisible}. While {@condition invisible}, the ankou has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and gains the following.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Blend
entries: As a bonus action while in dim light or darkness, the wind eater becomes {@condition invisible}.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action while in dim light or darkness, the wind eater becomes {@condition invisible}.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Traveler (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action while in shadows, dim light, or darkness, the shadow fey disappears into the darkness and reappears in an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. A tendril of inky smoke appears at the origin and destination when it uses this trait.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action while in shadows, dim light, or darkness, the shadow fey disappears into the darkness and reappears in an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. A tendril of inky smoke appears at the origin and destination when it uses this trait.
