optionalfeature.name: Between The Lines
entries: As a bonus action while within 30 feet of its book, the bookkeeper can hop inside its book. While inside its book, the bookkeeper has a flying speed of 30 feet and is indistinguishable from ink on a page.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action while within 30 feet of its book, the bookkeeper can hop inside its book. While inside its book, the bookkeeper has a flying speed of 30 feet and is indistinguishable from ink on a page.

optionalfeature.name: Overchannel
entries: As a bonus action, a battle mage can overchannel its spells until the start of its next turn. A creature has disadvantage on its saving throws against an overchanneled spell. Attack rolls against the battle mage have advantage until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a battle mage can overchannel its spells until the start of its next turn. A creature has disadvantage on its saving throws against an overchanneled spell. Attack rolls against the battle mage have advantage until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Drag with Tendril
entries: As a bonus action, a bloody bones can drag each creature {@condition grappled} by its tendrils 10 feet directly toward the bloody bones. When a creature {@condition grappled} by the bloody bones's tendrils is within 5 feet of the bloody bones, it can be clawed automatically (no attack roll is necessary). The bloody bones's tendrils can be attacked separately (AC 13); 6 points of slashing damage severs the tendril. This damage affects only the tendril, however, and doesn't reduce the bloody bones's hit points. The monster generates a new tendril to replace the severed one at the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a bloody bones can drag each creature {@condition grappled} by its tendrils 10 feet directly toward the bloody bones. When a creature {@condition grappled} by the bloody bones's tendrils is within 5 feet of the bloody bones, it can be clawed automatically (no attack roll is necessary). The bloody bones's tendrils can be attacked separately (AC 13); 6 points of slashing damage severs the tendril. This damage affects only the tendril, however, and doesn't reduce the bloody bones's hit points. The monster generates a new tendril to replace the severed one at the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Consumption
entries: As a bonus action, a cauldronborn can consume one potion within 5 feet of it that is not being worn or carried.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a cauldronborn can consume one potion within 5 feet of it that is not being worn or carried.

optionalfeature.name: Cocoon Prey
entries: As a bonus action, a crypt spider can cocoon a creature within 5 feet that is currently {@condition restrained} by webbing. A cocooned creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape the web.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a crypt spider can cocoon a creature within 5 feet that is currently {@condition restrained} by webbing. A cocooned creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape the web.

optionalfeature.name: Charming Gaze
entries: As a bonus action, a foxwere in fox or human form can target one living creature within 30 feet and line of sight with its charming gaze. If the targeted creature can see the foxwere, then the targeted creature must make a successful {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for one hour. A creature that is capable of taking actions can, at the start of its turn, look away to avoid the foxweres gaze for one complete round. If it targets the foxwere while averting its gaze, it suffers all the usual penalties for attacking an unseen target. Creatures that are blind, {@condition unconscious}, or unable to see the foxwere for any other reason are immune to this attack.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a foxwere in fox or human form can target one living creature within 30 feet and line of sight with its charming gaze. If the targeted creature can see the foxwere, then the targeted creature must make a successful {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for one hour. A creature that is capable of taking actions can, at the start of its turn, look away to avoid the foxweres gaze for one complete round. If it targets the foxwere while averting its gaze, it suffers all the usual penalties for attacking an unseen target. Creatures that are blind, {@condition unconscious}, or unable to see the foxwere for any other reason are immune to this attack.

optionalfeature.name: Scourge of Avarice
entries: As a bonus action, a gilded devil wearing jewelry worth at least 1,000 gp can reshape it into a +2 heavy flail. A creature struck by this jeweled flail suffers disadvantage on all Wisdom saving throws until his or her next short rest, in addition to normal weapon damage. The flail reverts to its base components 1 minute after it leaves the devil's grasp, or upon the gilded devil's death.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a gilded devil wearing jewelry worth at least 1,000 gp can reshape it into a +2 heavy flail. A creature struck by this jeweled flail suffers disadvantage on all Wisdom saving throws until his or her next short rest, in addition to normal weapon damage. The flail reverts to its base components 1 minute after it leaves the devil's grasp, or upon the gilded devil's death.

optionalfeature.name: Extinguish Light
entries: As a bonus action, a grue can extinguish one normal (nonmagical) light within 100 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a grue can extinguish one normal (nonmagical) light within 100 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Levitate
entries: As a bonus action, a hierophant lich can rise or descend vertically up to 20 feet and can remain suspended there. This trait works like the levitate spell, except there is no duration, and the lich doesn't need to concentrate to continue levitating each round.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a hierophant lich can rise or descend vertically up to 20 feet and can remain suspended there. This trait works like the levitate spell, except there is no duration, and the lich doesn't need to concentrate to continue levitating each round.

optionalfeature.name: Plaintive Melody (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, a shadhavar can play a captivating melody through its hollow horn. Creatures within 60 feet that can hear the shadhavar must make a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the shadhavar's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way is {@condition incapacitated}, its speed is reduced to 0, and a shadhavar has advantage on attack rolls against it.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a shadhavar can play a captivating melody through its hollow horn. Creatures within 60 feet that can hear the shadhavar must make a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the shadhavar's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way is {@condition incapacitated}, its speed is reduced to 0, and a shadhavar has advantage on attack rolls against it.

optionalfeature.name: Heightened Spell (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, a target of the witch queen's choice within 60 feet of her has disadvantage on its saving throw against her next spell.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a target of the witch queen's choice within 60 feet of her has disadvantage on its saving throw against her next spell.

optionalfeature.name: Entangle {@recharge}
entries: As a bonus action, a widow creeper can cast the spell entangle ({@dc 13} to escape).
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a widow creeper can cast the spell entangle ({@dc 13} to escape).

optionalfeature.name: Mesmerizing Gaze
entries: As a bonus action, a wolfwere in wolf or human form can target one living creature within 30 feet and line of sight with its mesmerizing gaze. If the targeted creature can see the wolfwere, then the targeted creature must make a successful {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for {@dice 1d4} rounds. A creature that is capable of taking actions can, at the start of its turn, look away to avoid the wolfweres gaze for one complete round. If it targets the wolfwere while averting its gaze, it suffers all the usual penalties for attacking an unseen target. Creatures that are blind, {@condition unconscious}, or unable to see the wolfwere for any other reason are immune to this attack.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a wolfwere in wolf or human form can target one living creature within 30 feet and line of sight with its mesmerizing gaze. If it targets the wolfwere while averting its gaze, it suffers all the usual penalties for attacking an unseen target. Creatures that are blind, {@condition unconscious}, or unable to see the wolfwere for any other reason are immune to this attack.

optionalfeature.name: Siphon Time (Recharge 5-6)
entries: As a bonus action, a xiphus chooses one creature it can see. The xiphus' clockwork heart vibrates rapidly, bending time to give the xiphus the upper hand against its chosen target. The xiphus chooses whether to have advantage on its attacks against that target or on saving throws against spells cast by the target until the start of the xiphus' next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, a xiphus chooses one creature it can see. The xiphus chooses whether to have advantage on its attacks against that target or on saving throws against spells cast by the target until the start of the xiphus' next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Dominate Ghouls (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, an Aaztar-Ghola can try to dominate all ghouls within 60 feet. The Aaztar-Ghola makes a {@dc 8} Cha check; if it succeeds, it charms every ghoul in the area. The Aaztar-Ghola establishes a telepathic link to affected creatures, and they do their best to carry out its simple commands. This charm lasts for one hour. Ghouls under this affect have tactical advantage on Wis saving throws against being turned. If any ghouls the Aaztar-Ghola is trying to charm are currently turned by a cleric, the Aaztar-Ghola has tactical disadvantage on its Cha check.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, an Aaztar-Ghola can try to dominate all ghouls within 60 feet. optionalfeature.name: Quick Escape
entries: As a bonus action, Chittr'k'k teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, Chittr'k'k teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

optionalfeature.name: Hellfire Aura
entries: As a bonus action, Mephistopheles can emit an aura of diabolic fire appearing swathed in dark searing flames. A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of Mephistopheles, or touches him or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him and the Hellfire Aura is active takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, Mephistopheles can emit an aura of diabolic fire appearing swathed in dark searing flames. A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of Mephistopheles, or touches him or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him and the Hellfire Aura is active takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Scrappy
entries: As a bonus action, the adolescent ogre can make a melee attack with disadvantage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the adolescent ogre can make a melee attack with disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Churning Advance (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the alabaster tree moves up to five times its speed, leaving a trail of difficult terrain behind it.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the alabaster tree moves up to five times its speed, leaving a trail of difficult terrain behind it.

optionalfeature.name: Alchemical Arrows
entries: As a bonus action, the archer attaches an alchemy tube to the shaft of one arrow before firing its longbow. On a successful hit, the alchemy tube shatters and does one of the following.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the archer attaches an alchemy tube to the shaft of one arrow before firing its longbow. On a successful hit, the alchemy tube shatters and does one of the following.

optionalfeature.name: Hellfire Aura
entries: As a bonus action, the Aspect of Mephistopheles can emit an aura of diabolic fire appearing swathed in dark searing flames. A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Aspect of Mephistopheles, or touches it or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it and the Hellfire Aura is active takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. A creature that takes damage from the Hellfire Aura becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the start of its next turn. The Hellfire Aura remains until the Aspect of Mephistopheles dies or until he dismisses it as an action.

optionalfeature.name: Vow of Enmity (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the aspect targets a creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The aspect always knows in which direction its target can be found, and the aspect has advantage on attack rolls against the creature until the creature dies or the aspect chooses another target.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the aspect targets a creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The aspect always knows in which direction its target can be found, and the aspect has advantage on attack rolls against the creature until the creature dies or the aspect chooses another target.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the Azer Priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

optionalfeature.name: Liquid Courage (Recharge 56)
entries: As a bonus action, the bar brawl imbibes nearby alcohol to gain access to a hidden reservoir of audacity and grit. The bar brawl gains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hp for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Frenzy (1/Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the bearfolk can trigger a berserk frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While in frenzy, it gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks and has advantage on attack rolls.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the bearfolk can trigger a berserk frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While in frenzy, it gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks and has advantage on attack rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Enmity
entries: As a bonus action, the behemoth chooses a creature that dealt damage to it since the start of its last turn, that it can see. That creature is marked. The behemoth has advantage on attack rolls against the marked creature and can't mark another creature for 1 minute, until it drops to 0 hit points, or falls {@condition unconscious}. Additionally attack rolls made against the behemoth by any creature other than the marked creature have advantage while it remains marked.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the behemoth chooses a creature that dealt damage to it since the start of its last turn, that it can see. That creature is marked. The behemoth has advantage on attack rolls against the marked creature and can't mark another creature for 1 minute, until it drops to 0 hit points, or falls {@condition unconscious}. Additionally attack rolls made against the behemoth by any creature other than the marked creature have advantage while it remains marked.

optionalfeature.name: Spectral Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is {@condition unconscious}. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang drops to 0 hit points or when the berbalang dismisses it (no action required).
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is {@condition unconscious}. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang drops to 0 hit points or when the berbalang dismisses it (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Duplication (Psionics)
entries: As a bonus action, the berbalang manifests an exact duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of itself. This duplicate is identical to the berbalang in all aspects except the following: Whenever a berbalang manifests a duplicate it loses 40 hit points, and the duplicate manifests with 40 maximum hit points. All damage the duplicate deals with any of its actions is psychic damage, and the duplicate cannot manifest or absorb other duplicates. The duplicate acts on the berbalang's initiative on the following turns. The berbalang can't manifest a duplicate if this would reduce the berbalang to 0 hit points or less.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the berbalang manifests an exact duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of itself. This duplicate is identical to the berbalang in all aspects except the following: Whenever a berbalang manifests a duplicate it loses 40 hit points, and the duplicate manifests with 40 maximum hit points. All damage the duplicate deals with any of its actions is psychic damage, and the duplicate cannot manifest or absorb other duplicates. The duplicate acts on the berbalang's initiative on the following turns. The berbalang can't manifest a duplicate if this would reduce the berbalang to 0 hit points or less.

optionalfeature.name: Bardic Inspiration (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the bonesinger can inspire one creature other than itself. The creature gains a bardic inspiration die, a {@dice d8}. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll or saving throw it makes. The creature adds this die after the roll is made but before success or failure is determined. A creature can only have one bardic inspiration die at a time.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the bonesinger can inspire one creature other than itself. The creature gains a bardic inspiration die, a {@dice d8}. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll or saving throw it makes. The creature adds this die after the roll is made but before success or failure is determined. A creature can only have one bardic inspiration die at a time.

optionalfeature.name: Charging Form (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the bonespur transforms from its normal, column-like form into a more rhinoceros-like shape, its bone scythe serving as its horn. It gains a speed of 40 feet and a gore attack in place of its bone scythe attack. In this form if the bonespur moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the attack deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. At the end of the move, the bonespur explodes into a whirl of bone shards. Creatures within 10 feet of the bonespur must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The bonespur reassembles in its column form after this.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the bonespur transforms from its normal, column-like form into a more rhinoceros-like shape, its bone scythe serving as its horn. It gains a speed of 40 feet and a gore attack in place of its bone scythe attack. In this form if the bonespur moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the attack deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. At the end of the move, the bonespur explodes into a whirl of bone shards. Creatures within 10 feet of the bonespur must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The bonespur reassembles in its column form after this.

optionalfeature.name: Feverish Hunger
entries: As a bonus action, the botchling can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that is {@condition unconscious}. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw against this magic or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the botchling can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that is {@condition unconscious}. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw against this magic or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

optionalfeature.name: Go for the Throat
entries: As a bonus action, the bugbear targets one beast within 30 feet that can see and hear the bugbear. The beast can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack against a {@condition prone} creature. If the beast hits, the hit is automatically a critical hit.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the bugbear targets one beast within 30 feet that can see and hear the bugbear. The beast can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack against a {@condition prone} creature. If the beast hits, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Ingest Scion
entries: As a bonus action, the butcher can ingest an illet scion within 10 feet of it, destroying the scion. The butcher then regains use of Consume.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the butcher can ingest an illet scion within 10 feet of it, destroying the scion. The butcher then regains use of Consume.

optionalfeature.name: Summon Specters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the cadaver collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; {@dice 2d6} specters (without Sunlight Sensitivity) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the cadaver collector. The specters act right after the cadaver collector on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the cadaver collector is destroyed.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the cadaver collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; {@dice 2d6} specters (without Sunlight Sensitivity) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the cadaver collector. The specters act right after the cadaver collector on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the cadaver collector is destroyed.

optionalfeature.name: Gem Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the carbuncle can cause its garnet to glow or not. While glowing, the garnet sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the carbuncle can cause its garnet to glow or not. While glowing, the garnet sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Scuttle
entries: As a bonus action, the ceanataur can moves up to its half speed in a straight line.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the ceanataur can moves up to its half speed in a straight line.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorate
entries: As a bonus action, the centuar can expend one of its hit dice to cause the spirit summoned with Spirit Summon action to regain 10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) hit points. If the spirit was reduced to 0 hit points within the last minute, this action can revive it.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the centuar can expend one of its hit dice to cause the spirit summoned with Spirit Summon action to regain 10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) hit points. If the spirit was reduced to 0 hit points within the last minute, this action can revive it.

optionalfeature.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the champion regains 20 hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the champion regains 20 hit points.

optionalfeature.name: All-Seeing Eye
entries: As a bonus action, the Chosen may select a creature or object affected by an illusion spell of 4th level or lower. One illusion of the Chosen's choice affecting that creature is instantly dispelled.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the Chosen may select a creature or object affected by an illusion spell of 4th level or lower. One illusion of the Chosen's choice affecting that creature is instantly dispelled.

optionalfeature.name: Rush
entries: As a bonus action, the chupacabra can roll one of its blood dice, addign five times the number rolled to its speed until the end of its turn. For the duration, the chupacabra's movement doesnt provoke opportuniy attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the chupacabra can roll one of its blood dice, addign five times the number rolled to its speed until the end of its turn. For the duration, the chupacabra's movement doesnt provoke opportuniy attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Water Step
entries: As a bonus action, the cipactli can liquefy itself, disappearing from its current location and reappearing in an unoccupied space it can see within 20 feet. Its current location and the new location must be connected by water in some way.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the cipactli can liquefy itself, disappearing from its current location and reappearing in an unoccupied space it can see within 20 feet. Its current location and the new location must be connected by water in some way.

optionalfeature.name: Word of Submission {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the cult exarch channels the voice of Asmodeus through a word of power. Each creature of the cult exarch's choice that is within 60 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Word of Submission must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and must kneel and bow until the end of the cult exarch's next turn. Until this kneeling and bowing ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Word of Submission for the next 24 hours. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the cult exarch channels the voice of Asmodeus through a word of power. Each creature of the cult exarch's choice that is within 60 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Word of Submission must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and must kneel and bow until the end of the cult exarch's next turn. Until this kneeling and bowing ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Word of Submission for the next 24 hours. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

optionalfeature.name: Eye Rays
entries: As a bonus action, the cyclops can begin charging its eye with infernal energy, causing its iris to glow with red light. At the start of its next turn, the light dissipates and the cyclops releases a beam of fire from its eye along a line 5 feet wide and 90 feet long, stopping early if the line intersects with a solid surface. If the beam intersects with a creature, that creature must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage, and the beam stops traveling. On a successful save, the creature takes no damage and the beam continues travelling, potentially intersecting with another target. A creature can choose to intentionally fail the save. If the beam strikes an object or surface, it deals 45 28 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage to whatever it struck.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the cyclops can begin charging its eye with infernal energy, causing its iris to glow with red light. At the start of its next turn, the light dissipates and the cyclops releases a beam of fire from its eye along a line 5 feet wide and 90 feet long, stopping early if the line intersects with a solid surface. If the beam intersects with a creature, that creature must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage, and the beam stops traveling. On a successful save, the creature takes no damage and the beam continues travelling, potentially intersecting with another target. A creature can choose to intentionally fail the save. If the beam strikes an object or surface, it deals 45 28 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage to whatever it struck.

optionalfeature.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the darkling elder targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the darkling elder dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the darkling elder gains the following benefts:
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the darkling elder targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the darkling elder dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the darkling elder gains the following benefts:

entries: As a bonus action, the deathlock targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the deathlock dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the deathlock gains the following benefts:

The curse ends early if the target dies, the deathlock dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the deathlock gains the following benefts:

optionalfeature.name: Spur Ally
entries: As a bonus action, the derro targets an allied creature within 30 feet that can see and hear the derro and must have less hit points than the derro. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and uses its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the derro targets an allied creature within 30 feet that can see and hear the derro and must have less hit points than the derro. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and uses its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll.

optionalfeature.name: Ingest Scion
entries: As a bonus action, the devastator can ingest an illet scion within 15 feet of it, destroying the scion. The devastator then regains 16 ({@dice 3d10}) hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the devastator can ingest an illet scion within 15 feet of it, destroying the scion. The devastator then regains 16 ({@dice 3d10}) hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Tethering Web
entries: As a bonus action, the draegloth can pull a target {@condition restrained} by its web into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the draegloth.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the draegloth can pull a target {@condition restrained} by its web into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the draegloth.

optionalfeature.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the drake can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the drake is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the drake gains the following benefts:
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the drake can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the drake is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the drake gains the following benefts:

optionalfeature.name: Summer Balm (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the dream guardian blesses a creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points and 9 temporary hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the dream guardian blesses a creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points and 9 temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Spirit Shape
entries: As a bonus action, the druid can magically shift to the Ethereal Plane. At the start of its next turn, it returns to the Material Plane in an unoccupied space that it can see within 30 feet of the space it vanished from.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the druid can magically shift to the Ethereal Plane. At the start of its next turn, it returns to the Material Plane in an unoccupied space that it can see within 30 feet of the space it vanished from.

optionalfeature.name: Feinting Attack
entries: As a bonus action, the duelist can choose one creature within 5 feet of it. It has advantage on its next attack roll against the target.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the duelist can choose one creature within 5 feet of it. It has advantage on its next attack roll against the target.

optionalfeature.name: Deathly Doom (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the dullahan magically dooms a creature. The dullahan knows the direction to the doomed creature as long as it is on the same plane.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the dullahan magically dooms a creature. The dullahan knows the direction to the doomed creature as long as it is on the same plane.

optionalfeature.name: Spawn Elementals
entries: As a bonus action, the elemental locus loses 82 hit points and spawns an air, earth, fire, or water elemental to serve it. Spawned elementals answer to their creator's will and are not fully independent. The types of elementals the locus can spawn depend on the terrain it embodies; for example, an elemental locus of the desert can spawn earth, fire, and air elementals, but not water.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the elemental locus loses 82 hit points and spawns an air, earth, fire, or water elemental to serve it. Spawned elementals answer to their creator's will and are not fully independent. The types of elementals the locus can spawn depend on the terrain it embodies; for example, an elemental locus of the desert can spawn earth, fire, and air elementals, but not water.

optionalfeature.name: Magical Resonance (5/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the elfmarked gains advantage on its next weapon attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the elfmarked gains advantage on its next weapon attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the enforcer can regain 12 hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the enforcer can regain 12 hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Aurora (3/day)
entries: As a bonus action, the faith seeker activates an aurora in a 10-foot radius around itself until the end of its next turn. While the aurora is active, the faith seeker has resistance to all damage, and if a hostile creature ends its turn within the radius, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the faith seeker activates an aurora in a 10-foot radius around itself until the end of its next turn. While the aurora is active, the faith seeker has resistance to all damage, and if a hostile creature ends its turn within the radius, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

optionalfeature.name: Traveler
entries: As a bonus action, the far wanderer folds the fabric of reality to teleport itself to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. A brief shimmer of starlight appears at the origin and destination.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the far wanderer folds the fabric of reality to teleport itself to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. A brief shimmer of starlight appears at the origin and destination.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Fury (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the firenewt can magically infuse its attacks with divine fire. For 1 minute, the first creature the firenewt hits on each of its turns with a weapon attack takes 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the firenewt can magically infuse its attacks with divine fire. For 1 minute, the first creature the firenewt hits on each of its turns with a weapon attack takes 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Flameform.
entries: As a bonus action, the firetamer can transform into a {@creature fire elemental}. While in this form, the firetamer cannot cast spells, but can expend a spell slot as a bonus action to regain {@dice 1d8} hit points per level of the spell slot expended. When the firetamer is reduced to 0 hit points, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dies in this form, it reverts to its humanoid form. It can remain in flameform for up to 5 hours, and can enter flameform twice, regaining expended uses after completing a short or long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the firetamer can transform into a {@creature fire elemental}. While in this form, the firetamer cannot cast spells, but can expend a spell slot as a bonus action to regain {@dice 1d8} hit points per level of the spell slot expended. When the firetamer is reduced to 0 hit points, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dies in this form, it reverts to its humanoid form. It can remain in flameform for up to 5 hours, and can enter flameform twice, regaining expended uses after completing a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Flaying
entries: As a bonus action, the flagellant loses 6 ({@dice 1d8 + 2}) hit points, and gains advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls until the end of its turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the flagellant loses 6 ({@dice 1d8 + 2}) hit points, and gains advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls until the end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Trill
entries: As a bonus action, the frost worm can emit a noise that forces creatures to remain motionless. Creatures within a 100 feet of the worm must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of the worm's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the frost worm's trill for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the frost worm can emit a noise that forces creatures to remain motionless. Creatures within a 100 feet of the worm must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of the worm's next turn. optionalfeature.name: Onslaught
entries: As a bonus action, the gearforged can make a Shove attack.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the gearforged can make a Shove attack.

optionalfeature.name: Ghostwalk
entries: As a bonus action, the ghostwalk spider becomes {@condition invisible} and intangible. Attacking doesn't end this invisibility. While {@condition invisible}, the ghostwalk spider has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and gains the following:
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the ghostwalk spider becomes {@condition invisible} and intangible. Attacking doesn't end this invisibility. While {@condition invisible}, the ghostwalk spider has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and gains the following:

optionalfeature.name: Overbearing
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can make a kick attack against a creature that is Medium or smaller.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the giant can make a kick attack against a creature that is Medium or smaller.
