optionalfeature.name: Command Hound
entries: As a bonus action, the giant targets one hound ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the giant, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the giant targets one hound ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the giant, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.

optionalfeature.name: Smite Good (3/day)
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage when it hits a good-aligned target with a weapon attack.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the girallon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage when it hits a good-aligned target with a weapon attack.

optionalfeature.name: Flaming Weapon
entries: As a bonus action, the githyanki can imbue its melee weapon with fire. For 1 minute, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the githyanki can imbue its melee weapon with fire. For 1 minute, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Shocking Weapon
entries: As a bonus action, the githzerai can imbue its melee weapon with lightning. For 1 minute, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the githzerai can imbue its melee weapon with lightning. For 1 minute, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Trace Chance {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the githzerai chooses a target it can see within 30 feet of it. The githzerai gains advantage on the next melee attack roll it makes against the target and if it hits, it is a critical hit.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the githzerai chooses a target it can see within 30 feet of it. The githzerai gains advantage on the next melee attack roll it makes against the target and if it hits, it is a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Knight's Challenge (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the green knight targets one creature that it can see within 30 feet and issues a challenge. If the target can see the green knight, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become magically compelled to engage the green knight in melee combat for 1 minute, or until the knight challenges a new opponent. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the green knight targets one creature that it can see within 30 feet and issues a challenge. If the target can see the green knight, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become magically compelled to engage the green knight in melee combat for 1 minute, or until the knight challenges a new opponent. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Battle Chirr (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the grung makes a chirring noise that rouses its allies. Each grung ally within 30 feet of this grung and able to hear it gains advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the grung makes a chirring noise that rouses its allies. Each grung ally within 30 feet of this grung and able to hear it gains advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fateful Call
entries: As a bonus action, the harbinger beast magically calls a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for one round. While {@condition charmed}, the creature must use its full speed to move toward the harbinger beast as directly as possible. It can only move around obstacles if it can't enter the obstacle's space.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the harbinger beast magically calls a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for one round. While {@condition charmed}, the creature must use its full speed to move toward the harbinger beast as directly as possible. It can only move around obstacles if it can't enter the obstacle's space.

optionalfeature.name: Horrifc Laugh {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the headless horseman emits a terrifying, bloodcurdling laugh. Each creature within 120 feet of the headless horseman that can hear the headless horseman must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened}. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on itself with a successful save. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Horrifc Laugh of the headless horseman for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the headless horseman emits a terrifying, bloodcurdling laugh. Each creature within 120 feet of the headless horseman that can hear the headless horseman must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened}. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on itself with a successful save. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Horrifc Laugh of the headless horseman for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Spell Leech
entries: As a bonus action, the hellfire steward can choose one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. The target loses its lowest-level spell slot, and the hellfire steward gains it.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the hellfire steward can choose one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. The target loses its lowest-level spell slot, and the hellfire steward gains it.

optionalfeature.name: Grant Blood Rage
entries: As a bonus action, the herald of blood can grant a single living creature blood rage, giving it advantage on attacks for 3 rounds. At the end of this time, the target gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} and suffers 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage from blood loss.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the herald of blood can grant a single living creature blood rage, giving it advantage on attacks for 3 rounds. At the end of this time, the target gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} and suffers 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage from blood loss.

optionalfeature.name: Portal Mastery
entries: As a bonus action, the herald of the great wyrm can open any object that contains a mundane or magical means that prevents access. This trait works like the knock spell, except it dispels rather than suppresses arcane lock and it doesn't create an audible knock when used. Alternatively, the herald can use a bonus action to open or close any magical portal, road, gateway, or path.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the herald of the great wyrm can open any object that contains a mundane or magical means that prevents access. This trait works like the knock spell, except it dispels rather than suppresses arcane lock and it doesn't create an audible knock when used. Alternatively, the herald can use a bonus action to open or close any magical portal, road, gateway, or path.

optionalfeature.name: Portal Movement
entries: As a bonus action, the herald of the great wyrm can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see toward or away from a hostile creature.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the herald of the great wyrm can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see toward or away from a hostile creature.

optionalfeature.name: Punish the Marked (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, the hobgoblin can make a melee weapon attack against a creature marked by it if the creature dealt damage to anyone other than the hobgoblin during the last turn. The hobgoblin's melee weapon attack has advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to the target.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the hobgoblin can make a melee weapon attack against a creature marked by it if the creature dealt damage to anyone other than the hobgoblin during the last turn. The hobgoblin's melee weapon attack has advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to the target.

optionalfeature.name: Pack Lord's Command
entries: As a bonus action, the howler targets one allied howler it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the howler, the target can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack or take the Dash action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the howler targets one allied howler it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the howler, the target can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack or take the Dash action.

optionalfeature.name: War Hound
entries: As a bonus action, the islander can command an ally {@creature mastiff} that can hear it to use its reaction to move up to its speed and make one bite attack.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the islander can command an ally {@creature mastiff} that can hear it to use its reaction to move up to its speed and make one bite attack.

optionalfeature.name: Tumbler
entries: As a bonus action, the jester can take both the Dash and Disengage actions.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the jester can take both the Dash and Disengage actions.

optionalfeature.name: Etherealness
entries: As a bonus action, the jörmungandr magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the jörmungandr magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

optionalfeature.name: The King in Green (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the king can enter a blessed state at the start of his turn. The blessing lasts for 1 minute or until the king is {@condition incapacitated}. While blessed, the king gains the following benefits:
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the king can enter a blessed state at the start of his turn. The blessing lasts for 1 minute or until the king is {@condition incapacitated}. While blessed, the king gains the following benefits:

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Stride
entries: As a bonus action, the kithlord can teleport up to 300 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The kithlord can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the kithlord can teleport up to 300 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The kithlord can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.

optionalfeature.name: Junk Armor
entries: As a bonus action, the kobold can create magical armor out of scrap metal and bits of junk it touches. The armor provides AC 13 + Dexterity modifier, and a critical hit scored against the kobold becomes a normal hit instead. The armor lasts until the kobold uses a bonus action to end it, the armor is removed from the kobold, or the kobold dies.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the kobold can create magical armor out of scrap metal and bits of junk it touches. The armor provides AC 13 + Dexterity modifier, and a critical hit scored against the kobold becomes a normal hit instead. The armor lasts until the kobold uses a bonus action to end it, the armor is removed from the kobold, or the kobold dies.

optionalfeature.name: Drop Caltrops (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the kobold can spread caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that isn't flying and enters the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the kobold can spread caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that isn't flying and enters the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Heart Sight
entries: As a bonus action, the leanan can choose one creature she can see within 60 feet of her and magically knows the creature's alignment, current emotional state and ideal, as long as the creature isn't hidden from divination magic by a spell or other magical effect.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the leanan can choose one creature she can see within 60 feet of her and magically knows the creature's alignment, current emotional state and ideal, as long as the creature isn't hidden from divination magic by a spell or other magical effect.

optionalfeature.name: Resize
entries: As a bonus action, the living star can change its size. This trait works like the enlarge/reduce spell, except it deals {@dice 2d4} extra damage when enlarged and {@dice 2d4} less damage when reduced.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the living star can change its size. This trait works like the enlarge/reduce spell, except it deals {@dice 2d4} extra damage when enlarged and {@dice 2d4} less damage when reduced.

optionalfeature.name: Punish the Marked (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, the lizardfolk can make a melee weapon attack against a creature marked by it if the creature dealt damage to anyone other than the lizardfolk during the last turn. The lizardfolk's melee weapon attack has advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to the target.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the lizardfolk can make a melee weapon attack against a creature marked by it if the creature dealt damage to anyone other than the lizardfolk during the last turn. The lizardfolk's melee weapon attack has advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to the target.

optionalfeature.name: Quickening
entries: As a bonus action, the macnia can add {@dice 1d10} to its next attack or damage roll with a greatsword.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the macnia can add {@dice 1d10} to its next attack or damage roll with a greatsword.

optionalfeature.name: Feinting Attack
entries: As a bonus action, the master duelist can choose one creature within 5 feet of it. It has advantage on its next attack roll against the target.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the master duelist can choose one creature within 5 feet of it. It has advantage on its next attack roll against the target.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

optionalfeature.name: Create Ghoul
entries: As a bonus action, the mohrg can choose a corpse within 5 feet of it. The corpse must be that of a humanoid slain by the mohrg. Unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed, the corpse will rise as a ghoul at the start of the mohrg's next turn. The ghoul will act as an ally of the mohrg and under control of the mohrg. The mohrg can have no more than four ghouls under its control at one time.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the mohrg can choose a corpse within 5 feet of it. The corpse must be that of a humanoid slain by the mohrg. Unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed, the corpse will rise as a ghoul at the start of the mohrg's next turn. The ghoul will act as an ally of the mohrg and under control of the mohrg. The mohrg can have no more than four ghouls under its control at one time.

optionalfeature.name: Sovereign's Command
entries: As a bonus action, the monarch commands a skeleton within 30 feet of it to make one attack as a reaction against a creature the monarch attacked this round.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the monarch commands a skeleton within 30 feet of it to make one attack as a reaction against a creature the monarch attacked this round.

optionalfeature.name: Slayer's Prey
entries: As a bonus action, the monster hunter designates one creature it can see within 60 feet of it as its prey. The first time that the monster hunter hits its prey with a weapon attack, the prey takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the weapon.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the monster hunter designates one creature it can see within 60 feet of it as its prey. The first time that the monster hunter hits its prey with a weapon attack, the prey takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the weapon.

optionalfeature.name: Hunter's Sense (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the monster hunter examines a creature it can see within 60 feet of it, discerning whether the creature has any damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities and what they are. If the creature is hidden from divination magic, it senses that it has no damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the monster hunter examines a creature it can see within 60 feet of it, discerning whether the creature has any damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities and what they are. If the creature is hidden from divination magic, it senses that it has no damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities.

optionalfeature.name: Slayer's Prey (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the monster slayer designates one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The first time each turn that the monster slayer hits that target with a weapon attack, it takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage from that weapon. In addition, whenever the target forces the monster slayer to make a saving throw and whenever the monster slayer makes an ability check to escape that target's grapple, it can add {@dice 1d6} to its roll.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the monster slayer designates one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The first time each turn that the monster slayer hits that target with a weapon attack, it takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage from that weapon. In addition, whenever the target forces the monster slayer to make a saving throw and whenever the monster slayer makes an ability check to escape that target's grapple, it can add {@dice 1d6} to its roll.

optionalfeature.name: Control Moonlight
entries: As a bonus action, the Moonlit King can cause all areas of moonlight within 100 feet to move up to 10 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the Moonlit King can cause all areas of moonlight within 100 feet to move up to 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Squeeze
entries: As a bonus action, the najarala can use its constrict against a {@condition grappled} creature or one within the najarala's space.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the najarala can use its constrict against a {@condition grappled} creature or one within the najarala's space.

optionalfeature.name: Reel In
entries: As a bonus action, the nerscylla can pull a webbed target up to 15 feet towards it. If the webbed creature is pulled within 5 feet of the nerscylla, it can make a stinger attack against it.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the nerscylla can pull a webbed target up to 15 feet towards it. If the webbed creature is pulled within 5 feet of the nerscylla, it can make a stinger attack against it.

optionalfeature.name: Command Fool
entries: As a bonus action, the nilbog targets one creature {@condition charmed} by it that the nilbog can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the nilbog, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack against a target of the nilbog's choice.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the nilbog targets one creature {@condition charmed} by it that the nilbog can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the nilbog, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack against a target of the nilbog's choice.

optionalfeature.name: Grolantor's Roar (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the ogre can unleash a savage roar. Any Medium or smaller beast or humanoid within 60 feet of the ogre and able to hear it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for l minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the ogre can unleash a savage roar. Any Medium or smaller beast or humanoid within 60 feet of the ogre and able to hear it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for l minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Mirage
entries: As a bonus action, the oozasis can create a mirage around itself to lure victims toward it while disguising its true nature. This functions as the mirage arcane spell (save {@dc 16}) but is nonmagical, and therefore can't be detected using detect magic or similar magic, and can't be dispelled.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the oozasis can create a mirage around itself to lure victims toward it while disguising its true nature. This functions as the mirage arcane spell (save {@dc 16}) but is nonmagical, and therefore can't be detected using detect magic or similar magic, and can't be dispelled.

optionalfeature.name: Cold Fury (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can enter a cold fury for 1 minute. While in a fury, its melee weapon attacks deal an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the orc can enter a cold fury for 1 minute. While in a fury, its melee weapon attacks deal an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage.

optionalfeature.name: Spirit-Bonded Body (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can transform into a dire wolf for up to 4 hours. The orc can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The orc reverts to its true form when its dire wolf form is reduced to 0 hit points. If this damage would cause its dire wolf form to drop below 0 hit points, the excess damage is done to its true form.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the orc can transform into a dire wolf for up to 4 hours. The orc can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The orc reverts to its true form when its dire wolf form is reduced to 0 hit points. If this damage would cause its dire wolf form to drop below 0 hit points, the excess damage is done to its true form.

optionalfeature.name: Variegated Scales
entries: As a bonus action, the ouroboros gains immunity to one type of damage. It can change this immunity from one type to another as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the ouroboros gains immunity to one type of damage. It can change this immunity from one type to another as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Jump
entries: As a bonus action, the painbearer can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The painbearer can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the painbearer can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The painbearer can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.

optionalfeature.name: Ink Blot (Recharge 46)
entries: As a bonus action, the paper golem applies ink to itself. The next time it hits a creature with a paper cut attack, the creature must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the paper golem applies ink to itself. The next time it hits a creature with a paper cut attack, the creature must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: One With The Stone (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the pech can draw on the power of unworked stone, as long as it is in contact with stone. Until the end of the pech's next turn, it gains resistance to piercing and slashing damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the pech can draw on the power of unworked stone, as long as it is in contact with stone. Until the end of the pech's next turn, it gains resistance to piercing and slashing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Rally
entries: As a bonus action, the rally guard chooses a friendly creature within 30 feet of it that can see and hear it. The target gains 5 ({@dice 1d8 + 1}) temporary hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the rally guard chooses a friendly creature within 30 feet of it that can see and hear it. The target gains 5 ({@dice 1d8 + 1}) temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: I'm Bigger That's Why
entries: As a bonus action, the ratatosk warlord commands one ratatosk within 30 feet of it to make one melee attack as a reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the ratatosk warlord commands one ratatosk within 30 feet of it to make one melee attack as a reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Bottled Soul (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the rattok demon consumes one of the bottled souls in its possession, regaining 7 ({@dice 2d4 + 2}) hp and gaining advantage on all attack rolls and ability checks for 1 round. Any non-fiend who consumes a bottled soul regains 7 ({@dice 2d4 + 2}) hit points and must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition stunned} for 1 round and {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. On a success, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the rattok demon consumes one of the bottled souls in its possession, regaining 7 ({@dice 2d4 + 2}) hp and gaining advantage on all attack rolls and ability checks for 1 round. Any non-fiend who consumes a bottled soul regains 7 ({@dice 2d4 + 2}) hit points and must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition stunned} for 1 round and {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. On a success, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Infused Arsenal
entries: As a bonus action, the risen reaver can absorb one unattended weapon into its body. For every weapon it absorbs, it deals +1 damage with its blade attacks (maximum of +3).
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the risen reaver can absorb one unattended weapon into its body. For every weapon it absorbs, it deals +1 damage with its blade attacks (maximum of +3).

optionalfeature.name: Fighting Spirit (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the samurai gains 10 temporary hit points, plus advantage on melee weapon attacks until the end of its turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the samurai gains 10 temporary hit points, plus advantage on melee weapon attacks until the end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Infection (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the scion releases a spore cloud. Creatures within 10 feet of the infector must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. A creature that failed its saving throw takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the scion releases a spore cloud. Creatures within 10 feet of the infector must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. A creature that failed its saving throw takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Drone Slave
entries: As a Bonus Action, the seltas queen can take a seltas as a drone slave. the seltas and the queen take up the same spaces (though they can be targeted seperately) and the seltas queen gains a flying speed of 60 feet. The Seltas must use its action every turn to hold onto the Seltas Queen
optionalfeature.effect: As a Bonus Action, the seltas queen can take a seltas as a drone slave. the seltas and the queen take up the same spaces (though they can be targeted seperately) and the seltas queen gains a flying speed of 60 feet. The Seltas must use its action every turn to hold onto the Seltas Queen

optionalfeature.name: Consume
entries: As a bonus action, the seszrath makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the seszrath, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of the seszrath's turns. If the seszrath takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the seszrath must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the seszrath. If the seszrath dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the seszrath makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the seszrath, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of the seszrath's turns. If the seszrath takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the seszrath must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the seszrath. If the seszrath dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Serpentine Armlets
entries: As a bonus action, the shabti commands its armlets to drop to the floor, whereupon they become two giant poisonous snakes. The shabti can mentally direct the serpents (this does not require an action). If the snakes are killed, they dissolve into wisps of smoke which reform around the shabti's forearms, and they can't be turned into snakes for 1 week. These armlets are linked to the shabti at the time of its creation and do not function for other creatures.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the shabti commands its armlets to drop to the floor, whereupon they become two giant poisonous snakes. The shabti can mentally direct the serpents (this does not require an action). If the snakes are killed, they dissolve into wisps of smoke which reform around the shabti's forearms, and they can't be turned into snakes for 1 week. These armlets are linked to the shabti at the time of its creation and do not function for other creatures.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Shroud
entries: As a bonus action, the shade magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to a space it can see. It can also turn invisible until it attacks, either before or after it teleports. If the shade takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the end of the shade's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the shade magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to a space it can see. It can also turn invisible until it attacks, either before or after it teleports. If the shade takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the end of the shade's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Obscure The Way (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the shadow fey designates a creature it can see within 100 feet and obscures the creature and its companions' travel on a particular shadow road. That shadow road will not open for the designated creature or its traveling companions except through powerful magical means such as by a key of Veles (see the "Fifth Edition Appendix" in the Midgard Worldbook). In addition, that shadow road won't lead to its usual destination for the designated creature or its traveling companions, instead leading the group in a meandering loop. This effect lasts for 9 ({@dice 2d8}) days, until the shadow fey removes the effect, or until the shadow fey dies.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the shadow fey designates a creature it can see within 100 feet and obscures the creature and its companions' travel on a particular shadow road. That shadow road will not open for the designated creature or its traveling companions except through powerful magical means such as by a key of Veles (see the "Fifth Edition Appendix" in the Midgard Worldbook). In addition, that shadow road won't lead to its usual destination for the designated creature or its traveling companions, instead leading the group in a meandering loop. This effect lasts for 9 ({@dice 2d8}) days, until the shadow fey removes the effect, or until the shadow fey dies.

optionalfeature.name: Bile {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the sibiriex spews black bile from the feeding tubes dangling from the lower end of its body. One creature the sibiriex can see within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 42 ({@damage 12d6}) acid damage and be {@condition poisoned} for one minute. At the end of each of its turns a creature can attempt a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, ending the effect on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the sibiriex spews black bile from the feeding tubes dangling from the lower end of its body. One creature the sibiriex can see within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 42 ({@damage 12d6}) acid damage and be {@condition poisoned} for one minute. At the end of each of its turns a creature can attempt a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Create Bone Staff
entries: As a bonus action, the skull can create a bonus staff. It can have only one bone staff in its possession at a time. If it loses possession of its bone staff, the staff breaks and the skull lord is free to create a new one.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the skull can create a bonus staff. It can have only one bone staff in its possession at a time. If it loses possession of its bone staff, the staff breaks and the skull lord is free to create a new one.

optionalfeature.name: Heroic Leap (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the sleipnir can leap into the air, gaining a flying speed of 60 feet for 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the sleipnir can leap into the air, gaining a flying speed of 60 feet for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Spawn Drones (Recharge 5-6)
entries: As a bonus action, the sliver can create 4 ({@dice 2d4}) Sliver Drones. The drones appear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the creator, and acts as an ally of its creator.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the sliver can create 4 ({@dice 2d4}) Sliver Drones. The drones appear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the creator, and acts as an ally of its creator.

optionalfeature.name: Amplified Transformation
entries: As a bonus action, the sliver can target one friendly metallic sliver it can see within 5 feet of it that is still alive. The target is consumed by the sliver, and dies. When a metallic sliver is consumed in this way, the sliver regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points, loses this ability, then roll a {@dice d6}, on a roll of 1 - 4 it gains a hive aura from one of the slivers on the Sliver Broodling Evolution chart, on a roll of 5 - 6 it gains a hive aura from one of the slivers on the Sliver Harbinger Evolution chart. You may choose one, or roll. The new ability takes a number of rounds before it is fully functional, the number of rounds is determined by the *Rounds* column on the chart.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the sliver can target one friendly metallic sliver it can see within 5 feet of it that is still alive. The target is consumed by the sliver, and dies. When a metallic sliver is consumed in this way, the sliver regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points, loses this ability, then roll a {@dice d6}, on a roll of 1 - 4 it gains a hive aura from one of the slivers on the Sliver Broodling Evolution chart, on a roll of 5 - 6 it gains a hive aura from one of the slivers on the Sliver Harbinger Evolution chart. You may choose one, or roll. The new ability takes a number of rounds before it is fully functional, the number of rounds is determined by the *Rounds* column on the chart.

optionalfeature.name: Spawn Drones (Recharge 6)
entries: As a bonus action, the sliver deals 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage to itself, and creates 2 ({@dice 1d4}) Sliver Drones from the wound. The drones appear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the creator, and acts as an ally of its creator.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the sliver deals 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage to itself, and creates 2 ({@dice 1d4}) Sliver Drones from the wound. The drones appear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the creator, and acts as an ally of its creator.

optionalfeature.name: Glowing Skin
entries: As a bonus action, the sorcerer can activate or deactivate its glowing skin. While active, it sheds bright light in a 30 foot radius and dim light 30 feet beyond that.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the sorcerer can activate or deactivate its glowing skin. While active, it sheds bright light in a 30 foot radius and dim light 30 feet beyond that.

optionalfeature.name: Transpose Arcana
entries: As a bonus action, the spellbook can expend one spell slot, causing an allied spellcaster to regain a spell slot of that level or lower.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the spellbook can expend one spell slot, causing an allied spellcaster to regain a spell slot of that level or lower.

optionalfeature.name: Lantern's Light
entries: As a bonus action, the spirit lamp can open or close its lantern. When open, the lantern sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The spirit lamp can only see objects within the lantern's light and is blind while the lantern is closed. The lantern's light pierces magical and nonmagical darkness and can't be dispelled by magical darkness. If a creature dies in the lantern's light, its spirit is trapped in the lantern.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the spirit lamp can open or close its lantern. When open, the lantern sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The spirit lamp can only see objects within the lantern's light and is blind while the lantern is closed. The lantern's light pierces magical and nonmagical darkness and can't be dispelled by magical darkness. If a creature dies in the lantern's light, its spirit is trapped in the lantern.

optionalfeature.name: Halo of Spores
entries: As a bonus action, the spore spreader can activate or deactivate its halo of spores. While activated, the spore spreader is surrounded by deadly fungal spores: creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the spore spreader take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the spore spreader can activate or deactivate its halo of spores. While activated, the spore spreader is surrounded by deadly fungal spores: creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the spore spreader take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

optionalfeature.name: Shift and Tumble
entries: As a bonus action, the swarm can push a {@condition prone} creature whose space it occupies 5 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the swarm can push a {@condition prone} creature whose space it occupies 5 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Dig
entries: As a bonus action, the tetsucabra digs up a boulder (10 AC, 5hp) with its tusks granting it +3 AC. It can then use its Boulder Toss as an Action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the tetsucabra digs up a boulder (10 AC, 5hp) with its tusks granting it +3 AC. It can then use its Boulder Toss as an Action.

optionalfeature.name: Trumpeting Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the thaskor blows a thunder blast in a 15 foot cone. Creatures within the area, who can hear the thaskor, must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 round.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the thaskor blows a thunder blast in a 15 foot cone. Creatures within the area, who can hear the thaskor, must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 round.

optionalfeature.name: Knowledge of the Ages (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the theurge chooses one skill or tool and gains proficiency in it until they use this ability again.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the theurge chooses one skill or tool and gains proficiency in it until they use this ability again.

optionalfeature.name: Root (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the thorned sulfurlord sends its roots deep into the ground. For 1 minute, the sulfurlord's speed is halved, it is immune to effects that would move it, and it can't be knocked {@condition prone}.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the thorned sulfurlord sends its roots deep into the ground. For 1 minute, the sulfurlord's speed is halved, it is immune to effects that would move it, and it can't be knocked {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Curse Of The Tveirherjar (Recharge 6)
entries: As a bonus action, the tveirherjar forces a creature it hit with its Niflheim longsword this round to make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If an einherjar is reduced to 0 hp by this effect, it dies, cursed to become a tveirherjar at sundown.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the tveirherjar forces a creature it hit with its Niflheim longsword this round to make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If an einherjar is reduced to 0 hp by this effect, it dies, cursed to become a tveirherjar at sundown.

optionalfeature.name: Minor Magic Resistance (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the unhatched gives itself advantage on its next saving throw against spells or other magical effects.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the unhatched gives itself advantage on its next saving throw against spells or other magical effects.

optionalfeature.name: Ward Bond
entries: As a bonus action, the uraeus forms a magical bond with a willing creature within 5 feet. Afterward, no matter how great the distance between them, the uraeus knows the distance and direction to its bonded ward and is aware of the creature's general state of health. The bond lasts until the uraeus or the ward dies, or the uraeus ends the bond as an action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the uraeus forms a magical bond with a willing creature within 5 feet. Afterward, no matter how great the distance between them, the uraeus knows the distance and direction to its bonded ward and is aware of the creature's general state of health. The bond lasts until the uraeus or the ward dies, or the uraeus ends the bond as an action.

optionalfeature.name: Quadrupedal Dash
entries: As a bonus action, the vanara can move up to 80 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. It can't use this trait if it is wielding a weapon or holding an object weighing more than 10 lbs.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the vanara can move up to 80 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. It can't use this trait if it is wielding a weapon or holding an object weighing more than 10 lbs.

optionalfeature.name: Distract
entries: As a bonus action, the vanara can use its tail to distract an opponent within 5 feet of it by pulling on an arm, tossing dirt in the target's face, or some other method of interfering. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on all attacks against the vanara until the vanara's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the vanara can use its tail to distract an opponent within 5 feet of it by pulling on an arm, tossing dirt in the target's face, or some other method of interfering. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on all attacks against the vanara until the vanara's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Command Assault
entries: As a bonus action, the verbeeg targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the verbeeg, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the Dash action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the verbeeg targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the verbeeg, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the Dash action.

optionalfeature.name: Pilfer
entries: As a bonus action, the vile barber can take the Use an Object action or make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the vile barber can take the Use an Object action or make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check.

optionalfeature.name: Dispersal
entries: As a bonus action, the vines of Nemthyr can separate itself into a group of distinct vines. While separated in this way, the vines can move through spaces as narrow as 3 inches wide. The separated vines can't attack while in this state, but they can reform into the vines of Nemthyr as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the vines of Nemthyr can separate itself into a group of distinct vines. While separated in this way, the vines can move through spaces as narrow as 3 inches wide. The separated vines can't attack while in this state, but they can reform into the vines of Nemthyr as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Void Casting
entries: As a bonus action, the void giant can infuse a spell with void magic. One creature that is hit by that spell or who fails a saving throw against that spell is {@condition stunned} until the end of the creature's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the void giant can infuse a spell with void magic. One creature that is hit by that spell or who fails a saving throw against that spell is {@condition stunned} until the end of the creature's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Pull In
entries: As a bonus action, the volvidon can pull a {@condition grappled} target 10 ft. towards them.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the volvidon can pull a {@condition grappled} target 10 ft. towards them.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Orders
entries: As a bonus action, the war chaplain commands an ally within 30 feet of it to make one attack against a creature the chaplain attacked this round.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the war chaplain commands an ally within 30 feet of it to make one attack against a creature the chaplain attacked this round.

optionalfeature.name: Fishform
entries: As a bonus action, the waverider can transform into a {@creature hunter shark} or {@creature giant octopus}. While in this form, the waverider cannot cast spells, but can expend a spell slot as a bonus action to regain {@dice 1d8} hit points per level of the spell slot expended. When the waverider is reduced to 0 hit points, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dies in this form, it reverts to its humanoid form. It can remain in fishform for up to 3 hours, and can enter fishform twice, regaining expended uses after completing a short or long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the waverider can transform into a {@creature hunter shark} or {@creature giant octopus}. While in this form, the waverider cannot cast spells, but can expend a spell slot as a bonus action to regain {@dice 1d8} hit points per level of the spell slot expended. When the waverider is reduced to 0 hit points, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dies in this form, it reverts to its humanoid form. It can remain in fishform for up to 3 hours, and can enter fishform twice, regaining expended uses after completing a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Maddening Whispers
entries: As a bonus action, the wendigo chooses one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) psychic damage and must use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the wendigo's choice that the wendigo can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the wendigo chooses one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) psychic damage and must use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the wendigo's choice that the wendigo can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

optionalfeature.name: Deceitful Mask
entries: As a bonus action, the wraith can mask its appearance and appear to be any kind of ghost, specter or wraith. In addition, the wraith changes the way it appears to spells and magical effects that detect creature types, such as a paladin's Divine Sense. It chooses a creature type and other spells and magical effects treat it as if it were a creature of that type or of that alignment. This magical illusion lasts until it ends it as a bonus action. The effect also ends if the wraith drops to 50 hit points or fewer, or if dispel magic is cast on it.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the wraith can mask its appearance and appear to be any kind of ghost, specter or wraith. In addition, the wraith changes the way it appears to spells and magical effects that detect creature types, such as a paladin's Divine Sense. It chooses a creature type and other spells and magical effects treat it as if it were a creature of that type or of that alignment. This magical illusion lasts until it ends it as a bonus action. The effect also ends if the wraith drops to 50 hit points or fewer, or if dispel magic is cast on it.

optionalfeature.name: Spell Steal
entries: As a bonus action, the xerflstyx can steal a spell prepared by a creature it is grappling with. The target must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or lose one of its spells (chosen at random) as if the creature had already cast it. The stolen spell is added to the xerflstyx's list of spells that it can cast 1/day. The xerflstyx loses all spells acquired this way after 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the xerflstyx can steal a spell prepared by a creature it is grappling with. The target must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or lose one of its spells (chosen at random) as if the creature had already cast it. The stolen spell is added to the xerflstyx's list of spells that it can cast 1/day. The xerflstyx loses all spells acquired this way after 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Summon Vermin (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the xvart summons {@dice 3d6} rats or bats, {@dice 1d4} giant rats, {@dice 1d2} giant bats, or {@dice 1d2} dire rats (Monster Manual Expanded page 299). The beasts appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the xvart and acts as its allies. The beasts act right after the xvart on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the xvart dies.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, the xvart summons {@dice 3d6} rats or bats, {@dice 1d4} giant rats, {@dice 1d2} giant bats, or {@dice 1d2} dire rats (Monster Manual Expanded page 299). The beasts appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the xvart and acts as its allies. The beasts act right after the xvart on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the xvart dies.

optionalfeature.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the annis hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage to the target. If the annis expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, when the annis hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage to the target. If the annis expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Spawn Broodling (Recharge 5-6)
entries: As a bonus action, when the sliver deals 20 or more damage to a creature in a single turn, it can create one Sliver Broodling from the wound. The broodling appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of its creator, and acts as an ally of its creator.
optionalfeature.effect: As a bonus action, when the sliver deals 20 or more damage to a creature in a single turn, it can create one Sliver Broodling from the wound. The broodling appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of its creator, and acts as an ally of its creator.

optionalfeature.name: Command Fey
entries: As a member of the Court of Arcadia, the <$name$> can cast {@spell dominate monster} ({@dc 15}) at will on any fey creature or elf.
optionalfeature.effect: As a member of the Court of Arcadia, the <$name$> can cast {@spell dominate monster} ({@dc 15}) at will on any fey creature or elf.

optionalfeature.name: Cocoon (3/Day)
entries: As an action, a cerebral stalker can cocoon a {@condition grappled} foe with sticky webbing. The webs completely encase the victim, excluding the top of the victim's head, its eyes, and its nose. The cocooned victim is {@condition restrained} and anchored by the webs to the cerebral stalker's body. The cocooned creature can, as an action, attempt to break free with a successful {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check or Dexterity (Acrobatics) saving throw. The webbing can be cut open enough for a trapped character to escape with 8 points of slashing damage against AC 10.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a cerebral stalker can cocoon a {@condition grappled} foe with sticky webbing. The webs completely encase the victim, excluding the top of the victim's head, its eyes, and its nose. The cocooned victim is {@condition restrained} and anchored by the webs to the cerebral stalker's body. The cocooned creature can, as an action, attempt to break free with a successful {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check or Dexterity (Acrobatics) saving throw. The webbing can be cut open enough for a trapped character to escape with 8 points of slashing damage against AC 10.

optionalfeature.name: Ghost Form
entries: As an action, a darnoc can become incorporeal for up to 10 minutes each day. While incorporeal, the darnoc has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons, it gains tactical advantage on attack rolls, its slam attack does an extra {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage, and it can move through creatures and solid objects as though they were difficult terrain. The darnoc takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it is still inside another solid object or creature at the end of its turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a darnoc can become incorporeal for up to 10 minutes each day. While incorporeal, the darnoc has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons, it gains tactical advantage on attack rolls, its slam attack does an extra {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage, and it can move through creatures and solid objects as though they were difficult terrain. The darnoc takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it is still inside another solid object or creature at the end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Energy Burst
entries: As an action, a flagstone golem can convert temporary hit points as a blast of energy. All creatures within 20 feet of the flagstone golem take force damage equal to the number of temporary hit points being released, or half damage with a successful {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. This attack expels all of the flagstone golem's temporary hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a flagstone golem can convert temporary hit points as a blast of energy. All creatures within 20 feet of the flagstone golem take force damage equal to the number of temporary hit points being released, or half damage with a successful {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. This attack expels all of the flagstone golem's temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Psychic Waves (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a green brain can emit a pulse of psychic energy to debilitate and disarm potential foes. The pulse affects all creatures with Int 3 or higher within 50 feet of the green brain.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a green brain can emit a pulse of psychic energy to debilitate and disarm potential foes. The pulse affects all creatures with Int 3 or higher within 50 feet of the green brain.

optionalfeature.name: Shake the Earth
entries: As an action, a jack-inirons can stomp its foot on the ground, causing powerful vibrations to radiate out around the giant. Any creature within 10 feet of the jack-in-irons must make a successful {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a jack-inirons can stomp its foot on the ground, causing powerful vibrations to radiate out around the giant. Any creature within 10 feet of the jack-in-irons must make a successful {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Charm (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a kelpie can force a humanoid who can see the kelpie or hear her voice to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. If the save succeeds, the creature is immune to kelpie charm for 24 hours. If the save fails, the victim is {@condition charmed} by the kelpie for 24 hours (the saving throw is not repeated each round, as it is with the kelpie's claw attack). A {@condition charmed} creature perceives the kelpie as a beautiful and alluring creature and wants nothing more than to sit adoringly by its side, even if that means diving underwater and staying there forever. The charm is broken if the kelpie is killed or knocked {@condition unconscious}, or if dispel magic, lesser restoration, or comparable magic is used on the {@condition charmed} creature.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a kelpie can force a humanoid who can see the kelpie or hear her voice to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. If the save succeeds, the creature is immune to kelpie charm for 24 hours. If the save fails, the victim is {@condition charmed} by the kelpie for 24 hours (the saving throw is not repeated each round, as it is with the kelpie's claw attack). A {@condition charmed} creature perceives the kelpie as a beautiful and alluring creature and wants nothing more than to sit adoringly by its side, even if that means diving underwater and staying there forever. The charm is broken if the kelpie is killed or knocked {@condition unconscious}, or if dispel magic, lesser restoration, or comparable magic is used on the {@condition charmed} creature.

optionalfeature.name: Vermin Empathy (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a mite can summon a swarm of bats, a swarm of rats, {@dice 1d4} giant centipedes, {@dice 1d4} giant wasps, or {@dice 1d2} giant wolf spiders. The summoned creatures arrive {@dice 1d4} rounds after being summoned and stays near the mite for one hour. The mite has telepathic communication with the creatures and can give them simple commands such as "attack" and "enter that building."
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a mite can summon a swarm of bats, a swarm of rats, {@dice 1d4} giant centipedes, {@dice 1d4} giant wasps, or {@dice 1d2} giant wolf spiders. The summoned creatures arrive {@dice 1d4} rounds after being summoned and stays near the mite for one hour. The mite has telepathic communication with the creatures and can give them simple commands such as "attack" and "enter that building."

optionalfeature.name: Divide
entries: As an action, a mustard jelly with more than 10 hit points can split itself into two identical jellies, each with half of the original's current hit points (rounded down). For the first minute (10 rounds) after dividing, the newly divided jellies have speed 40 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a mustard jelly with more than 10 hit points can split itself into two identical jellies, each with half of the original's current hit points (rounded down). For the first minute (10 rounds) after dividing, the newly divided jellies have speed 40 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Pyrotechnics (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a pyrolisk can cause an ordinary fire within 120 feet of it to flare into a burst of sparks and light. This burst is so bright that all creatures able to see the fire and within 60 feet of it must make a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for {@dice 1d4} rounds. Pyrolisks are immune to this effect.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a pyrolisk can cause an ordinary fire within 120 feet of it to flare into a burst of sparks and light. This burst is so bright that all creatures able to see the fire and within 60 feet of it must make a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for {@dice 1d4} rounds. Pyrolisks are immune to this effect.

optionalfeature.name: Fear Cackle (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a red jester can unleash a fear-inducing cackle. All creatures within 60 feet that hear the cackle must make a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 2d4} rounds. A {@condition frightened} creature has a 50% chance of immediately dropping everything it holds in its hands.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a red jester can unleash a fear-inducing cackle. All creatures within 60 feet that hear the cackle must make a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 2d4} rounds. A {@condition frightened} creature has a 50% chance of immediately dropping everything it holds in its hands.

optionalfeature.name: Frightful Howl
entries: As an action, a shadow mastiff can emit a terrifying, otherworldly howl that conjures nightmare visions in those who hear it. All living creatures within 300 feet of the shadow mastiff that hear its howl must make a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 3d6} rounds. While {@condition frightened}, the creature must move away from the shadow mastiff as rapidly as possible, until its far enough away that it cant hear the howling at all (not just beyond the howls effective 300-foot range).
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a shadow mastiff can emit a terrifying, otherworldly howl that conjures nightmare visions in those who hear it. All living creatures within 300 feet of the shadow mastiff that hear its howl must make a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 3d6} rounds. While {@condition frightened}, the creature must move away from the shadow mastiff as rapidly as possible, until its far enough away that it cant hear the howling at all (not just beyond the howls effective 300-foot range).

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Form (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a shadow rat can assume shadow form for up to 1 hour. While in shadow form, its AC increases to 14, it gains immunity to damage from nonmagical weapons, and it can move through solid objects and other creatures as if they were difficult terrain. The shadow rat is destroyed if it is still inside something solid at the end of its turn.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a shadow rat can assume shadow form for up to 1 hour. While in shadow form, its AC increases to 14, it gains immunity to damage from nonmagical weapons, and it can move through solid objects and other creatures as if they were difficult terrain. The shadow rat is destroyed if it is still inside something solid at the end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Animate Plants (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a shroom can magically animate plants within 50 feet of itself. The effect is identical to the animate objects spell, but only live plants can be animated and the duration is 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a shroom can magically animate plants within 50 feet of itself. The effect is identical to the animate objects spell, but only live plants can be animated and the duration is 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Engulf
entries: As an action, a slithering tracker can enter the space of a Medium or smaller {@condition paralyzed} creature and completely cover it with a thin, transparent film. The engulfed creature loses 1 point of Constitution every 5 minutes. The creature dies if its Constitution drops to 0. If a slithering tracker is attacked while it is engulfing a victim, damage is split evenly between the slithering tracker and the engulfed victim. A slithering tracker cant make melee attacks while it is engulfing a creature.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a slithering tracker can enter the space of a Medium or smaller {@condition paralyzed} creature and completely cover it with a thin, transparent film. The engulfed creature loses 1 point of Constitution every 5 minutes. The creature dies if its Constitution drops to 0. If a slithering tracker is attacked while it is engulfing a victim, damage is split evenly between the slithering tracker and the engulfed victim. A slithering tracker cant make melee attacks while it is engulfing a creature.

optionalfeature.name: Duplicate (1/Day)
entries: As an action, a tangtal creates {@dice 2d4} images of itself. The images can move up to 30 feet away from the tangtal, but each must stay within 10 feet of at least one other image. Images have the same AC and speed as the tangtal and 1 hit point apiece; an image disappears when it takes any damage. An image can be damaged only by an attack that targets and damages it specifically; images arent affected by area attacks or nondamaging effects. An attack that targets the tangtal has a chance to hit an image instead, in exact proportion to the number of images; e.g., if there are six images, an attack against the tangtal has a 1-in-7 chance to hit it and a 6-in-7 chance to hit an image.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, a tangtal creates {@dice 2d4} images of itself. The images can move up to 30 feet away from the tangtal, but each must stay within 10 feet of at least one other image. Images have the same AC and speed as the tangtal and 1 hit point apiece; an image disappears when it takes any damage. An image can be damaged only by an attack that targets and damages it specifically; images arent affected by area attacks or nondamaging effects. An attack that targets the tangtal has a chance to hit an image instead, in exact proportion to the number of images; e.g., if there are six images, an attack against the tangtal has a 1-in-7 chance to hit it and a 6-in-7 chance to hit an image.

optionalfeature.name: Token of Favor
entries: As an action, Nicnevin can cut a lock of her copper hair and twist it into a token for a creature she chooses. As long as that creature carries the token, it gains the magic resistance trait (see above). Nicnevin can revoke her favor at any time as a bonus action. When that happens, the creature loses the benefit of the token and, if Nicnevin wishes, the creature also has disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, Nicnevin can cut a lock of her copper hair and twist it into a token for a creature she chooses. As long as that creature carries the token, it gains the magic resistance trait (see above). Nicnevin can revoke her favor at any time as a bonus action. When that happens, the creature loses the benefit of the token and, if Nicnevin wishes, the creature also has disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Touch
entries: As an action, the child of Yggdrasil destroys one nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried, such as a rope, plank, candlestick, or even an entire bronze cauldron.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, the child of Yggdrasil destroys one nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried, such as a rope, plank, candlestick, or even an entire bronze cauldron.

optionalfeature.name: Gift of Blood
entries: As an action, the herald of blood can transform any fey, human, or goblin into a red hag, if the target willingly accepts this transformation.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, the herald of blood can transform any fey, human, or goblin into a red hag, if the target willingly accepts this transformation.

optionalfeature.name: Dark Ground
entries: As an action, the razorleaf can dig its roots into the ground, securing itself in place and causing the area in a 20-foot radius around it to be shrouded in shadow. While rooted in this way, the razorleaf's speed becomes 0, it can't be knocked {@condition prone}, and its attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. This area is difficult terrain and nonmagical sources of light are only half as effective while within it. Small and smaller beasts with Intelligence 3 or lower in the area lose their natural coloration and turn pale grey. These creatures are {@condition charmed} by the razorleaf while within the area. Plants and trees inside the area turn an ashen color. The razorleaf can recall its roots and end this effect as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, the razorleaf can dig its roots into the ground, securing itself in place and causing the area in a 20-foot radius around it to be shrouded in shadow. While rooted in this way, the razorleaf's speed becomes 0, it can't be knocked {@condition prone}, and its attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. This area is difficult terrain and nonmagical sources of light are only half as effective while within it. Small and smaller beasts with Intelligence 3 or lower in the area lose their natural coloration and turn pale grey. These creatures are {@condition charmed} by the razorleaf while within the area. Plants and trees inside the area turn an ashen color. The razorleaf can recall its roots and end this effect as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Open Celestial Gate
entries: As an action, the zoryas opens a gateway to the celestial plane. The gate appears as a shimmering circle that sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet and is framed by twisting, golden strands.
optionalfeature.effect: As an action, the zoryas opens a gateway to the celestial plane. The gate appears as a shimmering circle that sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet and is framed by twisting, golden strands.

optionalfeature.name: Discord
entries: As an attack, a carbuncle can telepathically sow discord in one creature within 30 feet. An affected creature must make a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or fall into loud bickering and arguing with those around him or her. Meaningful communication is impossible. If creatures of different alignments are affected and bickering, each has a 30% chance that they feel compelled to attack the person they are bickering with who is the most different in alignment. Bickering lasts {@dice 5d4} rounds. Fighting (if it occurs) begins {@dice 1d4} rounds into the bickering and lasts {@dice 2d4} rounds.
optionalfeature.effect: As an attack, a carbuncle can telepathically sow discord in one creature within 30 feet. An affected creature must make a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or fall into loud bickering and arguing with those around him or her. Meaningful communication is impossible. If creatures of different alignments are affected and bickering, each has a 30% chance that they feel compelled to attack the person they are bickering with who is the most different in alignment. Bickering lasts {@dice 5d4} rounds. Fighting (if it occurs) begins {@dice 1d4} rounds into the bickering and lasts {@dice 2d4} rounds.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Probe
entries: As an attack, a fen witch can peer into the mind of a living creature within 60 feet in an attempt to extract the secret vibrations of the creature's name. The target resists the mental trespassing (and becomes immune to further mind probes by the same fen witch until after a long rest) with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. If the saving throw fails, the fen witch finds the information she sought and can use her death speak ability on a later turn. Creatures with an Intelligence score of 2 or less are immune to this ability, as are creatures that are immune to psychic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: As an attack, a fen witch can peer into the mind of a living creature within 60 feet in an attempt to extract the secret vibrations of the creature's name. The target resists the mental trespassing (and becomes immune to further mind probes by the same fen witch until after a long rest) with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. If the saving throw fails, the fen witch finds the information she sought and can use her death speak ability on a later turn. Creatures with an Intelligence score of 2 or less are immune to this ability, as are creatures that are immune to psychic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Invisibility
entries: As creatures of living sound, a clamor is naturally {@condition invisible}, even when it attacks. This ability can't be "switched off" or negated by any means. See invisibility adds a ghostly outline around a clamor, but true seeing reveals nothing, because the clamor has no visible form to reveal.
optionalfeature.effect: As creatures of living sound, a clamor is naturally {@condition invisible}, even when it attacks. This ability can't be "switched off" or negated by any means. See invisibility adds a ghostly outline around a clamor, but true seeing reveals nothing, because the clamor has no visible form to reveal.

optionalfeature.name: Freezing Embrace
entries: As it moves, a glacial ooze can enter spaces occupied by Large or smaller creatures. If the creature whose space is being entered makes a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, the creature can move safely out of the glacial ooze's path. If the saving throw fails, the creature is engulfed: it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage immediately, is {@condition restrained}, can't breathe, and takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage at the start of each of the glacial ooze's turns. An engulfed creature can use an action on its turn to try to escape from the glacial ooze; the creature escapes if it makes a successful {@dc 14} Strength check. A creature adjacent to the glacial ooze can use an action to try to pull one engulfed creature free. The rescue succeeds if the creature makes a successful {@dc 14} Strength check, and the creature making the check takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage whether it succeeds or fails. A glacial ooze can contain up to four creatures that are Medium or smaller, or one Large creature.
optionalfeature.effect: As it moves, a glacial ooze can enter spaces occupied by Large or smaller creatures. If the creature whose space is being entered makes a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, the creature can move safely out of the glacial ooze's path. If the saving throw fails, the creature is engulfed: it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage immediately, is {@condition restrained}, can't breathe, and takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage at the start of each of the glacial ooze's turns. A glacial ooze can contain up to four creatures that are Medium or smaller, or one Large creature.

optionalfeature.name: Singing Bones
entries: As long as it is not affected by magical silence or submerged in water, the bonesinger has advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks and disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth checks).
optionalfeature.effect: As long as it is not affected by magical silence or submerged in water, the bonesinger has advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks and disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth checks).

optionalfeature.name: Cold Regeneration
entries: As long as the temperature is below freezing, the beli regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If the beli takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the beli's next turn. The beli dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and it doesn't regenerate.
