If the beli takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the beli's next turn. The beli dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and it doesn't regenerate.

optionalfeature.name: Interplanar Flight
entries: Astral moths can fly into the spaces between realities and travel effortlessly between planes of existence and dimensions. The time required for such travel varies in accordance with the intended destination, but it would be rare for a trip of any distance to take more than 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Astral moths can fly into the spaces between realities and travel effortlessly between planes of existence and dimensions. The time required for such travel varies in accordance with the intended destination, but it would be rare for a trip of any distance to take more than 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Moonlight Sensitivity
entries: At night, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
optionalfeature.effect: At night, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

optionalfeature.name: Rotating Resistance
entries: At the beginning of the sliver's turn, roll a {@dice d10} on the Composite Sliver Resistance chart. It gains resistance to that damage type until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the beginning of the sliver's turn, roll a {@dice d10} on the Composite Sliver Resistance chart. It gains resistance to that damage type until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Flesh Wound
entries: At the end of any turn in which the behemoth took at least 30 damage, roll a {@dice d8}. On a 1, it loses an arm. On a 2, it loses a leg. In addition, 2 ({@dice 1d4}) zombies fall {@condition prone} in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of the behemoth, spilling from the wound.
optionalfeature.effect: At the end of any turn in which the behemoth took at least 30 damage, roll a {@dice d8}. On a 1, it loses an arm. On a 2, it loses a leg. In addition, 2 ({@dice 1d4}) zombies fall {@condition prone} in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of the behemoth, spilling from the wound.

optionalfeature.name: Spectacle
entries: At the end of any turn, if your opponent lost life during that turn, each card in your hand with Spectacle gains its specified amount of mana.
optionalfeature.effect: At the end of any turn, if your opponent lost life during that turn, each card in your hand with Spectacle gains its specified amount of mana.

optionalfeature.name: Time Is Inexorable (Recharge 6)
entries: At the end of the round, after all creatures have acted, Time takes another turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the end of the round, after all creatures have acted, Time takes another turn.

optionalfeature.name: Ravenous
entries: At the grub stage, the worm is painfully hungry. Rime worm grubs can make opportunity attacks against enemies who disengage.
optionalfeature.effect: At the grub stage, the worm is painfully hungry. Rime worm grubs can make opportunity attacks against enemies who disengage.

optionalfeature.name: Cocoon
entries: At the heart of the ahtal-nesto, a ahtal-ka resides within a golden cocoon. This cocoon acts as a if it was a resilient sphere meant for a huge sized creature. While in the cocoon, the ahtal-ka controls the ahtalnesto's actions and movement. Once the ahtal-nesto reaches 0 hit points, it falls apart and the ahtal-ka is released from its cocoon.

While in the cocoon, the ahtal-ka controls the ahtalnesto's actions and movement. Once the ahtal-nesto reaches 0 hit points, it falls apart and the ahtal-ka is released from its cocoon.

optionalfeature.name: Despair
entries: At the sight of a mummy of the deep within 60 feet, the viewer must make a successful {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for {@dice 1d4} rounds. If the saving throw result is 5 or less, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} instead. A successful saving throw renders the creature immune to any mummy of the deep's despair for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: The Law of Death
entries: At the start of each of Death's turns, undead within 10 feet of it take 10 force damage.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of Death's turns, undead within 10 feet of it take 10 force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Cognivore
entries: At the start of each of its turns if the sigilian is inside a book that is not a spellbook, it removes the words from 3 ({@dice 1d6}) pages and regains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) hp.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of its turns if the sigilian is inside a book that is not a spellbook, it removes the words from 3 ({@dice 1d6}) pages and regains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) hp.

optionalfeature.name: Uncanny Fear
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the meenlock half-spawn must succeed on a {@dc 2} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of every other creature it can see until the start of its next turn. Under stressful conditions, such as combat, the DC of this saving throw rises to 4.

optionalfeature.name: Demands of Nessus
entries: At the start of each of the <$name$>'s turns, it can choose one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. The chosen ally loses 10 hit points, and the cult exarch regains the same number of hit points. If the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}, it makes no choice; instead, the closest ally within 30 feet is the chosen ally.

The chosen ally loses 10 hit points, and the cult exarch regains the same number of hit points. If the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}, it makes no choice; instead, the closest ally within 30 feet is the chosen ally.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of Crows
entries: At the start of each of the ancient leshen's turns, each creature within 10 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. A creature that touches the ancient leshen or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Ingest Magic
entries: At the start of each of the arcanaphage's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it that is currently maintaining concentration on a spell must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature's spell ends and the arcanaphage feeds.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of the arcanaphage's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it that is currently maintaining concentration on a spell must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature's spell ends and the arcanaphage feeds.

optionalfeature.name: Whispering Aura
entries: At the start of each of the deep scion's turns, each creature of her choice within 5 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, provided that the deep scion isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of the deep scion's turns, each creature of her choice within 5 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, provided that the deep scion isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Blessed Regrowth
entries: At the start of each of the ecstatic bloom's turns, the bloom and each good-aligned creature, including the bloom, within 10 feet of it regains 4 ({@dice 1d8}) hp. If the bloom takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the bloom's next turn. The ecstatic bloom dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn't regain hp from this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Scales Of Justice
entries: At the start of each of the herald's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or speak only the truth until the start of the herald's next turn while within 30 feet of the herald.

optionalfeature.name: Poisonous Aura
entries: At the start of each of the horned serpent's turns, each creature within 20 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Singeing Aura
entries: At the start of each of the lesser balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. A creature that touches the lesser balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Fiendish Strikes
entries: At the start of each of the maeragorgon's turns,roll a {@dice d4}. The maeragorgon gains an effect depending on the number rolled, as discribed below:

optionalfeature.name: Poison Aura
entries: At the start of each of the nakarkos's turns, each creature within 5 feet of its body takes 11 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. A creature that touches the nakarkos body or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

optionalfeature.name: Plague Aura
entries: At the start of each of the plaguebringer's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and becomes {@condition poisoned} until the end of the plaguebringer's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of the plaguebringer's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and becomes {@condition poisoned} until the end of the plaguebringer's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Charged
entries: At the start of each of the shockwing's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage. This trait doesn't function if the shockwing has used its Fulminating Wings in the last 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of the shockwing's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage. This trait doesn't function if the shockwing has used its Fulminating Wings in the last 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Shell
entries: At the start of each of the shoreline scrapper's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the scrapper must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or the metal items worn or carried by it stick to the scrapper's shell. A creature that is made of metal or is wearing metal armor that fails the saving throw is stuck to the shell and {@condition restrained}. If the item is a weapon and the wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is adhered to the shell and is {@condition restrained}. A stuck item can't be used. A creature can take its action to remove one creature or object from the shoreline scrapper's shell by succeeding on a {@dc 15} Strength check.

optionalfeature.name: Herald of the Void
entries: At the start of each of the spectral hunt's turns, each creature within its space must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Sandstorm
entries: At the start of each of the templar's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Hell Core
entries: At the start of each of the thorned sulfurlord's turns, each creature within 10 feet of the sulfurlord takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the thorned sulfurlord takes cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of each of the thorned sulfurlord's turns, each creature within 10 feet of the sulfurlord takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the thorned sulfurlord takes cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Effluvium Aura
entries: At the start of each of the vaal hazak's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. A creature that touches the vaal hazak or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Podspawn
entries: At the start of its turn, a pod demon that has fewer than four living podspawn creates one podspawn that is placed within 5 feet of the pod demon. A pod demon's podspawn obey its telepathic commands and act on the pod demon's initiative. A pod demon can only telepathically communicate with its own podspawn and podspawn generated by another pod demon do not count toward its number of podspawn.

A pod demon's podspawn obey its telepathic commands and act on the pod demon's initiative. A pod demon can only telepathically communicate with its own podspawn and podspawn generated by another pod demon do not count toward its number of podspawn.

optionalfeature.name: Gluttonous Attraction
entries: At the start of its turn, if a creature can see the gaki, it must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is overcome with a desire to kill and eat the ghost, and it must move as close to the gaki as it can.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of its turn, if a creature can see the gaki, it must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is overcome with a desire to kill and eat the ghost, and it must move as close to the gaki as it can.

optionalfeature.name: Harden
entries: At the start of its turn, the elemental can choose to have disadvantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of its turn, the elemental can choose to have disadvantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Reckless Caster
entries: At the start of its turn, the minotaur labyrinth keeper can gain advantage on all spell attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of its turn, the minotaur labyrinth keeper can gain advantage on all spell attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Zombie Drop
entries: At the start of the corpse mound's turn during combat, one corpse falls from the mound onto the ground and immediately rises as a zombie under its control. Up to 10 such zombies can be active at one time. Zombies take their turns immediately after the corpse mound's turn.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of the corpse mound's turn during combat, one corpse falls from the mound onto the ground and immediately rises as a zombie under its control. Up to 10 such zombies can be active at one time. Zombies take their turns immediately after the corpse mound's turn.

optionalfeature.name: Hatching Offspring
entries: At the start of the ekolid's turn, all eggs it implanted with its stings hatch, the emerging grubs dealing 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage per implanted egg to the creature as they gnaw their way out. Afterward the grubs are harmless. Each grub has AC 10 and 1 hit point and grows into a fully formed Ekolid within {@dice 2d6} hours. The eggs hatch even if the ekolid is dead or otherwise removed from the encounter.

The eggs hatch even if the ekolid is dead or otherwise removed from the encounter.

optionalfeature.name: Ravenous Shadow
entries: At the start of the golothoma's turn each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and becoming {@condition poisoned} for one round on a failed save or taking half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures have disadvantage on this save while {@condition blinded} or in darkness.
optionalfeature.effect: At the start of the golothoma's turn each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and becoming {@condition poisoned} for one round on a failed save or taking half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures have disadvantage on this save while {@condition blinded} or in darkness.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of Animation
entries: At the start of the ravid's turn, a single randomly determined object of Huge size or smaller within 20 feet of the ravid comes to life as if animated by an animate objects spell. The ravid does not control these objects, but the objects act autonomously, defending the ravid to the best of their ability. The ravid can maintain concentration on up to three animated objects. When a new one is animated, the effect ends on a randomly determined object that was previously animated. When the ravid fails a concentration check, the effect ends on a single randomly determined animated object.

When a new one is animated, the effect ends on a randomly determined object that was previously animated. When the ravid fails a concentration check, the effect ends on a single randomly determined animated object.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Cloud
entries: At the start of the teostra's turn, it beats its wings and four clouds of explosive powder appear in unoccupied 5-foot cubes of air within 60 feet of the teostra. Additionally every 15 feet the Teostra moves, it leaves a cloud of explosive powder in a 5-foot cube. The clouds disperse after detonation, until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it, or when the teostra dies.

optionalfeature.name: Regenerate
entries: At the start of your turn, your creatures with Regenerate regain the specified amount of toughness which had previously been lost by taking damage.
