optionalfeature.name: Blowgun Flute
entries: At will, the banshrae can call into being a flute that also acts as a blowgun, as if drawing a weapon that is on its person. This flute disappears if the banshrae loses possession of it. Each round the banshrae can play the flute as a bonus action to create one of the effects detailed below. Creatures witin a 60 ft. radius that can hear the Banshrae must succeed on a {@dc 14} wisdom saving throw, or are affected.
optionalfeature.effect: At will, the banshrae can call into being a flute that also acts as a blowgun, as if drawing a weapon that is on its person. This flute disappears if the banshrae loses possession of it. Each round the banshrae can play the flute as a bonus action to create one of the effects detailed below. Creatures witin a 60 ft. radius that can hear the Banshrae must succeed on a {@dc 14} wisdom saving throw, or are affected.

optionalfeature.name: Da Dhiogail
entries: Attack rolls against the leathdhia have disadvantage, unless the leathdhia is {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: Attack rolls against the leathdhia have disadvantage, unless the leathdhia is {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Enthralling Aura
entries: Attack rolls against the mind sculptor have disadvantage.
optionalfeature.effect: Attack rolls against the mind sculptor have disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Defense Matrix
entries: Attack rolls against the mulaz have disadvantage if at least one of the mulaz's allies is within 5 feet of it and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: Attack rolls against the mulaz have disadvantage if at least one of the mulaz's allies is within 5 feet of it and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Elusive
entries: Attack rolls made against the vampire have disadvantage unless the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}. No attack roll has advantage against the vampire while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: Attack rolls made against the vampire have disadvantage unless the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}. No attack roll has advantage against the vampire while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Dispersed Motion
entries: Attacks against the quicksilver have disadvantage unless the quicksilver is {@condition incapacitated}. Whenever the quicksilver uses a Dash action, its AC increases to 18 until the start of its next turn. The quicksilver can move through any opening that air can pass through. If it ends its movement in a passage smaller than itself, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage and falls {@condition prone} at the closest end of the passage where its physical body can fit.
optionalfeature.effect: Attacks against the quicksilver have disadvantage unless the quicksilver is {@condition incapacitated}. Whenever the quicksilver uses a Dash action, its AC increases to 18 until the start of its next turn. The quicksilver can move through any opening that air can pass through. If it ends its movement in a passage smaller than itself, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage and falls {@condition prone} at the closest end of the passage where its physical body can fit.

optionalfeature.name: Mortar And Pestle
entries: Baba Yaga flies in a large mortar and pestle, which is immune to damage and can't be the target of spells or effects. It provides the witch partial cover from ranged attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: Baba Yaga flies in a large mortar and pestle, which is immune to damage and can't be the target of spells or effects. It provides the witch partial cover from ranged attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Cronesight
entries: Baba Yaga has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. As an action, she can observe a target and magically know its current emotional state. If the target fails a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw, she also knows the creature's alignment and discovers a hidden secret about the target.
optionalfeature.effect: Baba Yaga has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. As an action, she can observe a target and magically know its current emotional state. If the target fails a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw, she also knows the creature's alignment and discovers a hidden secret about the target.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Weapons
entries: Barong's weapon attacks are magical. When he hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage (already included below).
optionalfeature.effect: Barong's weapon attacks are magical. When he hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage (already included below).

optionalfeature.name: Snow Mobility
entries: Because of its large, fur-covered paws, a snow leopard never treats snowy or icy ground as difficult terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: Because of its large, fur-covered paws, a snow leopard never treats snowy or icy ground as difficult terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Distraction
entries: Because of the mamura's alien and forbidding aura, any spellcaster within 20 feet of the mamura must make a successful {@dc 14} spellcasting check before casting a spell; if the check fails, they lose their action but not the spell slot. They must also make a successful {@dc 14} spellcasting check to maintain concentration if they spend any part of their turn inside the aura.
optionalfeature.effect: Because of the mamura's alien and forbidding aura, any spellcaster within 20 feet of the mamura must make a successful {@dc 14} spellcasting check before casting a spell; if the check fails, they lose their action but not the spell slot. They must also make a successful {@dc 14} spellcasting check to maintain concentration if they spend any part of their turn inside the aura.

optionalfeature.name: Disruptive
entries: Because of the qwyllion's nauseating nature, spellcasters have disadvantage on concentration checks while within 40 feet of the qwyllion.
optionalfeature.effect: Because of the qwyllion's nauseating nature, spellcasters have disadvantage on concentration checks while within 40 feet of the qwyllion.

optionalfeature.name: Arctic Hunter
entries: Beli have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and Wisdom (Perception) checks made in icy, natural surroundings.
optionalfeature.effect: Beli have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and Wisdom (Perception) checks made in icy, natural surroundings.

optionalfeature.name: Lord Of Openings
entries: Belphegor retains his humble roots. Creatures in his presence find they don't have full control of their body's orifices. A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of Belphegor must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or suffer one of the following effects until the end of its next turn (rolled randomly or chosen by the GM).
optionalfeature.effect: Belphegor retains his humble roots. Creatures in his presence find they don't have full control of their body's orifices. A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of Belphegor must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or suffer one of the following effects until the end of its next turn (rolled randomly or chosen by the GM).

optionalfeature.name: Prime
entries: Belphegor rides a grand, floating palanquin named Prime. This overly complex device-turned-vehicle is immune to damage and can't be the target of spells or effects. It provides the demon lord partial cover from ranged attacks. Belphegor doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when he flies out of an enemy's reach while on Prime. If Belphegor is knocked {@condition prone}, {@condition stunned}, or {@condition incapacitated} while flying on Prime, it will gently set him on the ground and disappear for 1 hour.
optionalfeature.effect: Belphegor rides a grand, floating palanquin named Prime. This overly complex device-turned-vehicle is immune to damage and can't be the target of spells or effects. It provides the demon lord partial cover from ranged attacks. Belphegor doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when he flies out of an enemy's reach while on Prime. If Belphegor is knocked {@condition prone}, {@condition stunned}, or {@condition incapacitated} while flying on Prime, it will gently set him on the ground and disappear for 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Fate Touched
entries: Berchta's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, she deals an extra {@dice 2d8} force damage (included in the attack). In addition, she adds her Wisdom modifier to her AC.
optionalfeature.effect: Berchta's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, she deals an extra {@dice 2d8} force damage (included in the attack). In addition, she adds her Wisdom modifier to her AC.

optionalfeature.name: Essence Of Lightning
entries: Bolts of lightning course around the fulminar's body, shedding bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The fulminar can alter the radius as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: Bolts of lightning course around the fulminar's body, shedding bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The fulminar can alter the radius as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Leap
entries: Bone crabs have incredibly powerful legs and can leap up to 10 feet straight ahead or backward as part of its movement; this counts as withdraw action when moving away from a foe.
optionalfeature.effect: Bone crabs have incredibly powerful legs and can leap up to 10 feet straight ahead or backward as part of its movement; this counts as withdraw action when moving away from a foe.

optionalfeature.name: Wielder of Wound
entries: Bonebreaker Dorokor wields the magical greataxe {@item Wound|SaF 3pp} (page 144).
optionalfeature.effect: Bonebreaker Dorokor wields the magical greataxe {@item Wound|SaF 3pp} (page 144).

optionalfeature.name: Chilling Presence
entries: Boreas freezes everything within 150 feet of him. After 5 rounds, nonmagical fires up to the size of a campfire are quenched. Water freezes within 1 minute. Spells that protect against cold are subjected to an immediate dispel magic (at +10 spellcasting ability) when within 150 feet of Boreas.
optionalfeature.effect: Boreas freezes everything within 150 feet of him. After 5 rounds, nonmagical fires up to the size of a campfire are quenched. Water freezes within 1 minute. Spells that protect against cold are subjected to an immediate dispel magic (at +10 spellcasting ability) when within 150 feet of Boreas.

optionalfeature.name: Black Fire
entries: Bright light fades to dim light, and dim light fades to darkness, within 5 feet of a jackal of darkness.
optionalfeature.effect: Bright light fades to dim light, and dim light fades to darkness, within 5 feet of a jackal of darkness.

optionalfeature.name: Speak With Bovines
entries: Brother Ox can communicate with any bovine creature as if they shared a language.
optionalfeature.effect: Brother Ox can communicate with any bovine creature as if they shared a language.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Endurance
entries: Burning dervishes can survive on the Elemental Planes of Air or Earth for up to 48 hours and on the Elemental Plane of Water for up to 12 hours. Failure to return to the Elemental Plane of Fire after that time deals 1 point of damage per hour to a burning dervish until it dies or returns to the Elemental Plane of Fire.
optionalfeature.effect: Burning dervishes can survive on the Elemental Planes of Air or Earth for up to 48 hours and on the Elemental Plane of Water for up to 12 hours. Failure to return to the Elemental Plane of Fire after that time deals 1 point of damage per hour to a burning dervish until it dies or returns to the Elemental Plane of Fire.

optionalfeature.name: Object Reading
entries: By concentrating for 10 minutes on a specific object, a corpse thief learns more about the object's most recent owner. The effects of this trait are different depending on if the most recent owner is alive or dead. This trait only works once per object.
optionalfeature.effect: By concentrating for 10 minutes on a specific object, a corpse thief learns more about the object's most recent owner. The effects of this trait are different depending on if the most recent owner is alive or dead. This trait only works once per object.

optionalfeature.name: Elasticity
entries: By morphing, the arms of the colossus can reach out to incredible distances. For every sixty feet, that is between the base of the colossus and its target, its attacks lose 1 die of damage to a minimum of 2.
optionalfeature.effect: By morphing, the arms of the colossus can reach out to incredible distances. For every sixty feet, that is between the base of the colossus and its target, its attacks lose 1 die of damage to a minimum of 2.

optionalfeature.name: Trilling
entries: By rapidly vibrating its carapace as a bonus action, a chain worm emits a high-pitched trilling sound that stuns and deafens creatures within range. All living creatures within 30 feet that can hear the trilling must make a successful a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} and {@condition deafened}. {@condition Stunned} characters can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns; a successful save ends the {@condition stunned} condition, but the deafness lasts until the end of the creature's next long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: By rapidly vibrating its carapace as a bonus action, a chain worm emits a high-pitched trilling sound that stuns and deafens creatures within range. All living creatures within 30 feet that can hear the trilling must make a successful a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} and {@condition deafened}. {@condition Stunned} characters can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns; a successful save ends the {@condition stunned} condition, but the deafness lasts until the end of the creature's next long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Lethargy
entries: By speaking, singing, or roaring, the lionwere causes all creatures that can hear it and that are within 60 feet of it to make a successful {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or suffer the effect of a slow spell lasting {@dice 1d6} rounds. A creature that saves successfully is immune to lethargy until after its next long rest. Therianthropes are immune to lethargy.
optionalfeature.effect: By speaking, singing, or roaring, the lionwere causes all creatures that can hear it and that are within 60 feet of it to make a successful {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or suffer the effect of a slow spell lasting {@dice 1d6} rounds. A creature that saves successfully is immune to lethargy until after its next long rest. Therianthropes are immune to lethargy.

optionalfeature.name: Slick Spittle
entries: By spending 2 rounds dribbling spittle on an area, an eel hound can cover a 5-foot square with its slippery saliva. This area is treated as if under the effects of a grease spell, but it lasts for 1 hour.
optionalfeature.effect: By spending 2 rounds dribbling spittle on an area, an eel hound can cover a 5-foot square with its slippery saliva. This area is treated as if under the effects of a grease spell, but it lasts for 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Icy Incorporeality
entries: By using an action, a chaos knight can make itself incorporeal until the start of its next turn. While incorporeal, it can pass through solid objects such as a wall, or other creatures, as if they were difficult terrain. It leaves behind an icy outline where it passes.
optionalfeature.effect: By using an action, a chaos knight can make itself incorporeal until the start of its next turn. While incorporeal, it can pass through solid objects such as a wall, or other creatures, as if they were difficult terrain. It leaves behind an icy outline where it passes.

optionalfeature.name: Summon Demons (1/Day)
entries: Camazotz can summon {@dice 2d4} barlgura of a variety native to his cavernous realm: squat and blubbery creatures with clawed batwings for arms and a fly speed of 40 ft.
optionalfeature.effect: Camazotz can summon {@dice 2d4} barlgura of a variety native to his cavernous realm: squat and blubbery creatures with clawed batwings for arms and a fly speed of 40 ft.

optionalfeature.name: Summon Bats (1/Day)
entries: Camazotz can summon {@dice 4d6} giant bats or {@dice 2d6} swarms of bats. The bats appear immediately and serve the demon for up to 1 hour.
optionalfeature.effect: Camazotz can summon {@dice 4d6} giant bats or {@dice 2d6} swarms of bats. The bats appear immediately and serve the demon for up to 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Heat Mantle
entries: Camazotz is infused with the heart of volcanoes. A creature who strikes Camazotz with a nonreach weapon or with an unarmed strike takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage automatically.
optionalfeature.effect: Camazotz is infused with the heart of volcanoes. A creature who strikes Camazotz with a nonreach weapon or with an unarmed strike takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage automatically.

optionalfeature.name: Gift of Vampirism
entries: Camazotz may choose to raise those slain through Strength loss as vampires. They rise after {@dice 1d4} days, permanently dominated by Camazotz until such time as he sees fit to grant them free will. Camazotz may have no more than ten enslaved vampires at any given time.
optionalfeature.effect: Camazotz may choose to raise those slain through Strength loss as vampires. They rise after {@dice 1d4} days, permanently dominated by Camazotz until such time as he sees fit to grant them free will. Camazotz may have no more than ten enslaved vampires at any given time.

optionalfeature.name: Dispel Magic Weakness
entries: Casting dispel magic on a witchlight paralyzes it for {@dice 1d10} rounds.
optionalfeature.effect: Casting dispel magic on a witchlight paralyzes it for {@dice 1d10} rounds.

optionalfeature.name: Concealed Burrow
entries: Cave eels conceal their burrows skillfully, so they have tactical advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to be hidden at the beginning of an encounter. An attacking cave eel lunges from its cave, bites a victim within 5 feet, and then withdraws back into its burrow without triggering an opportunity attack. While in a burrow, a cave eel has threequarters cover (+5 bonus to AC and Dex saving throws). The only way to negate this benefit is for a character to ready an action and attack the cave eel with a reaction as it extends its body to strike.
optionalfeature.effect: Cave eels conceal their burrows skillfully, so they have tactical advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to be hidden at the beginning of an encounter. An attacking cave eel lunges from its cave, bites a victim within 5 feet, and then withdraws back into its burrow without triggering an opportunity attack. While in a burrow, a cave eel has threequarters cover (+5 bonus to AC and Dex saving throws). The only way to negate this benefit is for a character to ready an action and attack the cave eel with a reaction as it extends its body to strike.

optionalfeature.name: Contractibility and Conductivity
entries: Certain spells and effects function differently against feyward trees:
optionalfeature.effect: Certain spells and effects function differently against feyward trees:

optionalfeature.name: Fey Blood
entries: Children of the briar count as both plant and fey for any effect related to type.
optionalfeature.effect: Children of the briar count as both plant and fey for any effect related to type.

optionalfeature.name: Multiple Roles
entries: Choose either the Dripping Arcanist (Innate Spellcasting) or Paladin of Shoth trait.
optionalfeature.effect: Choose either the Dripping Arcanist (Innate Spellcasting) or Paladin of Shoth trait.

optionalfeature.name: Multiple Roles
entries: Choose either the Laborer or Warrior trait.
optionalfeature.effect: Choose either the Laborer or Warrior trait.

optionalfeature.name: Diligent Tracker
entries: Clockwork hounds are designed to guard areas and track prey. They have advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks when tracking.
optionalfeature.effect: Clockwork hounds are designed to guard areas and track prey. They have advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks when tracking.

optionalfeature.name: Clurichaun's Luck
entries: Clurichauns add both their Dexterity and Charisma modifiers to their Armor Class.
optionalfeature.effect: Clurichauns add both their Dexterity and Charisma modifiers to their Armor Class.

optionalfeature.name: Chilling Presence
entries: Cold air surrounds the ice maiden. Small non-magical flames are extinguished in her presence and water begins to freeze. Unprotected characters spending more than 10 minutes within 15 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or suffer as if exposed to severe cold. Spells that grant protection from cold damage are targeted by an automatic dispel magic effect.
optionalfeature.effect: Cold air surrounds the ice maiden. Small non-magical flames are extinguished in her presence and water begins to freeze. Unprotected characters spending more than 10 minutes within 15 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or suffer as if exposed to severe cold. Spells that grant protection from cold damage are targeted by an automatic dispel magic effect.

optionalfeature.name: Vulnerability to Water Magic
entries: Control water and destroy water spells deal {@dice 3d6} piercing damage to an algoid (no save).
optionalfeature.effect: Control water and destroy water spells deal {@dice 3d6} piercing damage to an algoid (no save).

optionalfeature.name: Covetous Bond
entries: Corpse-black vaettir can see the face of any creature holding or carrying any item the vaettir ever claimed as its own. It also detects the direction and distance to items it ever owned, so long as that item is currently owned by another. If the item changes hands, the new owner becomes the target of the vaettir's hunt. Bone-white vaettir see individuals who have offended them. Neither time nor distance affects these abilities, so long as both parties are on the same plane.
optionalfeature.effect: Corpse-black vaettir can see the face of any creature holding or carrying any item the vaettir ever claimed as its own. It also detects the direction and distance to items it ever owned, so long as that item is currently owned by another. If the item changes hands, the new owner becomes the target of the vaettir's hunt. Bone-white vaettir see individuals who have offended them. Neither time nor distance affects these abilities, so long as both parties are on the same plane.

optionalfeature.name: Insanity Toxin
entries: Creatures {@condition poisoned} by insanity toxin must roll {@dice 1d10}, add their Intelligence modifier, and find the result on the table below. Affected creatures can repeat the saving throw if the tentacled horrors horn is torn off. A successful save ends the insanity. Otherwise, these effects are permanent until removed by magic that can end a curse.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures {@condition poisoned} by insanity toxin must roll {@dice 1d10}, add their Intelligence modifier, and find the result on the table below. Affected creatures can repeat the saving throw if the tentacled horrors horn is torn off. A successful save ends the insanity. Otherwise, these effects are permanent until removed by magic that can end a curse.

optionalfeature.name: Spines
entries: Creatures adjacent to a stegocentipede must make a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw each time they make a melee attack against it or take 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage from spines on the stegocentipedes carapace.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures adjacent to a stegocentipede must make a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw each time they make a melee attack against it or take 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage from spines on the stegocentipedes carapace.

optionalfeature.name: Elusive Prey
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on all Wisdom (Survival) checks made to track the astral stalker.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures have disadvantage on all Wisdom (Survival) checks made to track the astral stalker.

optionalfeature.name: Blur
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the gloomflower.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the gloomflower.

optionalfeature.name: Death Tar
entries: Creatures inside the slime can't be seen from the outside, have total cover, are {@condition blinded}, and are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). A creature within 5 feet of the slime can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the slime. Doing so requires a successful {@dc 12} Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. A creature that starts its turn inside the slime starts making death saving throws at the end of each of its turns. They don't gain one hit point on a roll of a 20, and when they would become stable the effect ends.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures inside the slime can't be seen from the outside, have total cover, are {@condition blinded}, and are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). A creature within 5 feet of the slime can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the slime. Doing so requires a successful {@dc 12} Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. A creature that starts its turn inside the slime starts making death saving throws at the end of each of its turns. They don't gain one hit point on a roll of a 20, and when they would become stable the effect ends.

optionalfeature.name: Feybane
entries: Creatures of the fey type don't recover spells during a long rest while within 60 feet of the chuhaister.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures of the fey type don't recover spells during a long rest while within 60 feet of the chuhaister.

optionalfeature.name: Howling
entries: Creatures other than celestials, elementals, and fiends, that hear the howling of one or more howlers for an hour or longer must succeed on a {@dc 8} Wisdom saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and gain disadvantage on Wisdom and Charisma checks and saving throws until they finish a long rest without hearing a howler's howling. Creatures exposed to the howling for longer than an hour must repeat the saving throw each full hour. While exposed to continuous howling, a creature cannot benefit from short rests and a long rest instead has the effects of a short rest. A creature, that is reduced to 0 hit points by this psychic damage, falls {@condition unconscious} and is automatically stable, not taking any further damage from the howling until it is above 0 hit points again. Hit and Run. If the howler hits a creature with its quills, that creature can't make an opportunity against the Howler this turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures other than celestials, elementals, and fiends, that hear the howling of one or more howlers for an hour or longer must succeed on a {@dc 8} Wisdom saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and gain disadvantage on Wisdom and Charisma checks and saving throws until they finish a long rest without hearing a howler's howling. Creatures exposed to the howling for longer than an hour must repeat the saving throw each full hour. While exposed to continuous howling, a creature cannot benefit from short rests and a long rest instead has the effects of a short rest. A creature, that is reduced to 0 hit points by this psychic damage, falls {@condition unconscious} and is automatically stable, not taking any further damage from the howling until it is above 0 hit points again. Hit and Run. If the howler hits a creature with its quills, that creature can't make an opportunity against the Howler this turn.

optionalfeature.name: Slowing Webs
entries: Creatures other than temporal crawlers that are within 10 feet of the webbing in a temporal crawlers lair must make a successful {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or uffer the effects of a slow spell. The slowing effect ends {@dice 1d4} rounds after the creature leaves the affected area.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures other than temporal crawlers that are within 10 feet of the webbing in a temporal crawlers lair must make a successful {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or uffer the effects of a slow spell. The slowing effect ends {@dice 1d4} rounds after the creature leaves the affected area.

optionalfeature.name: Event Horizon
entries: Creatures pulled through the event horizon via the voidwracked mage's Accretion ability or that pass through it willingly become trapped in the void. A trapped creature is unable to breathe and can't cast spells with verbal components. At the end of its turn, the trapped creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage. A trapped creature that is not {@condition incapacitated} can escape if a rope or long pole is passed to it from the outside.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures pulled through the event horizon via the voidwracked mage's Accretion ability or that pass through it willingly become trapped in the void. A trapped creature is unable to breathe and can't cast spells with verbal components. At the end of its turn, the trapped creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage. A trapped creature that is not {@condition incapacitated} can escape if a rope or long pole is passed to it from the outside.

optionalfeature.name: Event Horizon
entries: Creatures pulled through the event horizon via the voidwracked mage's Accretion ability or that pass through it willingly become trapped in the void. A trapped creature is unable to breathe and can't cast spells with verbal components. At the end of its turn, the trapped creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage. A trapped creature that is not {@condition incapacitated} can escape if a rope or long pole is passed to it from the outside.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures pulled through the event horizon via the voidwracked mage's Accretion ability or that pass through it willingly become trapped in the void. A trapped creature is unable to breathe and can't cast spells with verbal components. At the end of its turn, the trapped creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage. A trapped creature that is not {@condition incapacitated} can escape if a rope or long pole is passed to it from the outside.

optionalfeature.name: Noxious Aura
entries: Creatures that are within 20 feet of the corpse mound at the end of its turn must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Noxious Aura for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures that are within 20 feet of the corpse mound at the end of its turn must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Noxious Aura for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Create Corpsespun
entries: Creatures that die while affected by a corpsespinner's poison (and not devoured by the corpsespinner) rise in 1 hour as a corpsespun.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures that die while affected by a corpsespinner's poison (and not devoured by the corpsespinner) rise in 1 hour as a corpsespun.

optionalfeature.name: Binding Witness
entries: Creatures that make a pact or agree to terms while the drake witnesses the agreement are bound by the drake's magic. They have disadvantage on saving throws against scrying by the drake (simply making a successful save against the drake's scrying usually is enough to arouse its suspicion), and they become potential targets for the drake's Punish Transgressor action.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures that make a pact or agree to terms while the drake witnesses the agreement are bound by the drake's magic. They have disadvantage on saving throws against scrying by the drake (simply making a successful save against the drake's scrying usually is enough to arouse its suspicion), and they become potential targets for the drake's Punish Transgressor action.

optionalfeature.name: Overwhelming Stench
entries: Creatures that start their turn or move within 5 feet of the swamp troll must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of their turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature stays at least 10 feet away from the swamp troll for an entire round they automatically succeed on saving throws to end the effect. After a successful saving throw, a creature is immune to the swamp troll's stench for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures that start their turn or move within 5 feet of the swamp troll must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of their turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature stays at least 10 feet away from the swamp troll for an entire round they automatically succeed on saving throws to end the effect. After a successful saving throw, a creature is immune to the swamp troll's stench for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Necromantic Acid
entries: Creatures that take acid damage from the ulgurstasta's, Bite, Swallow or Vomit abilities have their maximum hitpoints reduced by an amount equal to the acid damage taken until they finish a long rest. A creature that is reduced to 0 maximum hit points this way dies immediately. A Large or smaller creature killed by the necromantic acid (either the damage, or by having its maximum hit points reduced to 0) reanimates as a skeleton the next round (see Appendix 2: Zombies and Skeletons for appropriate skeleton statistics). These skeletons are immune to the ulgurstasta's acid and obey its telepathic commands without fail (no action by the ulgurstasta required). If the skeleton is inside the ulgurstasta's stomach, it goes dormant until ejected. Roll initiative for all skeletons as soon as they are outside the ulgurstasta.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures that take acid damage from the ulgurstasta's, Bite, Swallow or Vomit abilities have their maximum hitpoints reduced by an amount equal to the acid damage taken until they finish a long rest. A creature that is reduced to 0 maximum hit points this way dies immediately. A Large or smaller creature killed by the necromantic acid (either the damage, or by having its maximum hit points reduced to 0) reanimates as a skeleton the next round (see Appendix 2: Zombies and Skeletons for appropriate skeleton statistics). These skeletons are immune to the ulgurstasta's acid and obey its telepathic commands without fail (no action by the ulgurstasta required). If the skeleton is inside the ulgurstasta's stomach, it goes dormant until ejected. Roll initiative for all skeletons as soon as they are outside the ulgurstasta.

optionalfeature.name: Cronespeech
entries: Creatures with Intelligence 3 or lower obey Baba Yaga unquestioningly. Her utterances are often captured as engravings on nearby stone and wood surfaces. These magical reproductions of her words are made in the Common tongue and fade after several days.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures with Intelligence 3 or lower obey Baba Yaga unquestioningly. Her utterances are often captured as engravings on nearby stone and wood surfaces. These magical reproductions of her words are made in the Common tongue and fade after several days.

optionalfeature.name: Strike with Awe
entries: Creatures within 120 feet of an immobile hoard golem suffer disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks. A creature's sheer glee on discovering a vast hoard of treasure distracts it from its surroundings.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures within 120 feet of an immobile hoard golem suffer disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks. A creature's sheer glee on discovering a vast hoard of treasure distracts it from its surroundings.

optionalfeature.name: Warden's Reach
entries: Creatures within 15 feet of a feyward tree provoke opportunity attacks even if they take the Disengage action before leaving its reach.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures within 15 feet of a feyward tree provoke opportunity attacks even if they take the Disengage action before leaving its reach.

optionalfeature.name: Chirp
entries: Creatures within 20 feet of a chirping cave cricket can't be heard unless they scream. Spellcasters in the area must make a successful {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw to cast a spell correctly. Failure indicates the spell is not cast, but the slot is not expended. The chirping doubles the chance of attracting wandering monsters, if applicable.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures within 20 feet of a chirping cave cricket can't be heard unless they scream. Spellcasters in the area must make a successful {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw to cast a spell correctly. Failure indicates the spell is not cast, but the slot is not expended. The chirping doubles the chance of attracting wandering monsters, if applicable.

optionalfeature.name: Gaze
entries: Creatures within 30 feet that meet the boalisk's gaze must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract black rot disease. Creatures with black rot can't spend hit dice to recover lost hit points. A diseased character repeats the Con saving throw at the end of every long rest. On a failed saving throw, the disease continues. With a successful saving throw, the disease ends. The disease can also be cured with a lesser restoration spell.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures within 30 feet that meet the boalisk's gaze must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract black rot disease. Creatures with black rot can't spend hit dice to recover lost hit points. A diseased character repeats the Con saving throw at the end of every long rest. On a failed saving throw, the disease continues. With a successful saving throw, the disease ends. The disease can also be cured with a lesser restoration spell.

optionalfeature.name: Sabotaging Presence
entries: Creatures, other than gremlins, within 30 feet of the gremlin have disadvantage on all Ability checks made using tools.
optionalfeature.effect: Creatures, other than gremlins, within 30 feet of the gremlin have disadvantage on all Ability checks made using tools.

optionalfeature.name: Poison
entries: Dark creepers are skilled in the use of poison. They favor a foul-smelling, dark paste called black smear that they distill from fungi that grows only in deep caverns. Creatures {@condition poisoned} by black smear take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage immediately and suffer the usual effect of the {@condition poisoned} condition. {@condition Poisoned} creatures repeat the {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of their turns. On a successful save, they are no longer {@condition poisoned}; on a failed save, they take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition continues. Each dark creeper carries three doses of this poison, and they train from childhood to reapply it to their daggers as a bonus action after a successful hit.
optionalfeature.effect: Dark creepers are skilled in the use of poison. They favor a foul-smelling, dark paste called black smear that they distill from fungi that grows only in deep caverns. Creatures {@condition poisoned} by black smear take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage immediately and suffer the usual effect of the {@condition poisoned} condition. {@condition Poisoned} creatures repeat the {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of their turns. On a successful save, they are no longer {@condition poisoned}; on a failed save, they take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition continues. Each dark creeper carries three doses of this poison, and they train from childhood to reapply it to their daggers as a bonus action after a successful hit.

optionalfeature.name: Hatred
entries: Deprived of parental bonds, the unhatched despise those who nurture and heal others. The unhatched has advantage on attacks against a creature whose most recent action was to heal, restore, strengthen, or otherwise aid another creature.
optionalfeature.effect: Deprived of parental bonds, the unhatched despise those who nurture and heal others. The unhatched has advantage on attacks against a creature whose most recent action was to heal, restore, strengthen, or otherwise aid another creature.

optionalfeature.name: Squeeze
entries: Despite their size, strangling watchers have slender, boneless bodies, enabling them to squeeze through passages only a Small-sized creature could fit through, without affecting their movement or combat capabilities.
optionalfeature.effect: Despite their size, strangling watchers have slender, boneless bodies, enabling them to squeeze through passages only a Small-sized creature could fit through, without affecting their movement or combat capabilities.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Breath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Devastate (Recharge 5?6). As a bonus action, the ouroban imbues its greatsword with dark power. All of its greatsword attacks do an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage per hit until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Devastate (Recharge 5?6). As a bonus action, the ouroban imbues its greatsword with dark power. All of its greatsword attacks do an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage per hit until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Groundbreaker
entries: Difficult terrain caused by rocks, sand, or natural vegetation, living or dead, doesn't cost the flamescourged scion extra movement. Its speed can't be reduced by any effect.
optionalfeature.effect: Difficult terrain caused by rocks, sand, or natural vegetation, living or dead, doesn't cost the flamescourged scion extra movement. Its speed can't be reduced by any effect.

optionalfeature.name: Forest Runner
entries: Difficult terrain doesn't slow the white stag's travel while in a forest.
optionalfeature.effect: Difficult terrain doesn't slow the white stag's travel while in a forest.

optionalfeature.name: Yip
entries: Doombats yip constantly while in combat, and the noise interferes with spellcasters' concentration. Creatures within 100 ft. of any number of yipping doombats must make a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw every time they attempt to cast a spell. Success indicates the spell is cast. Failure with a result of 9 or higher indicates the spell is not cast, but the spell slot is not expended. Failure with a result of 8 or lower indicates the spell is not cast and the spell slot is expended.
optionalfeature.effect: Doombats yip constantly while in combat, and the noise interferes with spellcasters' concentration. Creatures within 100 ft. of any number of yipping doombats must make a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw every time they attempt to cast a spell. Success indicates the spell is cast. Failure with a result of 9 or higher indicates the spell is not cast, but the spell slot is not expended. Failure with a result of 8 or lower indicates the spell is not cast and the spell slot is expended.

optionalfeature.name: Weaknesses
entries: Dragonleaf trees with immunity to fire also have vulnerability to cold, and trees with immunity to cold have vulnerability to fire.
optionalfeature.effect: Dragonleaf trees with immunity to fire also have vulnerability to cold, and trees with immunity to cold have vulnerability to fire.

optionalfeature.name: Wyrmtongue
entries: Dragons under the command of the kobold prophet have advantage against being {@condition charmed} by anyone except the kobold prophet.
optionalfeature.effect: Dragons under the command of the kobold prophet have advantage against being {@condition charmed} by anyone except the kobold prophet.

optionalfeature.name: Moonlight Hearth
entries: During a short or long rest, the dream guardian touches a point in space, and an {@condition invisible}, 30-foot-radius sphere of magic appears, centered on that point. Total cover blocks the sphere. While within the sphere, the dream guardian and its allies gain a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) and Wisdom (Perception) checks, and any light from open flames in the sphere isn't visible outside of it. The sphere vanishes at the end of the rest or when the dream guardian leaves the sphere.
optionalfeature.effect: During a short or long rest, the dream guardian touches a point in space, and an {@condition invisible}, 30-foot-radius sphere of magic appears, centered on that point. Total cover blocks the sphere. While within the sphere, the dream guardian and its allies gain a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) and Wisdom (Perception) checks, and any light from open flames in the sphere isn't visible outside of it. The sphere vanishes at the end of the rest or when the dream guardian leaves the sphere.

optionalfeature.name: Flood Fever
entries: During flood season, the subek is overcome with bloodthirsty malice. Its alignment shifts to chaotic evil, it gains the Blood Frenzy trait, and it loses the capacity to speak Common and its bonuses to History and Investigation.
optionalfeature.effect: During flood season, the subek is overcome with bloodthirsty malice. Its alignment shifts to chaotic evil, it gains the Blood Frenzy trait, and it loses the capacity to speak Common and its bonuses to History and Investigation.

optionalfeature.name: Storm Glide
entries: During storms, the dragon eel can travel through the air as if under the effects of a fly spell, except using its swim speed.
optionalfeature.effect: During storms, the dragon eel can travel through the air as if under the effects of a fly spell, except using its swim speed.

optionalfeature.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: During the privateer's turn, if it makes a melee attack against a creature, that creature cannot make opportunity attacks against it until the end of the privateer's turn.
optionalfeature.effect: During the privateer's turn, if it makes a melee attack against a creature, that creature cannot make opportunity attacks against it until the end of the privateer's turn.

optionalfeature.name: Inspiring Savagery
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the dhampir that can see it can make one melee attack as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: Each ally within 30 feet of the dhampir that can see it can make one melee attack as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Charm Animals and Plants (Recharge After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each animal and plant within 30 feet of the priest that can see and hear it must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} by the priest until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Each animal and plant within 30 feet of the priest that can see and hear it must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} by the priest until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Feline Terror
entries: Each creature in the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the swarm's Feline Terror for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Each creature in the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the swarm's Feline Terror for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Rallying Cry (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the hobgoblin's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Rallying Cry gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn. The hobgoblin can then make one attack as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: Each creature of the hobgoblin's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Rallying Cry gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn. The hobgoblin can then make one attack as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Tearful Stench
entries: Each creature other than an alliumite within 5 feet of the alliumite when it takes damage must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Tearful Stench of all alliumites for 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: Each creature other than an alliumite within 5 feet of the alliumite when it takes damage must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Tearful Stench of all alliumites for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Moonlight Dance
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the wraith that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed, joining the wraith in its maddening dance. The creature is free from the enchantment if it takes any damage. Each hour passed dancing, the creature gains one level of exhaustion. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw each hour, with disadvantage if the wraith is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the nightwraith's Moonlight Dance for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Each creature within 60 feet of the wraith that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed, joining the wraith in its maddening dance. The creature is free from the enchantment if it takes any damage. Each hour passed dancing, the creature gains one level of exhaustion. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw each hour, with disadvantage if the wraith is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the nightwraith's Moonlight Dance for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Midday Dance
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the wraith that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed, joining the wraith in its maddening dance. The creature is free from the enchantment if it takes any damage. Each hour passed dancing, the creature gains one level of exhaustion. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw each hour, with disadvantage if the wraith is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the noonwraith's Midday Dance for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Each creature within 60 feet of the wraith that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed, joining the wraith in its maddening dance. The creature is free from the enchantment if it takes any damage. Each hour passed dancing, the creature gains one level of exhaustion. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw each hour, with disadvantage if the wraith is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the noonwraith's Midday Dance for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Focus
entries: Each dragonborn elementalist permanently aligns with a particular element. This elemental focus grants the dragonborn resistance to a certain damage type and the ability to innately cast some spells. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks).
optionalfeature.effect: Each dragonborn elementalist permanently aligns with a particular element. This elemental focus grants the dragonborn resistance to a certain damage type and the ability to innately cast some spells. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Gallows Tree Zombies
entries: Each gallows tree has several gallows tree zombies connected to it. A Huge gallows tree can have no more than seven gallows tree zombies connected to it at one time. A Gargantuan gallows tree can have up to 11 zombies connected to it. See the gallows tree zombie entry in this book for details on that monster.
optionalfeature.effect: Each gallows tree has several gallows tree zombies connected to it. A Huge gallows tree can have no more than seven gallows tree zombies connected to it at one time. A Gargantuan gallows tree can have up to 11 zombies connected to it. See the gallows tree zombie entry in this book for details on that monster.

optionalfeature.name: The Three Horsemen
entries: Each horseman has unique senses, defenses, and special abilities.
optionalfeature.effect: Each horseman has unique senses, defenses, and special abilities.

optionalfeature.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each non-undead creature that is within 60 feet of the crypt horror and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the crypt horror's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Each non-undead creature that is within 60 feet of the crypt horror and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the crypt horror's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Hunger
entries: Each time it feeds in combat, it regains hp equal to twice the level of the spell it ate and increases its Feed score by 1. The arcanaphage can't have a Feed score higher than 8, and its Feed score reduces by 1 each time it finishes a long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: Each time it feeds in combat, it regains hp equal to twice the level of the spell it ate and increases its Feed score by 1. The arcanaphage can't have a Feed score higher than 8, and its Feed score reduces by 1 each time it finishes a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Reform
entries: Each time Maladar takes damage in combat, his arm grows another limb, increasing the damage of his Smash attack by {@dice 1d8}. There is no limit to the number of limbs, tentacles, and claws Maladar can grow this way.
optionalfeature.effect: Each time Maladar takes damage in combat, his arm grows another limb, increasing the damage of his Smash attack by {@dice 1d8}. There is no limit to the number of limbs, tentacles, and claws Maladar can grow this way.

optionalfeature.name: Feedback Aura
entries: Each time the dragon takes damage, all creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw or else take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Each time the dragon takes damage, all creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw or else take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Coagulate
entries: Each time the elemental takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Each time the elemental takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Visionary Flesh
entries: Eating the flesh of a fate eater requires a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. If successful, the eater gains a divination spell. If failed, the victim vomits blood and fails the next saving throw made in combat.
optionalfeature.effect: Eating the flesh of a fate eater requires a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. If successful, the eater gains a divination spell. If failed, the victim vomits blood and fails the next saving throw made in combat.

optionalfeature.name: Battle Loving
entries: Einherjars relish combat and never turn down a challenge to single combat or shirk a fight, even if the odds are hopeless. After all, Valhalla awaits them.
optionalfeature.effect: Einherjars relish combat and never turn down a challenge to single combat or shirk a fight, even if the odds are hopeless. After all, Valhalla awaits them.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Sight
entries: Elusa hounds detect magical auras as if they are under a permanent detect magic spell with a radius of 120 feet. This has the added benefit that an elusa hound can instantly identify any spellcaster within range.
optionalfeature.effect: Elusa hounds detect magical auras as if they are under a permanent detect magic spell with a radius of 120 feet. This has the added benefit that an elusa hound can instantly identify any spellcaster within range.

optionalfeature.name: Diligent Sentinel
entries: Empty cloaks are designed to watch for intruders. They gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: Empty cloaks are designed to watch for intruders. They gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Construction
entries: Empty cloaks are designed with a delicate shadow construction. They burst into pieces, then dissipate into shadow, on a critical hit.
optionalfeature.effect: Empty cloaks are designed with a delicate shadow construction. They burst into pieces, then dissipate into shadow, on a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Wrapping Embrace
entries: Empty cloaks can share the same space as one Medium or smaller creature. The empty cloak has advantage on attack rolls against any creature in the same space with it.
optionalfeature.effect: Empty cloaks can share the same space as one Medium or smaller creature. The empty cloak has advantage on attack rolls against any creature in the same space with it.

optionalfeature.name: Constant Flood
entries: Enemies beginning their turn within 15 feet of the pillar must make a {@dc 15} Strength check or be pushed 10 feet away from the pillar. The ground within 15 feet of the Pillar is difficult terrain for all enemies attempting to move toward the pillar.
optionalfeature.effect: Enemies beginning their turn within 15 feet of the pillar must make a {@dc 15} Strength check or be pushed 10 feet away from the pillar. The ground within 15 feet of the Pillar is difficult terrain for all enemies attempting to move toward the pillar.

optionalfeature.name: The Law of Change
entries: Enemies with 10 feet cannot benefit from magical healing.
optionalfeature.effect: Enemies with 10 feet cannot benefit from magical healing.

optionalfeature.name: The Law of Time
entries: Enemies within 15 feet cannot take bonus actions or reactions.
optionalfeature.effect: Enemies within 15 feet cannot take bonus actions or reactions.

optionalfeature.name: Scent of Fear
entries: Enemies within 30 feet of the wendigo have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}.
optionalfeature.effect: Enemies within 30 feet of the wendigo have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}.

optionalfeature.name: Curse Aura
entries: Enemies within 5 feet of the cursed spirit have disadvantage on all saving throws.
optionalfeature.effect: Enemies within 5 feet of the cursed spirit have disadvantage on all saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Madness Aura
entries: Enemies within 60 feet who can see Uursovk make a successful {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw in order to cast a spell. Once a creature succeeds on this saving throw, it becomes immune to Uursovk's Madness Aura for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: Enemies within 60 feet who can see Uursovk make a successful {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw in order to cast a spell. Once a creature succeeds on this saving throw, it becomes immune to Uursovk's Madness Aura for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Enfeebling Arrow
entries: Enfeebling Arrow. The target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, or the damage dealt by its weapon attacks are halved until the start of the arcane archer's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Enfeebling Arrow. The target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, or the damage dealt by its weapon attacks are halved until the start of the arcane archer's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Lava Child Shaman
entries: Every band of lava children includes one arcane spellcaster.
optionalfeature.effect: Every band of lava children includes one arcane spellcaster.

optionalfeature.name: Ghost Flames
entries: Every creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of a kurok-spirit must make a successful {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage. The creature's maximum number of hit points is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage, and the kurok-spirit gains the same number of temporary hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: Every creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of a kurok-spirit must make a successful {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage. The creature's maximum number of hit points is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage, and the kurok-spirit gains the same number of temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Paralyzing Poison
entries: Every time a character is clawed by a feral undead cat, he or she must make a {@dc 8} Constitution saving throw. On the first failed save, the character becomes {@condition poisoned}; on the second failed save, the character becomes {@condition restrained}; and on the third failed save, the character becomes {@condition paralyzed}. Each effect lasts for {@dice 1d6 x 10} minutes, and the lengths add together as the character's condition worsens.
optionalfeature.effect: Every time a character is clawed by a feral undead cat, he or she must make a {@dc 8} Constitution saving throw. On the first failed save, the character becomes {@condition poisoned}; on the second failed save, the character becomes {@condition restrained}; and on the third failed save, the character becomes {@condition paralyzed}. Each effect lasts for {@dice 1d6 x 10} minutes, and the lengths add together as the character's condition worsens.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Spray
entries: Every time a draudnu takes piercing or slashing damage, all creatures within 5 feet of it take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage if the piercing or slashing damage is from a critical hit.
optionalfeature.effect: Every time a draudnu takes piercing or slashing damage, all creatures within 5 feet of it take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage if the piercing or slashing damage is from a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Magma Body
entries: Every time a magmoid is struck by a melee weapon, the weapon's wielder must make a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or the weapon is destroyed by the heat of the magmoid's body. Magical weapons and bludgeoning weapons have tactical advantage on the saving throw, piercing weapons have tactical disadvantage, and magical piercing weapons have neither advantage nor disadvantage. Missiles are destroyed automatically. Creatures that attack a magmoid unarmed or with natural weapons take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage each time one of their attacks hits.
optionalfeature.effect: Every time a magmoid is struck by a melee weapon, the weapon's wielder must make a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or the weapon is destroyed by the heat of the magmoid's body. Magical weapons and bludgeoning weapons have tactical advantage on the saving throw, piercing weapons have tactical disadvantage, and magical piercing weapons have neither advantage nor disadvantage. Missiles are destroyed automatically. Creatures that attack a magmoid unarmed or with natural weapons take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage each time one of their attacks hits.

optionalfeature.name: Diseased Ichor
entries: Every time Mechuiti takes piercing or slashing damage, a spray of caustic blood spurts from the wound toward the attacker. This spray forms a line 10 feet long and 5 feet wide. The first creature in the line must make a successful {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw against disease or be infected by Mechuiti's Ichor disease. The creature is {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must make a successful {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 2d4}). The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.
optionalfeature.effect: Every time Mechuiti takes piercing or slashing damage, a spray of caustic blood spurts from the wound toward the attacker. This spray forms a line 10 feet long and 5 feet wide. The first creature in the line must make a successful {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw against disease or be infected by Mechuiti's Ichor disease. The creature is {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must make a successful {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 2d4}). The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

optionalfeature.name: Diseased Ichor
entries: Every time the apau perape takes piercing or slashing damage, a spray of caustic blood spurts from the wound toward the attacker. This spray forms a line 10 feet long and 5 feet wide. The first creature in the line must make a successful {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw against disease or be infected by Mechuiti's Ichor disease. The creature is {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the Constitution saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 2d4}). The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.
