optionalfeature.name: Deceitful Nature
entries: The mortal traitor can use its bonus action to turn {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn or until it attacks, deal damage, or forces a creature to make a saving throw. Additionally, the mortal traitor can choose to ignore the disadvantage imposed by heavy armor when it makes a Dexterity (Stealth) check.
optionalfeature.effect: The mortal traitor can use its bonus action to turn {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn or until it attacks, deal damage, or forces a creature to make a saving throw. Additionally, the mortal traitor can choose to ignore the disadvantage imposed by heavy armor when it makes a Dexterity (Stealth) check.

optionalfeature.name: Mushroom Hunter
entries: The mosswine advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell when hunting mushrooms.
optionalfeature.effect: The mosswine advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell when hunting mushrooms.

optionalfeature.name: Detect Blasphemy
entries: The most common variety of suturefly attacks any creature that blasphemes aloud, which it can detect at a range of 100 feet unless the blasphemer makes a successful {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: The most common variety of suturefly attacks any creature that blasphemes aloud, which it can detect at a range of 100 feet unless the blasphemer makes a successful {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Mountain Master
entries: The mountain giant can move and shape the terrain around it. This trait works like the move earth spell, except it has no duration, and the giant can manipulate any stone, natural or worked.
optionalfeature.effect: The mountain giant can move and shape the terrain around it. This trait works like the move earth spell, except it has no duration, and the giant can manipulate any stone, natural or worked.

optionalfeature.name: Speak With Rodents
entries: The Mouse King can communicate with rodents as if they shared a language.
optionalfeature.effect: The Mouse King can communicate with rodents as if they shared a language.

optionalfeature.name: Magic Sensitive
entries: The naina detects magic as if it were permanently under the effect of a detect magic spell.
optionalfeature.effect: The naina detects magic as if it were permanently under the effect of a detect magic spell.

optionalfeature.name: Surround
entries: The najarala can freely enter a large or smaller creatures space. If the creature is within the inner space of the najarala it is surrounded. A surrounded creature is trapped (escape {@dc 17}) by the najarala's body. A creature can also escape by flying or burrowing out of the area.
optionalfeature.effect: The najarala can freely enter a large or smaller creatures space. If the creature is within the inner space of the najarala it is surrounded. A surrounded creature is trapped (escape {@dc 17}) by the najarala's body. A creature can also escape by flying or burrowing out of the area.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The nakarkos exhales a beam of fire in a 90-foot line that is 10-feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 50 ({@damage 9d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: The nakarkos exhales a beam of fire in a 90-foot line that is 10-feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 50 ({@damage 9d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Bone Tentacles
entries: The nakarkos has two tentacles (Size. Large, AC 22, HP 30). Damaging a bone tentacle deals no damage to the nakarkos. When a bone tentacle reaches 0 hit points, it becomes a Broken Tentacle. As a bonus action, the tentacles retract underground and reappear in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of the narkarkos body.
optionalfeature.effect: The nakarkos has two tentacles (Size. Large, AC 22, HP 30). Damaging a bone tentacle deals no damage to the nakarkos. When a bone tentacle reaches 0 hit points, it becomes a Broken Tentacle. As a bonus action, the tentacles retract underground and reappear in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of the narkarkos body.

optionalfeature.name: True Face
entries: The Nakarkos is sunken into the ground, revealing only its body parts that are covered in dragon bone giving the appearance that it has "two heads" but nakarkos's true head is hidden away underground. When the nakarkos is below half of its maximum hit points (131), it will reveal its unprotected true face reducing its AC by 2 and replacing its multiattack and fire beam with.
optionalfeature.effect: The Nakarkos is sunken into the ground, revealing only its body parts that are covered in dragon bone giving the appearance that it has "two heads" but nakarkos's true head is hidden away underground. When the nakarkos is below half of its maximum hit points (131), it will reveal its unprotected true face reducing its AC by 2 and replacing its multiattack and fire beam with.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Weapons
entries: The navigator's weapon attacks are magical. When the navigator hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 5d8} cold damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: The navigator's weapon attacks are magical. When the navigator hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 5d8} cold damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Fey Resilience
entries: The nekker has advantage on saving throws against illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed} and magic can't put the nekker to sleep.
optionalfeature.effect: The nekker has advantage on saving throws against illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed} and magic can't put the nekker to sleep.

optionalfeature.name: Mental Fortitude
entries: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.
optionalfeature.effect: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

optionalfeature.name: Spiked Regrowth
entries: The nergigante has spikes covering its body, granting it +2 AC. These spikes regrow at the start of the nergigante's turn if they are lost. After using an action or legendary action, the nergigante can use its spiked explosion as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: The nergigante has spikes covering its body, granting it +2 AC. These spikes regrow at the start of the nergigante's turn if they are lost. After using an action or legendary action, the nergigante can use its spiked explosion as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Spiked Regrowth
entries: The nergigante has spikes covering its body. When used, broken, or removed in any way; the spikes regrow instantly.
optionalfeature.effect: The nergigante has spikes covering its body. When used, broken, or removed in any way; the spikes regrow instantly.

optionalfeature.name: Elephants' Bane
entries: The ngobou has advantage on attacks against elephants. It can detect by scent whether an elephant has been within 180 feet of its location anytime in the last 48 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: The ngobou has advantage on attacks against elephants. It can detect by scent whether an elephant has been within 180 feet of its location anytime in the last 48 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Tremulous
entries: The nian is inherently fearful of loud noises, fire, and the color red. It will not choose to move toward any red object or any fiery or burning materials. If presented forcefully with a red object, flame, or if it is dealt fire or thunder damage, the nian must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. After it has been {@condition frightened} by a specific red object or a particular source of noise (such as clanging a weapon on a shield) or fire (such as the burning hands spell), the nian can't be {@condition frightened} by that same source again for 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: The nian is inherently fearful of loud noises, fire, and the color red. It will not choose to move toward any red object or any fiery or burning materials. If presented forcefully with a red object, flame, or if it is dealt fire or thunder damage, the nian must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. After it has been {@condition frightened} by a specific red object or a particular source of noise (such as clanging a weapon on a shield) or fire (such as the burning hands spell), the nian can't be {@condition frightened} by that same source again for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Utterly Silent
entries: The nightgaunt doesn't make a sound and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The nightgaunt doesn't make a sound and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.
optionalfeature.effect: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

optionalfeature.name: Aquatic
entries: The ningyo can breathe only underwater and can hold its breath for 1 hour.
optionalfeature.effect: The ningyo can breathe only underwater and can hold its breath for 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Fey-Touched
entries: The noble can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The noble also has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The noble can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The noble also has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Rock Stance
entries: The norker has advantage on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution saving throws while standing on a natural stone surface.
optionalfeature.effect: The norker has advantage on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution saving throws while standing on a natural stone surface.

optionalfeature.name: Inner Alchemy
entries: The numerical effects and duration of potions (such as a potion of healing or a potion of speed) used by the experimenter are doubled.
optionalfeature.effect: The numerical effects and duration of potions (such as a potion of healing or a potion of speed) used by the experimenter are doubled.

optionalfeature.name: Armory Exploit
entries: The objects that make up the golem's body can be removed or destroyed. With the exception of the slam attack, an attacker can choose to disable one of the armory golem's attacks on a critical hit. Alternatively, the attacker can attempt to destroy the golem's focus instead of disabling one of its attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: The objects that make up the golem's body can be removed or destroyed. With the exception of the slam attack, an attacker can choose to disable one of the armory golem's attacks on a critical hit. Alternatively, the attacker can attempt to destroy the golem's focus instead of disabling one of its attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Bowler
entries: The objects that the ogre hurler throws have so much momentum they travel an additional 15 feet in a straight line past their landing point. Each creature in the path of the thrown object must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage.
optionalfeature.effect: The objects that the ogre hurler throws have so much momentum they travel an additional 15 feet in a straight line past their landing point. Each creature in the path of the thrown object must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Mimetic Skin
entries: The obscuroth is {@condition invisible} while in dim light or darkness.
optionalfeature.effect: The obscuroth is {@condition invisible} while in dim light or darkness.

optionalfeature.name: Formless
entries: The obyrith can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
optionalfeature.effect: The obyrith can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

optionalfeature.name: Immense Swing
entries: The ogre berserker can hit up to 2 Medium or smaller targets within 10 feet of each other with each flail attack. A separate attack roll is made for each target.
optionalfeature.effect: The ogre berserker can hit up to 2 Medium or smaller targets within 10 feet of each other with each flail attack. A separate attack roll is made for each target.

optionalfeature.name: Extra Nimble
entries: The okiti sneak can move through spaces occupied by Medium or larger creatures. Doing so doesn't provoke an opportunity attack.
optionalfeature.effect: The okiti sneak can move through spaces occupied by Medium or larger creatures. Doing so doesn't provoke an opportunity attack.

optionalfeature.name: Symbiotically Bound
entries: The ooze and the giant shark's life forces have been entwined by an arcane force. They share statistics as if they were one monster and can't be separated.
optionalfeature.effect: The ooze and the giant shark's life forces have been entwined by an arcane force. They share statistics as if they were one monster and can't be separated.

optionalfeature.name: Overdraw
entries: The orc archer can use a bonus action before they attack to add {@dice 1d4} to their damage on a successful attack with their bow.
optionalfeature.effect: The orc archer can use a bonus action before they attack to add {@dice 1d4} to their damage on a successful attack with their bow.

optionalfeature.name: Spirit-Bonded Mind
entries: The orc can cast speak with animals at will, but can only communicate with wolves.
optionalfeature.effect: The orc can cast speak with animals at will, but can only communicate with wolves.

optionalfeature.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).
optionalfeature.effect: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).
optionalfeature.effect: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Gruumsh's Pain
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage when it hits with a weapon attack(included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage when it hits with a weapon attack(included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).
optionalfeature.effect: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).
optionalfeature.effect: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Paladin Of Shoth
entries: The oth derives its power from Shoth itself, its zom shining with sacred light. Its Armor Class increases by 2. A non-shoth creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the oth must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition blinded} by the light of Shoth until the end of its turn.
optionalfeature.effect: The oth derives its power from Shoth itself, its zom shining with sacred light. Its Armor Class increases by 2. A non-shoth creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the oth must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition blinded} by the light of Shoth until the end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Dissonance
entries: The owl harpy can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.
optionalfeature.effect: The owl harpy can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

optionalfeature.name: Luck/Unluck (3/Day)
entries: The owner of a golden cat can reroll one die and take the most favorable result, provided the golden cat is within 40 feet of its owner. Only one reroll is allowed per round. This ability is a power of the cat, which responds to its owner's telepathic request for luck. There is a downside, however. Each time the golden cat grants luck (a reroll) to its owner, it saps a bit of luck from other, nearby creatures. All other creatures (including the owner's allies) within 40 feet of the golden cat have tactical disadvantage on their first attack roll or ability check for one round.
optionalfeature.effect: The owner of a golden cat can reroll one die and take the most favorable result, provided the golden cat is within 40 feet of its owner. Only one reroll is allowed per round. This ability is a power of the cat, which responds to its owner's telepathic request for luck. There is a downside, however. Each time the golden cat grants luck (a reroll) to its owner, it saps a bit of luck from other, nearby creatures. All other creatures (including the owner's allies) within 40 feet of the golden cat have tactical disadvantage on their first attack roll or ability check for one round.

optionalfeature.name: Emissary of Redemption
entries: The paladin's resistances don't function against creatures it has attacked or targeted with a spell since the last dawn.
optionalfeature.effect: The paladin's resistances don't function against creatures it has attacked or targeted with a spell since the last dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Divination
entries: The peddler provides good advice or a correct answer to one question asked of him by a creature who buys something from his cart. This ability functions similarly to a divination spell.
optionalfeature.effect: The peddler provides good advice or a correct answer to one question asked of him by a creature who buys something from his cart. This ability functions similarly to a divination spell.

optionalfeature.name: Quill Regrowth
entries: The peluda has 24 large, spiny quills and dozens of smaller ones. It uses a large quill every time it makes a quill attack or a creature is successfully damaged by its Spiky Hide. Used quills regrow when it finishes a long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: The peluda has 24 large, spiny quills and dozens of smaller ones. It uses a large quill every time it makes a quill attack or a creature is successfully damaged by its Spiky Hide. Used quills regrow when it finishes a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Mistform Movement
entries: The phane can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. It can move through any opening smaller than itself as if it were difficult terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: The phane can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. It can move through any opening smaller than itself as if it were difficult terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Rapid Movement
entries: The phargion can curl up into a wheel (no action required). While curled up this way, its AC increases to 17 and its speed to 50 ft. It cannot attack while in this form. It can use a bonus action to uncurl again.
optionalfeature.effect: The phargion can curl up into a wheel (no action required). While curled up this way, its AC increases to 17 and its speed to 50 ft. It cannot attack while in this form. It can use a bonus action to uncurl again.

optionalfeature.name: Persistent Burning Form
entries: The philosopher's ghost can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the ghost or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the philosopher's ghost can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
optionalfeature.effect: The philosopher's ghost can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the ghost or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the philosopher's ghost can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Born of Fire
entries: The phoenix radiates sunlight in a 60-foot radius, and dim light a further 180 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: The phoenix radiates sunlight in a 60-foot radius, and dim light a further 180 feet.

optionalfeature.name: The Fire Is Alive
entries: The phoenix regenerates {@dice 3d12} hit points at the start of each round.
optionalfeature.effect: The phoenix regenerates {@dice 3d12} hit points at the start of each round.

optionalfeature.name: Dazzling Plumage
entries: The Phoenix's feathers cycle through every color in the rainbow. Evil creatures who begin their turn within 60 feet of the Defender of All the Earth and who do not explicitly avert their gaze must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of their next turn. {@condition Charmed} targets are {@condition stunned}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the phoenix's Dazzling Plumage for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: The Phoenix's feathers cycle through every color in the rainbow. Evil creatures who begin their turn within 60 feet of the Defender of All the Earth and who do not explicitly avert their gaze must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of their next turn. {@condition Charmed} targets are {@condition stunned}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the phoenix's Dazzling Plumage for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Segmented Tail
entries: The piasa's spiked tail is segmented and up to three times the length of its body. When the piasa takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, a segment of its tail is severed.
optionalfeature.effect: The piasa's spiked tail is segmented and up to three times the length of its body. When the piasa takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, a segment of its tail is severed.

optionalfeature.name: Sense of Direction
entries: The pigeon has an innate sense of direction and can always determine the direction it came from. It can only use this ability navigate by geographical direction and not trace its way through a maze or other complex series of twists and turns.
optionalfeature.effect: The pigeon has an innate sense of direction and can always determine the direction it came from. It can only use this ability navigate by geographical direction and not trace its way through a maze or other complex series of twists and turns.

optionalfeature.name: Mental Agility
entries: The pillar uses its Intelligence instead of its Dexterity to determine its place in the initiative order.
optionalfeature.effect: The pillar uses its Intelligence instead of its Dexterity to determine its place in the initiative order.

optionalfeature.name: Weapon Juggler
entries: The pirate can draw and wield up to three one-handed weapons.
optionalfeature.effect: The pirate can draw and wield up to three one-handed weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Consume Treasure
entries: The pixiu has an appetite for gold, silver, and jewels and consumes them whenever possible. If the pixiu attempts to eat a magical coin, gemstone, or piece of jewelry, the object has a 25% chance of breaking, dispelling its magic and rendering it useless. If the object doesn't break, the pixiu gives up trying to eat it.
optionalfeature.effect: The pixiu has an appetite for gold, silver, and jewels and consumes them whenever possible. If the pixiu attempts to eat a magical coin, gemstone, or piece of jewelry, the object has a 25% chance of breaking, dispelling its magic and rendering it useless. If the object doesn't break, the pixiu gives up trying to eat it.

optionalfeature.name: Protector Of Qi
entries: The pixiu is immune to disease and to effects that would lower its maximum hp. In addition, each ally within 10 feet of the pixiu has advantage on saving throws against disease and is immune to effects that would lower its maximum hp.
optionalfeature.effect: The pixiu is immune to disease and to effects that would lower its maximum hp. In addition, each ally within 10 feet of the pixiu has advantage on saving throws against disease and is immune to effects that would lower its maximum hp.

optionalfeature.name: Hyena Form
entries: The plains gnoll shaman can use its action to change into a spotted hyena (p. 161). Its statistics, other than Intelligence and Wisdom, change to those of a spotted hyena. While in hyena form, if the shaman's hit points are reduced to 0 it will change back into gnoll form with the same hit points it had before it transformed. Any additional damage from the attack is carried over to its gnoll form. It can also use its action to shift back into its gnoll form if it chooses.
optionalfeature.effect: The plains gnoll shaman can use its action to change into a spotted hyena (p. 161). Its statistics, other than Intelligence and Wisdom, change to those of a spotted hyena. While in hyena form, if the shaman's hit points are reduced to 0 it will change back into gnoll form with the same hit points it had before it transformed. Any additional damage from the attack is carried over to its gnoll form. It can also use its action to shift back into its gnoll form if it chooses.

optionalfeature.name: Grinding Maws
entries: The plaresh can burrow through harder substances such as wood, stone, or even metal. While doing so its burrow speed is reduced to half, and it creates a cluster of bore holes that leaves the material porous and weak. The material has 5 to its AC and half the usual hp.
optionalfeature.effect: The plaresh can burrow through harder substances such as wood, stone, or even metal. While doing so its burrow speed is reduced to half, and it creates a cluster of bore holes that leaves the material porous and weak. The material has 5 to its AC and half the usual hp.

optionalfeature.name: Beast's Voice
entries: The pombero can magically speak with any beast and can perfectly mimic beast sounds.
optionalfeature.effect: The pombero can magically speak with any beast and can perfectly mimic beast sounds.

optionalfeature.name: Twisted Limbs
entries: The pombero can twist and squeeze itself through a space small enough for a Tiny bird to pass through as if it were difficult terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: The pombero can twist and squeeze itself through a space small enough for a Tiny bird to pass through as if it were difficult terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Soft Step
entries: The pombero has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in forest terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: The pombero has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in forest terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Cloak of Shadows (Recharge After a Short or Long Rest).
entries: The priest becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn, or until it casts a spell.
optionalfeature.effect: The priest becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn, or until it casts a spell.

optionalfeature.name: Preserve Life (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The priest targets up to six creatures it can see within 30 feet. The priest heals these creatures, dividing up 30 hit points between them.
optionalfeature.effect: The priest targets up to six creatures it can see within 30 feet. The priest heals these creatures, dividing up 30 hit points between them.

optionalfeature.name: Morbid Weapons
entries: The priest's weapon attacks are magical. When the priest hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: The priest's weapon attacks are magical. When the priest hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Guardian Soul
entries: The primeval guardian gains 10 temporary hit points at the beginning of each of its turns.
optionalfeature.effect: The primeval guardian gains 10 temporary hit points at the beginning of each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Door (4/Day)
entries: The psoglav has the ability to travel between shadows as if by means of a dimension door spell. The magical transport must begin and end in an area with at least some dim light. The shadow door can span a maximum of 90 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: The psoglav has the ability to travel between shadows as if by means of a dimension door spell. The magical transport must begin and end in an area with at least some dim light. The shadow door can span a maximum of 90 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Speak With Birds
entries: The Queen of Birds can communicate with birds as if they shared a language.
optionalfeature.effect: The Queen of Birds can communicate with birds as if they shared a language.

optionalfeature.name: Storm Strike Weapons
entries: The Queen of Birds' weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra {@dice 2d8} damage of her choice of lightning or thunder damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: The Queen of Birds' weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra {@dice 2d8} damage of her choice of lightning or thunder damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Bestowal Of Trust
entries: The Queen of Serpents can grant a single creature a +1 enhancement to Wisdom which lasts until the creature harms a reptile of any kind. Only one creature may have this enhancement at any time.
optionalfeature.effect: The Queen of Serpents can grant a single creature a +1 enhancement to Wisdom which lasts until the creature harms a reptile of any kind. Only one creature may have this enhancement at any time.

optionalfeature.name: Melancholic Emanation
entries: The quiet soul emits a magical aura of lethargy and despondency. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the quiet soul must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: The quiet soul emits a magical aura of lethargy and despondency. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the quiet soul must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Nauseating Aura
entries: The qwyllion is nauseatingly corrupt. Any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the qwyllion must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 1d8} rounds. If a creature that's already {@condition poisoned} by this effect fails the saving throw again, it becomes {@condition incapacitated} instead, and a creature already {@condition incapacitated} by the qwyllion drops to 0 hit points if it fails the saving throw. A successful saving throw renders a creature immune to the effect for 24 hours. Creatures dominated by the qwyllion are immune to this effect.
optionalfeature.effect: The qwyllion is nauseatingly corrupt. Any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the qwyllion must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 1d8} rounds. If a creature that's already {@condition poisoned} by this effect fails the saving throw again, it becomes {@condition incapacitated} instead, and a creature already {@condition incapacitated} by the qwyllion drops to 0 hit points if it fails the saving throw. A successful saving throw renders a creature immune to the effect for 24 hours. Creatures dominated by the qwyllion are immune to this effect.

optionalfeature.name: Bone Armor
entries: The Radobaan is covered in the bones of fallen creatures granting it +4 AC. When the radobaan takes more than 30 damage in a single turn, the bones snap and break reducing the bonus AC by 1.
optionalfeature.effect: The Radobaan is covered in the bones of fallen creatures granting it +4 AC. When the radobaan takes more than 30 damage in a single turn, the bones snap and break reducing the bonus AC by 1.

optionalfeature.name: Ambush (Ambusher only, 1/Turn)
entries: The rageborn deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll.
optionalfeature.effect: The rageborn deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The rageipede has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while in forests and tall grass.
optionalfeature.effect: The rageipede has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while in forests and tall grass.

optionalfeature.name: Beast Bond
entries: The ranger can cast beast bond at will, requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability for it is Wisdom.
optionalfeature.effect: The ranger can cast beast bond at will, requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability for it is Wisdom.

optionalfeature.name: Fey-Touched
entries: The ranger can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The ranger also has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The ranger can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The ranger also has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Rat Telepathy
entries: The rat hermit can magically command any rat within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.
optionalfeature.effect: The rat hermit can magically command any rat within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

optionalfeature.name: Plague of Ill Omen
entries: The rat king radiates a magical aura of misfortune in a 30-foot radius. A foe of the rat king that starts its turn in the aura must make a successful {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed with bad luck until the start of its next turn. When a cursed character makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it must subtract {@dice 1d4} from the result.
optionalfeature.effect: The rat king radiates a magical aura of misfortune in a 30-foot radius. A foe of the rat king that starts its turn in the aura must make a successful {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed with bad luck until the start of its next turn. When a cursed character makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it must subtract {@dice 1d4} from the result.

optionalfeature.name: Skitter
entries: The ratatosk can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
optionalfeature.effect: The ratatosk can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Warlord Skitter
entries: The ratatosk warlord can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
optionalfeature.effect: The ratatosk warlord can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Chopper Squad
entries: The ratfolk mercenary's melee weapon attacks deal one extra die of damage if at least one of the mercenary's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: The ratfolk mercenary's melee weapon attacks deal one extra die of damage if at least one of the mercenary's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Green Walk
entries: The ravenala can move across undergrowth, natural or magical, without needing to make an ability check and without expending additional movement.
optionalfeature.effect: The ravenala can move across undergrowth, natural or magical, without needing to make an ability check and without expending additional movement.

optionalfeature.name: Raven Speech
entries: The ravenspeaker can speak with ravens and other types of crow birds as if under the constant effect of a speak with animals spell.
optionalfeature.effect: The ravenspeaker can speak with ravens and other types of crow birds as if under the constant effect of a speak with animals spell.

optionalfeature.name: Call Murder
entries: The ravenspeaker can use its action to summon a swarm of ravens. This swarm uses the normal statistics for a swarm of ravens except that it is a Large swarm, has a challenge rating of 3, 72 hit points ({@dice 16d10 - 16}) and its beaks deal 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@dice 3d6}) if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The swarm appears anywhere within 60 feet of the ravenspeaker. It acts on the ravenspeaker's initiative and obeys the ravenspeaker's commands. The swarm lasts until the ravenspeaker dismisses it at any point during one of its turns (no action required). If the swarm has taken damage before it was dismissed it returns the next time the ravenspeaker summons it with that many hit points plus {@dice 1d8} hit points for every full hour it has been dismissed. If the swarm of ravens is destroyed, the ravenspeaker cannot summon it again for 24 hours, after which the swarm can be summoned again at full health. If the ravenspeaker is knocked {@condition unconscious} or dies, the swarm automatically scatters and disappears. Raven's flight. As a bonus action the ravenspeaker can sprout a pair of large ghostly raven wings, gaining a 50-foot fly speed, while in darkness or dim light. It can dismiss the wings at any time (no action required).
optionalfeature.effect: The ravenspeaker can use its action to summon a swarm of ravens. This swarm uses the normal statistics for a swarm of ravens except that it is a Large swarm, has a challenge rating of 3, 72 hit points ({@dice 16d10 - 16}) and its beaks deal 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@dice 3d6}) if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The swarm appears anywhere within 60 feet of the ravenspeaker. It acts on the ravenspeaker's initiative and obeys the ravenspeaker's commands. The swarm lasts until the ravenspeaker dismisses it at any point during one of its turns (no action required). If the swarm has taken damage before it was dismissed it returns the next time the ravenspeaker summons it with that many hit points plus {@dice 1d8} hit points for every full hour it has been dismissed. If the swarm of ravens is destroyed, the ravenspeaker cannot summon it again for 24 hours, after which the swarm can be summoned again at full health. If the ravenspeaker is knocked {@condition unconscious} or dies, the swarm automatically scatters and disappears. Raven's flight. As a bonus action the ravenspeaker can sprout a pair of large ghostly raven wings, gaining a 50-foot fly speed, while in darkness or dim light. It can dismiss the wings at any time (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Strike from Shadow
entries: The reach of the umbral vampire's umbral grasp attack increases by 10 feet and its damage increases by {@dice 4d6} when both the umbral vampire and the target of the attack are in dim light or darkness and the umbral vampire is hidden from its target.
optionalfeature.effect: The reach of the umbral vampire's umbral grasp attack increases by 10 feet and its damage increases by {@dice 4d6} when both the umbral vampire and the target of the attack are in dim light or darkness and the umbral vampire is hidden from its target.

optionalfeature.name: Fey-Touched
entries: The reaver can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The reaver also has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The reaver can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The reaver also has advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Folding Figure
entries: The record-hunter can fold itself into an origami figure of any shape or creature. Its statistics remain the same in any form.
optionalfeature.effect: The record-hunter can fold itself into an origami figure of any shape or creature. Its statistics remain the same in any form.

optionalfeature.name: Solid Kick
entries: The redcap can kick a creature within 5 feet as a bonus action. The kicked creature must make a successful {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.
optionalfeature.effect: The redcap can kick a creature within 5 feet as a bonus action. The kicked creature must make a successful {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Agile Movement
entries: The redcap can use the Disengage action as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: The redcap can use the Disengage action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Clomping Boots
entries: The redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Red Cap
entries: The redcap must soak its cap in the blood of a humanoid killed no more than an hour ago at least once every three days. If it goes more than 72 hours without doing so, the blood on its cap dries and the redcap gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} every 24 hours. While the cap is dry, the redcap can't remove {@condition exhaustion} by any means. All levels of {@condition exhaustion} are removed immediately when the redcap soaks its cap in fresh blood. A redcap that dies as a result of this {@condition exhaustion} crumbles to dust.
optionalfeature.effect: The redcap must soak its cap in the blood of a humanoid killed no more than an hour ago at least once every three days. If it goes more than 72 hours without doing so, the blood on its cap dries and the redcap gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} every 24 hours. While the cap is dry, the redcap can't remove {@condition exhaustion} by any means. All levels of {@condition exhaustion} are removed immediately when the redcap soaks its cap in fresh blood. A redcap that dies as a result of this {@condition exhaustion} crumbles to dust.

optionalfeature.name: Lava Camouflage
entries: The redspawn firebelcher has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in lava or fery terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: The redspawn firebelcher has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in lava or fery terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Weapons
entries: The rider's weapon attacks are magical. When the rider hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 3d8} cold damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: The rider's weapon attacks are magical. When the rider hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 3d8} cold damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: Life Sense
entries: The risen reaver automatically detects all living creatures within 120 feet. This sense is blocked by 3 feet of wood, 1 foot of earth or stone, an inch of metal, or a thin sheet of lead.
optionalfeature.effect: The risen reaver automatically detects all living creatures within 120 feet. This sense is blocked by 3 feet of wood, 1 foot of earth or stone, an inch of metal, or a thin sheet of lead.

optionalfeature.name: Fey Flame
entries: The ritual powering a monolith champion grants it an inner flame that it can use to enhance its weapon or its fists with additional fire or cold damage, depending on the construct's needs.
optionalfeature.effect: The ritual powering a monolith champion grants it an inner flame that it can use to enhance its weapon or its fists with additional fire or cold damage, depending on the construct's needs.

optionalfeature.name: Fey Flame
entries: The ritual powering a monolith footman grants it an inner flame that it can use to enhance its weapon or its fists with additional fire or cold damage, depending on the construct's needs.
optionalfeature.effect: The ritual powering a monolith footman grants it an inner flame that it can use to enhance its weapon or its fists with additional fire or cold damage, depending on the construct's needs.

optionalfeature.name: Resistant
entries: The roachling skirmisher has advantage on Constitution saving throws.
optionalfeature.effect: The roachling skirmisher has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Rocky Camouflage
entries: The rock gnoll shaman has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in rocky terrain.
optionalfeature.effect: The rock gnoll shaman has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in rocky terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Cloud of Despair
entries: The rotfiend constantly releases a miasma that inflicts tremendous pain. Enemies that start their turn within 30 feet of the rotfiend must make a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw, gaining disadvantage on saving throws for one round and taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The rotfiend has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that failed this saving throw on their last turn.
optionalfeature.effect: The rotfiend constantly releases a miasma that inflicts tremendous pain. Enemies that start their turn within 30 feet of the rotfiend must make a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw, gaining disadvantage on saving throws for one round and taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The rotfiend has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that failed this saving throw on their last turn.

optionalfeature.name: False Tongue
entries: The rubezahl has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks, and magical attempts to discern lies always report that the rubezahl's words are true.
optionalfeature.effect: The rubezahl has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks, and magical attempts to discern lies always report that the rubezahl's words are true.

optionalfeature.name: Universal Beauty
entries: The rusalka appears different and uniquely beautiful to match the tastes of each humanoid that perceives it. Truesight reveals the rusalka's true undead form.
optionalfeature.effect: The rusalka appears different and uniquely beautiful to match the tastes of each humanoid that perceives it. Truesight reveals the rusalka's true undead form.

optionalfeature.name: Goader
entries: The rutterkin has advantage on attack rolls against creatures {@condition grappled} with its snap-tong.
optionalfeature.effect: The rutterkin has advantage on attack rolls against creatures {@condition grappled} with its snap-tong.

optionalfeature.name: Sacred Duty
entries: The sammael angel can use its bonus action to shift its purpose between Destructor, Executioner, and Punisher.
optionalfeature.effect: The sammael angel can use its bonus action to shift its purpose between Destructor, Executioner, and Punisher.

optionalfeature.name: Scorpion Step
entries: The sand hag walks lightly across sandy surfaces, never sinking into soft sand or leaving tracks. When in sand terrain, the sand hag ignores difficult terrain, doesn't leave tracks, and gains tremorsense 30 ft.
optionalfeature.effect: The sand hag walks lightly across sandy surfaces, never sinking into soft sand or leaving tracks. When in sand terrain, the sand hag ignores difficult terrain, doesn't leave tracks, and gains tremorsense 30 ft.

optionalfeature.name: Sand Glide
entries: The sand silhouette can burrow through nonmagical, loose sand without disturbing the material it is moving through. It is {@condition invisible} while burrowing this way.
optionalfeature.effect: The sand silhouette can burrow through nonmagical, loose sand without disturbing the material it is moving through. It is {@condition invisible} while burrowing this way.

optionalfeature.name: Sand Form
entries: The sand silhouette can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
optionalfeature.effect: The sand silhouette can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

optionalfeature.name: Agonizing Aura
entries: The sathaq worms' presence induces pain in creatures native to the Material Plane. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sathaq worm must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw succeeds, it is immune to the sathaq worm's Agonizing Aura for the next 24 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: The sathaq worms' presence induces pain in creatures native to the Material Plane. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sathaq worm must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw succeeds, it is immune to the sathaq worm's Agonizing Aura for the next 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Verses of Rebirth
entries: The satyr can recite the verses of rebirth while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the verses regains the maximum number of hit points possible if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest and makes all Constitution saving throws with advantage for 24 hours. The satyr can confer this benefit on himself as well. All plants in a half-mile radius centered on the satyr become enriched for 1 year. The plants yield twice the normal amount of food when harvested and grow twice as fast.
optionalfeature.effect: The satyr can recite the verses of rebirth while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the verses regains the maximum number of hit points possible if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest and makes all Constitution saving throws with advantage for 24 hours. The satyr can confer this benefit on himself as well. All plants in a half-mile radius centered on the satyr become enriched for 1 year. The plants yield twice the normal amount of food when harvested and grow twice as fast.

optionalfeature.name: Faun Resilience
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells and other magical effects.
optionalfeature.effect: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells and other magical effects.

optionalfeature.name: Bag of Amber
entries: The satyr possesses a bag of amber beads, collected from the sap of ancestral treants in the Feywild. He can use the amber beads as a bag of beans, choosing the effect he wants. If the bag is lost or destroyed, the satyr must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only an amber father satyr can use a bag of amber.
optionalfeature.effect: The satyr possesses a bag of amber beads, collected from the sap of ancestral treants in the Feywild. He can use the amber beads as a bag of beans, choosing the effect he wants. If the bag is lost or destroyed, the satyr must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only an amber father satyr can use a bag of amber.

optionalfeature.name: Guerilla Fighter
entries: The scout has advantage on initiative checks. The scout can ignore the limitation of 1 use of sneak attack per turn if it hits additional enemies it has surprised on the first turn of combat; it can apply sneak attack once to each enemy.
optionalfeature.effect: The scout has advantage on initiative checks. The scout can ignore the limitation of 1 use of sneak attack per turn if it hits additional enemies it has surprised on the first turn of combat; it can apply sneak attack once to each enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Scourge Of The Seekers
entries: The sentinel has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with darkvision, blindsight, or truesight.
optionalfeature.effect: The sentinel has advantage on attack rolls against creatures with darkvision, blindsight, or truesight.

optionalfeature.name: Vigilant
entries: The Seraph cannot be flanked or surprised.
optionalfeature.effect: The Seraph cannot be flanked or surprised.

optionalfeature.name: Bladed Scales Regrowth
entries: The seregios has fourty-eight bladed scales. Used scales regrow when the seregios finishes a long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: The seregios has fourty-eight bladed scales. Used scales regrow when the seregios finishes a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Action
entries: The serpentir may use an additional action on each of its turns and gains an additional reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: The serpentir may use an additional action on each of its turns and gains an additional reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Sinuous Strikeback
entries: The serpopard can take any number of reactions in a round, but it can react only once to each trigger.
optionalfeature.effect: The serpopard can take any number of reactions in a round, but it can react only once to each trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Domestic Retainer
entries: The servant can cast the mending and prestidigitation cantrips at will without requiring spell components.
optionalfeature.effect: The servant can cast the mending and prestidigitation cantrips at will without requiring spell components.

optionalfeature.name: Inspire Artistry (3/Day)
entries: The servant of the vine selects up to 6 creatures within 50 feet and grants them advantage to Dexterity (Acrobatics), Dexterity (Sleight of Hand), or Charisma (Performance) checks. The servant of the vine chooses which skill for each recipient.
optionalfeature.effect: The servant of the vine selects up to 6 creatures within 50 feet and grants them advantage to Dexterity (Acrobatics), Dexterity (Sleight of Hand), or Charisma (Performance) checks. The servant of the vine chooses which skill for each recipient.

optionalfeature.name: Crystalline Skin
entries: The serym has resistance to damage from spells and advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
optionalfeature.effect: The serym has resistance to damage from spells and advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

optionalfeature.name: Spawn Headling
entries: The severed head of a zmey grows into a zmey headling {@dice 2d6} rounds after being separated from the body. Smearing at least a pound of salt on the severed head's stump prevents this transformation.
optionalfeature.effect: The severed head of a zmey grows into a zmey headling {@dice 2d6} rounds after being separated from the body. Smearing at least a pound of salt on the severed head's stump prevents this transformation.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Lurker
entries: The shadar-kai has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in dark or shadowy conditions.
optionalfeature.effect: The shadar-kai has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in dark or shadowy conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Gal-Ralan
entries: The shadar-kai wears a gal-ralan, the Constitution penalty is already included in its statistics. Hide in Plain Sight. As long as it is not illuminated by sunlight or a daylight spell, the shadar-kai can hide without having anything granting it concealment.
optionalfeature.effect: The shadar-kai wears a gal-ralan, the Constitution penalty is already included in its statistics. Hide in Plain Sight. As long as it is not illuminated by sunlight or a daylight spell, the shadar-kai can hide without having anything granting it concealment.

optionalfeature.name: Shade Weaknesses
entries: The shade has the following flaws:
optionalfeature.effect: The shade has the following flaws:

optionalfeature.name: Howling Hatred
entries: The shade host emits a horrific howl while it can see any living creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the shade host and can hear the howl must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: The shade host emits a horrific howl while it can see any living creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the shade host and can hear the howl must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Shade Host Weaknesses
entries: The shade host has the following flaws:
optionalfeature.effect: The shade host has the following flaws:

optionalfeature.name: Shadow's Vigil
entries: The shadow fey has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks, and magical darkness does not inhibit its darkvision.
optionalfeature.effect: The shadow fey has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks, and magical darkness does not inhibit its darkvision.

optionalfeature.name: Unseelie Blessing
entries: The shadow goblin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.
optionalfeature.effect: The shadow goblin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

optionalfeature.name: Ethereal Awareness
entries: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.
optionalfeature.effect: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

optionalfeature.name: Ethereal Awareness
entries: The shadow mastiff pack lord can see ethereal creatures and objects.
optionalfeature.effect: The shadow mastiff pack lord can see ethereal creatures and objects.

optionalfeature.name: Uncontrolled Metabolism
entries: The shah dalamadur have no control over their metabolism. At the start of its turn roll a {@dice d4};
optionalfeature.effect: The shah dalamadur have no control over their metabolism. At the start of its turn roll a {@dice d4};

optionalfeature.name: Boom Shakalaka
entries: The shakalaka leaves behind a small container when it flees or on its body when it dies. There is a 50 percent chance that the container is actually an explosive that contains no treasure. It is unlocked and requires a {@dc 12} Wisdom (Investigation) check to determine if it is an explosive. A creature that opens the an explosive container must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. A container that is not an explosive contains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) silver pieces worth of materials of the DMs choosing.
optionalfeature.effect: The shakalaka leaves behind a small container when it flees or on its body when it dies. There is a 50 percent chance that the container is actually an explosive that contains no treasure. It is unlocked and requires a {@dc 12} Wisdom (Investigation) check to determine if it is an explosive. A creature that opens the an explosive container must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. A container that is not an explosive contains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) silver pieces worth of materials of the DMs choosing.

optionalfeature.name: Well of Knowledge
entries: The shambling lord can recollect all the knowledges and memories stored in the collective hive mind of its hordes or the brains it devoured. It has advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom skill checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The shambling lord can recollect all the knowledges and memories stored in the collective hive mind of its hordes or the brains it devoured. It has advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom skill checks.

optionalfeature.name: Soft Rock
entries: The shara ishvalda is vulnerable to bludgeoning while it is {@condition prone}.
optionalfeature.effect: The shara ishvalda is vulnerable to bludgeoning while it is {@condition prone}.

optionalfeature.name: Shard Swarm (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The shardmind's form cascades into a swarm of swirling crystal shards momentarily. While in this form the shardmind gains a fly speed equal to its walking speed. At the end of its turn, the shardmind regains its regular, solid form.
optionalfeature.effect: The shardmind's form cascades into a swarm of swirling crystal shards momentarily. While in this form the shardmind gains a fly speed equal to its walking speed. At the end of its turn, the shardmind regains its regular, solid form.

optionalfeature.name: Ooze Fish Bowl
entries: The shark bowl takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but they are subjected to the bowl's Engulf and have disadvantage on the saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: The shark bowl takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but they are subjected to the bowl's Engulf and have disadvantage on the saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Stealthy Observer
entries: The shellycoat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide and any Perception checks that rely on hearing.
optionalfeature.effect: The shellycoat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide and any Perception checks that rely on hearing.

optionalfeature.name: Armored Legs
entries: The shen gaoren has 4 legs stretching 30 feet up. Each leg can be attacked (AC 16; 25 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons). Damaging a leg deals no damage to the shen gaoren. Reducing all four legs to 0 hit points causes the shen gaoren to immediately use its reaction to collaspse. 3 rounds after the shen gaoren uses collapse, its legs heal to their maximum hp and the shen gaoren can stand up.
optionalfeature.effect: The shen gaoren has 4 legs stretching 30 feet up. Each leg can be attacked (AC 16; 25 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons). Damaging a leg deals no damage to the shen gaoren. Reducing all four legs to 0 hit points causes the shen gaoren to immediately use its reaction to collaspse. 3 rounds after the shen gaoren uses collapse, its legs heal to their maximum hp and the shen gaoren can stand up.

optionalfeature.name: Lao Shun Skull
entries: The shen gaoren protects its vulnerable back with the skull of a Lao Shun (AC 20, 200 HP; immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons, vulnerable to bludgeoning damage). Damaging the shell deals no damage to the shen gaoren. Once destroyed, the Shen Gaoren takes -2 to AC and becomes vulnerable to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from magical weapons.
optionalfeature.effect: The shen gaoren protects its vulnerable back with the skull of a Lao Shun (AC 20, 200 HP; immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistances to piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons, vulnerable to bludgeoning damage). Damaging the shell deals no damage to the shen gaoren. Once destroyed, the Shen Gaoren takes -2 to AC and becomes vulnerable to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from magical weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Electricity Sense
entries: The shocker lizard automatically detects electrical charges within 100 feet, such as lightning spells and abilities being used or creatures and machines using electricity.
optionalfeature.effect: The shocker lizard automatically detects electrical charges within 100 feet, such as lightning spells and abilities being used or creatures and machines using electricity.

optionalfeature.name: Metal Sense
entries: The shoreline scrapper can pinpoint, by scent, the location of metals within 60 feet of it.
optionalfeature.effect: The shoreline scrapper can pinpoint, by scent, the location of metals within 60 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Telekinesis
entries: The sibiriex has telekinetic abilities that allow it to manipulate its chains and use them as tentacle-like appendages and otherwise function as the telekinesis spell. The sibiriex does not have to concentrate to maintain the effect, the effect has no time limit, and the sibiriex's spellcasting ability for this spell is Intelligence. The telekinesis can be dispelled or supressed by a dispel magic, antimagic field, or similar effect. If the telekinesis is dispelled, the sibiriex must use an action to reestablish it. While it is dispelled or suppressed, the sibiriex's chains hang lifelessly from its form and it cannot use its chain attack.
optionalfeature.effect: The sibiriex has telekinetic abilities that allow it to manipulate its chains and use them as tentacle-like appendages and otherwise function as the telekinesis spell. The sibiriex does not have to concentrate to maintain the effect, the effect has no time limit, and the sibiriex's spellcasting ability for this spell is Intelligence. The telekinesis can be dispelled or supressed by a dispel magic, antimagic field, or similar effect. If the telekinesis is dispelled, the sibiriex must use an action to reestablish it. While it is dispelled or suppressed, the sibiriex's chains hang lifelessly from its form and it cannot use its chain attack.

optionalfeature.name: Home Sweet Tome
entries: The sigilian can move half its speed to enter a book. If the book is being worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or the sigilian enters the book. A creature can take its action to find the sigilian in a book by succeeding on a {@dc 12} Intelligence (Investigation) check. If successful, a creature can use a bonus action to tear out the pages where the sigilian is hiding, forcing the sigilian out of the book and into an unoccupied space within 5 feet. Alternatively, a creature can destroy the book with a successful melee attack, dealing half of the damage to the sigilian and forcing it out of the book into an unoccupied space within 5 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: The sigilian can move half its speed to enter a book. If the book is being worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or the sigilian enters the book. A creature can take its action to find the sigilian in a book by succeeding on a {@dc 12} Intelligence (Investigation) check. If successful, a creature can use a bonus action to tear out the pages where the sigilian is hiding, forcing the sigilian out of the book and into an unoccupied space within 5 feet. Alternatively, a creature can destroy the book with a successful melee attack, dealing half of the damage to the sigilian and forcing it out of the book into an unoccupied space within 5 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Shout of Valor (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The skald can utter a powerful warcry. For 1 minute, whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a damage roll. The creature can add a {@dice d6} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the skald. A creature can benefit from only one Shout of Valor die at a time. This effect ends if the skald is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition frightened}.
optionalfeature.effect: The skald can utter a powerful warcry. For 1 minute, whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a damage roll. The creature can add a {@dice d6} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the skald. A creature can benefit from only one Shout of Valor die at a time. This effect ends if the skald is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Sealed Destiny (1/Day)
entries: The skein witch attunes herself to the threads of the PCs' fates. Ask each player to write down their prediction of how the PC to their left will die, and at what level. Collect the notes without revealing the answers. When one of those PCs dies, reveal the prediction. If the character died in the manner predicted, they fulfill their destiny and are immediately resurrected by the gods as a reward. If they died at or within one level of the prediction, they return to life with some useful insight into the destiny of someone important.
optionalfeature.effect: The skein witch attunes herself to the threads of the PCs' fates. Ask each player to write down their prediction of how the PC to their left will die, and at what level. Collect the notes without revealing the answers. When one of those PCs dies, reveal the prediction. If the character died in the manner predicted, they fulfill their destiny and are immediately resurrected by the gods as a reward. If they died at or within one level of the prediction, they return to life with some useful insight into the destiny of someone important.

optionalfeature.name: Misty Step (At Will)
entries: The skein witch can step between places as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: The skein witch can step between places as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Armed Advantage
entries: The skeleton has advantage on Strength (Athletics) check made to grapple.
optionalfeature.effect: The skeleton has advantage on Strength (Athletics) check made to grapple.

optionalfeature.name: Peerless Camouflage
entries: The skulk has advantage on all Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
optionalfeature.effect: The skulk has advantage on all Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Compatible Rheology
entries: The slime can carry 4 medium or smaller slimes, which occupy the same space as the slimefly and have total cover.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime can carry 4 medium or smaller slimes, which occupy the same space as the slimefly and have total cover.

optionalfeature.name: Leap
entries: The slime can make a standing long jump up to 30 feet, and a standing high jump up to 20 feet. It can use its Psuedopod attack midair. If it does so after moving at least 20 feet, a Large or smaller target must make a sucessful Dexterity saving throw({@dc 13}). On a failure, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and is {@condition grappled} by the slime. On a success, the creature is pushed backwards 10 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime can make a standing long jump up to 30 feet, and a standing high jump up to 20 feet. It can use its Psuedopod attack midair. If it does so after moving at least 20 feet, a Large or smaller target must make a sucessful Dexterity saving throw({@dc 13}). On a failure, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and is {@condition grappled} by the slime. On a success, the creature is pushed backwards 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Agile
entries: The slime can take the {@action dash} or the {@action disengage} actions using a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime can take the {@action dash} or the {@action disengage} actions using a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Hard shell
entries: The slime gains 10 temporary hit points at the start of each turn. While it has these hit points, the slime has resistance to magic damage and +5 to AC.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime gains 10 temporary hit points at the start of each turn. While it has these hit points, the slime has resistance to magic damage and +5 to AC.

optionalfeature.name: Coordinated Slim
entries: The slime goes on the highest initiative count of the chain slimes that it are within 5 feet of. Damage to this chain slime is taken by the chain slime within 5 feet with the highest hp. The slime has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least two Chain slimes are within 5 feet of the creature and the slimes are not {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime goes on the highest initiative count of the chain slimes that it are within 5 feet of. Damage to this chain slime is taken by the chain slime within 5 feet with the highest hp. The slime has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least two Chain slimes are within 5 feet of the creature and the slimes are not {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Uh oh
entries: The slime looks faintly worried about what would happen if it took more damage. The slime concentrates on not exploding as if concentrating on a spell. If it loses concentration before being reduced to 0 hit points, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) blugeoning damage and be pushed 10 foot back, landing {@condition prone}. The slime automatically fails this saving throw and is launched in a random direction.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime looks faintly worried about what would happen if it took more damage. The slime concentrates on not exploding as if concentrating on a spell. If it loses concentration before being reduced to 0 hit points, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) blugeoning damage and be pushed 10 foot back, landing {@condition prone}. The slime automatically fails this saving throw and is launched in a random direction.

optionalfeature.name: Thixotropic acceleration
entries: The slime takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) blugeoning damage each time it attacks. If the slime has half of its hit points or fewer, attack rolls against the slime are at disadvantage.
optionalfeature.effect: The slime takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) blugeoning damage each time it attacks. If the slime has half of its hit points or fewer, attack rolls against the slime are at disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Bottomless Stomach
entries: The sliver can innately cast the Hoard Gullet cantrip at will, as a 5th level spell caster.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver can innately cast the Hoard Gullet cantrip at will, as a 5th level spell caster.

optionalfeature.name: Adaptive Evolution (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The sliver can use its action to polymorph into a CR 1, 2, or 3 Evolved Sliver, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It also gains the Hive Aura, and attached features if applicable, of the sliver it turns into.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver can use its action to polymorph into a CR 1, 2, or 3 Evolved Sliver, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It also gains the Hive Aura, and attached features if applicable, of the sliver it turns into.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Tactics
entries: The sliver has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one other sliver is within 5 feet of the creature and the sliver isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one other sliver is within 5 feet of the creature and the sliver isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Primordial Reflexes
entries: The sliver has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, or Hide action, or saved for the Opportunity Attack reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, or Hide action, or saved for the Opportunity Attack reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Multiple Evolutions
entries: The sliver legion has five evolved slivers within its mass. Roll three times on the Sliver Broodling Evolution chart, and twice on the Sliver Harbinger Evolution chart to determine what additional hive auras the sliver legion gains from these evolved slivers.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver legion has five evolved slivers within its mass. Roll three times on the Sliver Broodling Evolution chart, and twice on the Sliver Harbinger Evolution chart to determine what additional hive auras the sliver legion gains from these evolved slivers.

optionalfeature.name: Quill Burst (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The sliver may cast the *Hail of Thorns* spell at will, and can cast it as a 2nd level spell, with a spell save DC of 13.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver may cast the *Hail of Thorns* spell at will, and can cast it as a 2nd level spell, with a spell save DC of 13.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Regeneration
entries: The sliver regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn, as long as there is at least one other sliver within 60 feet. If there are no slivers within range, this trait doesn't function at the start of the sliver's next turn. The sliver only dies if it starts it turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn, as long as there is at least one other sliver within 60 feet. If there are no slivers within range, this trait doesn't function at the start of the sliver's next turn. The sliver only dies if it starts it turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

optionalfeature.name: Ethereal Talon
entries: The sliver transforms its talon into psionic energy. Attacks made with the sliver's talon require no attack roll. Instead, the target must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes the attack's normal damage and suffers any additional effects. On a successful save, the target takes half damage from the attack, but suffers no additional effects that would normally be imposed on a hit.
optionalfeature.effect: The sliver transforms its talon into psionic energy. Attacks made with the sliver's talon require no attack roll. Instead, the target must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes the attack's normal damage and suffers any additional effects. On a successful save, the target takes half damage from the attack, but suffers no additional effects that would normally be imposed on a hit.

optionalfeature.name: Shifting Form
entries: The snake can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
optionalfeature.effect: The snake can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

optionalfeature.name: Winter Step
entries: The Snow Queen ignores difficult terrain caused by ice and snow. She can walk on vertical and horizontal surfaces that are covered by ice or snow.
optionalfeature.effect: The Snow Queen ignores difficult terrain caused by ice and snow. She can walk on vertical and horizontal surfaces that are covered by ice or snow.

optionalfeature.name: Perfect Mimicry
entries: The songbird can perfectly replicate any sound that it has heard. A {@dc 20} Perception check reveals that the sound is falsified.
optionalfeature.effect: The songbird can perfectly replicate any sound that it has heard. A {@dc 20} Perception check reveals that the sound is falsified.

optionalfeature.name: Laborer
entries: The sooze is strong and tireless. It gains immunity to {@condition exhaustion} and can Dash as a bonus action 3 times each day.
optionalfeature.effect: The sooze is strong and tireless. It gains immunity to {@condition exhaustion} and can Dash as a bonus action 3 times each day.

optionalfeature.name: Warrior
