To get free from the aurumvorax, the target creature or an adjacent ally must use its action to make a successful {@dc 16} Strength (Athletics) check. The aurumvorax can't use its bite attack again until it releases its jaws, which automatically moves it out of that creature's space.
optionalfeature.effect: When the aurumvorax bites a creature and locks its jaws, the aurumvorax enters that creature's space. The aurumvorax can't move on its own while its jaws are locked, but it moves with the other creature. To get free from the aurumvorax, the target creature or an adjacent ally must use its action to make a successful {@dc 16} Strength (Athletics) check. The aurumvorax can't use its bite attack again until it releases its jaws, which automatically moves it out of that creature's space.

optionalfeature.name: Absorbent
entries: When the avatar damages a creature, it absorbs a portion of that creature's knowledge and power. As a bonus action, it can recreate any action available to a creature it damaged within the last minute. This includes spells and actions with limited uses or with a recharge. This recreated action is resolved using the avatar's statistics where applicable.
optionalfeature.effect: When the avatar damages a creature, it absorbs a portion of that creature's knowledge and power. As a bonus action, it can recreate any action available to a creature it damaged within the last minute. This includes spells and actions with limited uses or with a recharge. This recreated action is resolved using the avatar's statistics where applicable.

optionalfeature.name: Perfect Symmetry
entries: When the avenger cooperates with other Arcadian avengers, she is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed} conditions. All allied Arcadian avengers roll a single Initiative check with advantage, acting on the same initiative. The Arcadian avengers can move or take their actions in any order, even before another avenger has completed her turn. For example, two avengers can move, before either of them makes an attack.
optionalfeature.effect: When the avenger cooperates with other Arcadian avengers, she is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed} conditions. All allied Arcadian avengers roll a single Initiative check with advantage, acting on the same initiative. The Arcadian avengers can move or take their actions in any order, even before another avenger has completed her turn. For example, two avengers can move, before either of them makes an attack.

optionalfeature.name: Distracting Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the banderhobb hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the banderhobb has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the banderhobb's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the banderhobb hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the banderhobb has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the banderhobb's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Distracting Frenzy (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the banderhobb uses its multiattack to only attack one creature, allies within 5 feet ot the target may immediately use their reaction to make a single melee attack against the target.
optionalfeature.effect: When the banderhobb uses its multiattack to only attack one creature, allies within 5 feet ot the target may immediately use their reaction to make a single melee attack against the target.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Banishment
entries: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 5 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna. Instantaneous bursts of flame (such as a red dragon's breath or a fireball spell) don't have this effect on the barghest.
optionalfeature.effect: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 5 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna. Instantaneous bursts of flame (such as a red dragon's breath or a fireball spell) don't have this effect on the barghest.

optionalfeature.name: Disassemble
entries: When the battlespider dies, it splits into {@dice 2d4} mulaz.
optionalfeature.effect: When the battlespider dies, it splits into {@dice 2d4} mulaz.

optionalfeature.name: Erupting Flames
entries: When the behemoth makes a claw attack, flames erupt from the ground at the targets location. The target must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage on a failed save.
optionalfeature.effect: When the behemoth makes a claw attack, flames erupt from the ground at the targets location. The target must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage on a failed save.

optionalfeature.name: Charged
entries: When the behir uses its breath weapons, its body becomes charged with lightning until the end of its next turn. For the duration, the behir can take the Dash action as a bonus action, its melee weapon attacks do 4 ({@dice 1d8}) additional lightning damage on a hit, and any creature that starts its turn {@condition grappled} by the behir takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the behir uses its breath weapons, its body becomes charged with lightning until the end of its next turn. For the duration, the behir can take the Dash action as a bonus action, its melee weapon attacks do 4 ({@dice 1d8}) additional lightning damage on a hit, and any creature that starts its turn {@condition grappled} by the behir takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Blade Flourish (1/Turn)
entries: When the blade hits with an attack on its turn, the blade can use one of the following options.
optionalfeature.effect: When the blade hits with an attack on its turn, the blade can use one of the following options.

optionalfeature.name: Disintegrate
entries: When the bookkeeper dies, the book it is bound to is also destroyed.
optionalfeature.effect: When the bookkeeper dies, the book it is bound to is also destroyed.

optionalfeature.name: Cackle Fever
entries: When the cackling zombie takes damage it must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the the zombie takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage and becomes {@condition incapacitated} with mad laughter for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the mad laughter and the {@condition incapacitated} condition on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: When the cackling zombie takes damage it must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the the zombie takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage and becomes {@condition incapacitated} with mad laughter for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the mad laughter and the {@condition incapacitated} condition on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Final Breath
entries: When the cacus giant dies, it exhales a final breath of divine essence in a gout of intense fire. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the cacus giant dies, it exhales a final breath of divine essence in a gout of intense fire. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: After-Image
entries: When the cerynitis starts to move for the first time on its turn, it can choose to leave behind a golden image of itself at the location it was at the start of its turn, and any creature that touches it while it remains in place takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the cerynitis starts to move for the first time on its turn, it can choose to leave behind a golden image of itself at the location it was at the start of its turn, and any creature that touches it while it remains in place takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

optionalfeature.name: Smite (2/Day)
entries: When the champion hits with a melee weapon attack, it can deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage to the target as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the champion hits with a melee weapon attack, it can deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage to the target as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Bloodsucker
entries: When the chupacabra hits a creature that is neither an undead nor a construct with its bite, it gains a blood dice, a {@dice d6}. The chupacabra can have up to two blood dice stored at once, and can use these dice to fuel its other abilities. Unused blood dice disappear after 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: When the chupacabra hits a creature that is neither an undead nor a construct with its bite, it gains a blood dice, a {@dice d6}. The chupacabra can have up to two blood dice stored at once, and can use these dice to fuel its other abilities. Unused blood dice disappear after 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Spell Breaker
entries: When the cleric restores hit points to an ally with a spell of 1st level or higher, it can also end one spell affecting that creature. The level of the spell ended must be equal to or lower than the level of the spell slot expended to heal the ally.
optionalfeature.effect: When the cleric restores hit points to an ally with a spell of 1st level or higher, it can also end one spell affecting that creature. The level of the spell ended must be equal to or lower than the level of the spell slot expended to heal the ally.

optionalfeature.name: Favored by the Gods (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the dark soul fails a saving throw or misses with an attack roll, it can roll {@dice 2d4} and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome.
optionalfeature.effect: When the dark soul fails a saving throw or misses with an attack roll, it can roll {@dice 2d4} and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome.

optionalfeature.name: Death Flash
entries: When the darkling dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the darkling dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Death Burn
entries: When the darkling elder dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage and, if the creature can see the light, is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. If the saving throw is successful, the creature takes half the damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.
optionalfeature.effect: When the darkling elder dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage and, if the creature can see the light, is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. If the saving throw is successful, the creature takes half the damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

optionalfeature.name: Banishing Word (1/Day)
entries: When the devilbound gnomish prince hits with an attack, he can choose to banish the target to the Eleven Hells. The target vanishes from its current location and is {@condition incapacitated} until its return. At the end of the devilbound gnomish prince's next turn, the target returns to the spot it previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space and takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the devilbound gnomish prince hits with an attack, he can choose to banish the target to the Eleven Hells. The target vanishes from its current location and is {@condition incapacitated} until its return. At the end of the devilbound gnomish prince's next turn, the target returns to the spot it previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space and takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Ferocity (1/Day)
entries: When the dogmole juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the dogmole juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Self Destruct
entries: When the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Line Of Battle
entries: When the dragonborn edjet is within 5 feet of two allies that aren't {@condition incapacitated}, it has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.
optionalfeature.effect: When the dragonborn edjet is within 5 feet of two allies that aren't {@condition incapacitated}, it has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Absorbent (3/Day)
entries: When the droth damages a creature, it absorbs a portion of that creature's knowledge and power. As a bonus action, it can recreate any action available to a creature it damaged within the last minute. This includes spells and actions with limited uses or with a recharge. This recreated action is resolved using the droth's statistics where applicable.
optionalfeature.effect: When the droth damages a creature, it absorbs a portion of that creature's knowledge and power. As a bonus action, it can recreate any action available to a creature it damaged within the last minute. This includes spells and actions with limited uses or with a recharge. This recreated action is resolved using the droth's statistics where applicable.

optionalfeature.name: Litany of War
entries: When the druid uses its action to cast a spell or take the Attack action, it generates 1 shared legendary action for the Garden of Badb (see Garden of Badb sidebar).
optionalfeature.effect: When the druid uses its action to cast a spell or take the Attack action, it generates 1 shared legendary action for the Garden of Badb (see Garden of Badb sidebar).

optionalfeature.name: Drunkard's Luck (1/Turn)
entries: When the drunken master has disadvantage on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it can choose either result for that roll.
optionalfeature.effect: When the drunken master has disadvantage on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it can choose either result for that roll.

optionalfeature.name: Deflect Missiles
entries: When the drunken master is hit by a ranged weapon attack, the damage is reduced by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}).
optionalfeature.effect: When the drunken master is hit by a ranged weapon attack, the damage is reduced by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}).

optionalfeature.name: Dual Wielder
entries: When the duelist is wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand, it gains a +1 bonus to its AC (included in AC). In addition, it can draw or stow two one-handed weapons.
optionalfeature.effect: When the duelist is wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand, it gains a +1 bonus to its AC (included in AC). In addition, it can draw or stow two one-handed weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: When the duelist makes a melee attack at a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against the duelist until the end of the turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the duelist makes a melee attack at a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against the duelist until the end of the turn.

optionalfeature.name: Volatile Form
entries: When the elemental dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the elemental dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Ectoplasmic Spray
entries: When the elophar takes damage other than acid damage, corrosive ectoplasm bursts from its distended stomach. The elophar takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and all creatures within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the elophar takes damage other than acid damage, corrosive ectoplasm bursts from its distended stomach. The elophar takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and all creatures within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Reach Of The Fey
entries: When the enchanter casts an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher that targets only one creature, the enchanter can choose to target all creatures within 10 feet of the target instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the enchanter casts an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher that targets only one creature, the enchanter can choose to target all creatures within 10 feet of the target instead.

optionalfeature.name: Harrier
entries: When the fianna makes a melee attack against a creature, it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether it hits or not.
optionalfeature.effect: When the fianna makes a melee attack against a creature, it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether it hits or not.

optionalfeature.name: Apotheosis
entries: When the fierstjerren has 80 hp or fewer, the spirit within it tears free and tendrils of necrotic energy erupt from its skin. When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. When it has 60 hp or fewer, its weapon attacks instead deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. When it has 40 hp or fewer, its weapon attacks instead deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the fierstjerren has 80 hp or fewer, the spirit within it tears free and tendrils of necrotic energy erupt from its skin. When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. When it has 60 hp or fewer, its weapon attacks instead deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. When it has 40 hp or fewer, its weapon attacks instead deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Paragon Transformation
entries: When the first pool of hit points becomes inactive, the ahtal-ka wrap itself in a cocoon and pull its collection of scrap metal, debris, and silk forming "walking fortress" known as the Ahtal-Nesto.
optionalfeature.effect: When the first pool of hit points becomes inactive, the ahtal-ka wrap itself in a cocoon and pull its collection of scrap metal, debris, and silk forming "walking fortress" known as the Ahtal-Nesto.

optionalfeature.name: Distracting Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the flind hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the flind has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the flind's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the flind hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the flind has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the flind's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Sprint (3/Day)
entries: When the ghoulsteed uses the Dash action, it can Dash again as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the ghoulsteed uses the Dash action, it can Dash again as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: When the giant hits a creature with a melee attack, it can use a bonus action to emit a burst of cold that deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage to each creature within 20 feet of it.
optionalfeature.effect: When the giant hits a creature with a melee attack, it can use a bonus action to emit a burst of cold that deals 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage to each creature within 20 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Electrical Charge
entries: When the giant shark bowl is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead becomes charged for 1 minute. While charged, its attacks deal an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the giant shark bowl is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead becomes charged for 1 minute. While charged, its attacks deal an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Lunge
entries: When the glass gator leaps at least 10 feet toward a creature and hits that creature with a claws attack on the same turn, it can immediately constrict the target as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the glass gator leaps at least 10 feet toward a creature and hits that creature with a claws attack on the same turn, it can immediately constrict the target as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Wrath of Yeenoghu (1/Turn)
entries: When the gnoll hits a creature with a flail attack, roll {@dice 1d6} to determine what effect happens.
optionalfeature.effect: When the gnoll hits a creature with a flail attack, roll {@dice 1d6} to determine what effect happens.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Provenance
entries: When the goat-knight steed drops to 0 hit points it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. A goat knight can also dismiss his steed at any point as an action, causing it to disappear. In either case, the same steed is summoned when the goat-knight casts {@spell find steed}.
optionalfeature.effect: When the goat-knight steed drops to 0 hit points it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. A goat knight can also dismiss his steed at any point as an action, causing it to disappear. In either case, the same steed is summoned when the goat-knight casts {@spell find steed}.

optionalfeature.name: Stabby Frenzy
entries: When the goblin hits with a melee attack, it may attack again. It can continue making additional attacks until it does not hit. The goblin cannot move between attacks made with this trait.
optionalfeature.effect: When the goblin hits with a melee attack, it may attack again. It can continue making additional attacks until it does not hit. The goblin cannot move between attacks made with this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Ice Death
entries: When the golem is reduced to 0 hit points, it shatters in an explosion of jagged ice. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the golem is reduced to 0 hit points, it shatters in an explosion of jagged ice. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Fractalize
entries: When the golem is reduced to 0 hp, it explodes.
optionalfeature.effect: When the golem is reduced to 0 hp, it explodes.

optionalfeature.name: Puppet Master
entries: When the greater rakshasa casts the charm person spell, it can target up to five creatures. When it casts the dominate person spell, the spell's duration is concentration, up to 8 hours.
optionalfeature.effect: When the greater rakshasa casts the charm person spell, it can target up to five creatures. When it casts the dominate person spell, the spell's duration is concentration, up to 8 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Relentless Avenger
entries: When the headless horseman hits a creature with an opportunity attack, it can move up to half its speed immediately after the attack as part of the same reaction. The move doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
optionalfeature.effect: When the headless horseman hits a creature with an opportunity attack, it can move up to half its speed immediately after the attack as part of the same reaction. The move doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Disarming Attack (1/Turn)
entries: When the herbalist hits a creature with an attack from its shortsword or shortbow, it can choose to force the target to succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from the attack and drop an object it is holding of the herbalist's choice. The object lands at its feet.
optionalfeature.effect: When the herbalist hits a creature with an attack from its shortsword or shortbow, it can choose to force the target to succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from the attack and drop an object it is holding of the herbalist's choice. The object lands at its feet.

optionalfeature.name: Distant Strike
entries: When the horizon walker takes the attack action, it can teleport up to 10 feet before each attack to an unoccupied space it can see.
optionalfeature.effect: When the horizon walker takes the attack action, it can teleport up to 10 feet before each attack to an unoccupied space it can see.

optionalfeature.name: Ancestral Demise
entries: When the inheritor dies, it disintegrates and becomes an ancestral spirit, joining the other ancestral spirits as they pass on to guard one of the inheritor's children chosen at random. If the inheritor has no children, it dies, along with all of its ancestral spirits.
optionalfeature.effect: When the inheritor dies, it disintegrates and becomes an ancestral spirit, joining the other ancestral spirits as they pass on to guard one of the inheritor's children chosen at random. If the inheritor has no children, it dies, along with all of its ancestral spirits.

optionalfeature.name: Volatile
entries: When the ink guardian is subjected to thunder damage, it takes no damage and instead splashes onto creatures within 5 feet of it. Each creature in the area takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the ink guardian is subjected to thunder damage, it takes no damage and instead splashes onto creatures within 5 feet of it. Each creature in the area takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

optionalfeature.name: Aura of Retribution
entries: When the jovoc takes damage, each creature within 10 feet of the jovoc must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. Fiends and undead are immune to this effect.
optionalfeature.effect: When the jovoc takes damage, each creature within 10 feet of the jovoc must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. Fiends and undead are immune to this effect.

optionalfeature.name: Masterful Mimicry
entries: When the karensee touches another unit of wealth, it can use a reaction to become an identical copy of that wealth. It can attack and perform actions regardless of form or appearance, but on a turn that it has taken no actions it is immune to damage and cannot be detected by any means short of truesight.
optionalfeature.effect: When the karensee touches another unit of wealth, it can use a reaction to become an identical copy of that wealth. It can attack and perform actions regardless of form or appearance, but on a turn that it has taken no actions it is immune to damage and cannot be detected by any means short of truesight.

optionalfeature.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: When the kenku makes a melee attack at a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against the kenku until the end of the turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the kenku makes a melee attack at a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against the kenku until the end of the turn.

optionalfeature.name: Paragon Transformation
entries: When the kulve taroth has only one hit point pool remaining, its golden mantle breaks and falls off it, and it gains additional Actions
optionalfeature.effect: When the kulve taroth has only one hit point pool remaining, its golden mantle breaks and falls off it, and it gains additional Actions

optionalfeature.name: Fiery End
entries: When the lesser balor dies, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the lesser balor's weapons.
optionalfeature.effect: When the lesser balor dies, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the lesser balor's weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Curving Shot
entries: When the lizardfolk makes a ranged attack roll and misses, it can use a bonus action to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.
optionalfeature.effect: When the lizardfolk makes a ranged attack roll and misses, it can use a bonus action to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

optionalfeature.name: Secrets of the Body and Mind (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the lore master casts a spell that forces the target to make a saving throw, the lore master can change the saving throw from one ability score to another of its choice.
optionalfeature.effect: When the lore master casts a spell that forces the target to make a saving throw, the lore master can change the saving throw from one ability score to another of its choice.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Secrets (1/Turn)
entries: When the lore master deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage, it can substitute that damage type with one other type from that list.
optionalfeature.effect: When the lore master deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage, it can substitute that damage type with one other type from that list.

optionalfeature.name: Dragon Luck (1/Day)
entries: When the luck dragon makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can gain advantage on the roll.
optionalfeature.effect: When the luck dragon makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can gain advantage on the roll.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Wielder
entries: When the master duelist is wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand, it gains a +1 bonus to its AC (included in the AC). In addition, it can draw or stow two one-handed weapons.
optionalfeature.effect: When the master duelist is wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand, it gains a +1 bonus to its AC (included in the AC). In addition, it can draw or stow two one-handed weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: When the master duelist makes a melee attack at a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against the master duelist until the end of the turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the master duelist makes a melee attack at a creature, that creature can't make opportunity attacks against the master duelist until the end of the turn.

optionalfeature.name: Maneuvers (1/Turn)
entries: When the master-at-arms hits with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to apply a maneuver to that attack. The attack deals an additional 5 ({@dice 1d10}) damage, and the master-at-arms chooses one of the following effects.
optionalfeature.effect: When the master-at-arms hits with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to apply a maneuver to that attack. The attack deals an additional 5 ({@dice 1d10}) damage, and the master-at-arms chooses one of the following effects.

optionalfeature.name: Loyal Goons
entries: When the mastermind is targeted by an attack and an ally is within 5 feet of it, the mastermind's ally can use its reaction to swap places with the mastermind, and the ally becomes the target instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the mastermind is targeted by an attack and an ally is within 5 feet of it, the mastermind's ally can use its reaction to swap places with the mastermind, and the ally becomes the target instead.

optionalfeature.name: Death Speech
entries: When the mendicant converses with undead or dead humanoids, it can communicate as if they share a language.
optionalfeature.effect: When the mendicant converses with undead or dead humanoids, it can communicate as if they share a language.

optionalfeature.name: Smite (2/Day)
entries: When the minotaur hits with a melee weapon attack, it can deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage to the target as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the minotaur hits with a melee weapon attack, it can deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage to the target as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Banquet of Flesh
entries: When the minotaur reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to feast on the creature. The target suffers 14 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage and the minotaur regains hit points equal to that amount.
optionalfeature.effect: When the minotaur reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to feast on the creature. The target suffers 14 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage and the minotaur regains hit points equal to that amount.

optionalfeature.name: Enthralling Mirage
entries: When the mirager casts hallucinatory terrain, the area appears so lush and inviting that those who view it feel compelled to visit. Any creature that approaches within 120 feet of the terrain must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. Those that fail are affected as by the enthrall spell with the mirager as the caster; they give the mirage their undivided attention, wanting only to explore it, marvel at its beauty, and rest there for an hour. The mirager can choose to have creatures focus their attention on it instead of the hallucinatory terrain. Creatures affected by the enthrall effect automatically fail saving throws to disbelieve the hallucinatory terrain. This effect ends if the hallucinatory terrain is dispelled.
optionalfeature.effect: When the mirager casts hallucinatory terrain, the area appears so lush and inviting that those who view it feel compelled to visit. Any creature that approaches within 120 feet of the terrain must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. Those that fail are affected as by the enthrall spell with the mirager as the caster; they give the mirage their undivided attention, wanting only to explore it, marvel at its beauty, and rest there for an hour. The mirager can choose to have creatures focus their attention on it instead of the hallucinatory terrain. Creatures affected by the enthrall effect automatically fail saving throws to disbelieve the hallucinatory terrain. This effect ends if the hallucinatory terrain is dispelled.

optionalfeature.name: Dream Visitor
entries: When the moon is full, the eyeless watcher can visit the dreams of a creature within 10 miles of it during a long rest. It can observe and speak with the dreamer in their dreamscape, but otherwise cannot interact.
optionalfeature.effect: When the moon is full, the eyeless watcher can visit the dreams of a creature within 10 miles of it during a long rest. It can observe and speak with the dreamer in their dreamscape, but otherwise cannot interact.

optionalfeature.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.
optionalfeature.effect: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

optionalfeature.name: Unbearable Scraping
entries: When the mytholabe is hit with a nonmagical melee weapon attack, each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition deafened} for 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: When the mytholabe is hit with a nonmagical melee weapon attack, each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition deafened} for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Spanner In The Works
entries: When the mytholabe suffers a critical hit from a nonmagical weapon, the attacker quadruples the dice rolled instead of doubling them.
optionalfeature.effect: When the mytholabe suffers a critical hit from a nonmagical weapon, the attacker quadruples the dice rolled instead of doubling them.

optionalfeature.name: Feed
entries: When the nabassu uses its multiattack to attack a single humanoid creature that is {@condition incapacitated}, it tears chunks of flesh from the creature's body and consumes them. If this kills the humanoid, the nabassu regains 13 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points and gains advantage on attack rolls while it has more than its natural hit point maximum. The body of a humanoid slain by a nabassu's feed ability is too damaged to be revived with a revivify or raise dead spell.
optionalfeature.effect: When the nabassu uses its multiattack to attack a single humanoid creature that is {@condition incapacitated}, it tears chunks of flesh from the creature's body and consumes them. If this kills the humanoid, the nabassu regains 13 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points and gains advantage on attack rolls while it has more than its natural hit point maximum. The body of a humanoid slain by a nabassu's feed ability is too damaged to be revived with a revivify or raise dead spell.

optionalfeature.name: Undead Thralls
entries: When the necromancer casts animate dead, it can target one additional corpse or pile of bones, creating another zombie or skeleton, as appropriate. Undead created by the necromancer have an additional 9 hp and a +3 to their weapon damage rolls.
optionalfeature.effect: When the necromancer casts animate dead, it can target one additional corpse or pile of bones, creating another zombie or skeleton, as appropriate. Undead created by the necromancer have an additional 9 hp and a +3 to their weapon damage rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Grim Harvest
entries: When the necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct or undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.
optionalfeature.effect: When the necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct or undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Hunter (1/Turn)
entries: When the obscuroth hits a creature with a weapon attack, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and the obscuroth can sense the direction an distance to the target as long as they are on the same plane of existence.
optionalfeature.effect: When the obscuroth hits a creature with a weapon attack, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and the obscuroth can sense the direction an distance to the target as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

optionalfeature.name: Changing Form
entries: When the ooze is reduced to half of its maximum hit points, its size becomes medium. When it is reduced to a fourth of its maximum hit points, its size becomes Small. If the oozes hit points are restored above a fourth or a half, its size become Medium or Large, respectively.
optionalfeature.effect: When the ooze is reduced to half of its maximum hit points, its size becomes medium. When it is reduced to a fourth of its maximum hit points, its size becomes Small. If the oozes hit points are restored above a fourth or a half, its size become Medium or Large, respectively.

optionalfeature.name: Relentless Endurance (1/day)
entries: When the orc warrior is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the orc warrior is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.

optionalfeature.name: Energetic Rebirth
entries: When the ouroboros is slain, it is reborn in a burst of energy in a 300-foot radius from its body. Roll any die. On an even result, the energy causes plants to grow, and creatures in the area regain 22 ({@dice 5d8}) hp. On an odd result, creatures in the area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the ouroboros is slain, it is reborn in a burst of energy in a 300-foot radius from its body. Roll any die. On an even result, the energy causes plants to grow, and creatures in the area regain 22 ({@dice 5d8}) hp. On an odd result, creatures in the area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Patron's Blessing
entries: When the pact lich reduces a target to 0 hp, the lich gains 25 temporary hp.
optionalfeature.effect: When the pact lich reduces a target to 0 hp, the lich gains 25 temporary hp.

optionalfeature.name: Fiery Death and Rebirth
entries: When the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 40 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren' t worn or carried.
optionalfeature.effect: When the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 40 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren' t worn or carried.

optionalfeature.name: Distracting Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the quickling hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the quickling has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the quickling's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the quickling hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the quickling has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the quickling's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Favored by the Gods (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the radiant soul fails a saving throw or misses with an attack roll, it can roll {@dice 2d4} and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome.
optionalfeature.effect: When the radiant soul fails a saving throw or misses with an attack roll, it can roll {@dice 2d4} and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Death (3/Day)
entries: When the researcher is reduced to 0 hit points and not killed outright, it can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the researcher is reduced to 0 hit points and not killed outright, it can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

optionalfeature.name: Unicorn Slayer
entries: When the rider hits a celestial with a weapon attack, the celestial takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage of the weapon's type.
optionalfeature.effect: When the rider hits a celestial with a weapon attack, the celestial takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage of the weapon's type.

optionalfeature.name: Freezing Fury
entries: When the salamander takes cold damage, its Flame Breath automatically recharges.
optionalfeature.effect: When the salamander takes cold damage, its Flame Breath automatically recharges.

optionalfeature.name: Master of the Blade (1/Turn)
entries: When the samurai makes a melee weapon attack against a creature on its turn, it can add one of the following effects to its attack:
optionalfeature.effect: When the samurai makes a melee weapon attack against a creature on its turn, it can add one of the following effects to its attack:

optionalfeature.name: Opening Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the scaled stalker hits a creature with a melee attack, one ally of its choice may immediately make a single melee attack against that target as a reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: When the scaled stalker hits a creature with a melee attack, one ally of its choice may immediately make a single melee attack against that target as a reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Horde Breaker
entries: When the scout hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can use its bonus action to make the same attack against a different creature within 5 feet of the original target and within range of its weapon.
optionalfeature.effect: When the scout hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can use its bonus action to make the same attack against a different creature within 5 feet of the original target and within range of its weapon.

optionalfeature.name: Poison Claw
entries: When the serym hits a creature with a claw attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: When the serym hits a creature with a claw attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Blinding Light
entries: When the shadow elemental takes radiant damage, it must make a Consitution saving throw with a DC of 10 or half the radiant damage taken, whichever is higher. On a failed save, the elemental is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the shadow elemental takes radiant damage, it must make a Consitution saving throw with a DC of 10 or half the radiant damage taken, whichever is higher. On a failed save, the elemental is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Death's Release
entries: When the shardsoul slayer dies, it can choose another shardsoul slayer within 120 feet. The target gains the dying shard soul slayer's choice of either advantage on all saving throws or advantage on attack rolls for two rounds.
optionalfeature.effect: When the shardsoul slayer dies, it can choose another shardsoul slayer within 120 feet. The target gains the dying shard soul slayer's choice of either advantage on all saving throws or advantage on attack rolls for two rounds.

optionalfeature.name: Razor Wind
entries: When the silverwind nargacuga's makes an attack with its tail swipe, or tail slam it releases a 60 foot long by 5 foot wide line of razor sharp wind. This wind originates from the target creatures position. Any creature in that line, must make {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an bloody wound. The damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) each time a creature is hit by the razor wind and fails the Constitution saving throw. Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.
optionalfeature.effect: When the silverwind nargacuga's makes an attack with its tail swipe, or tail slam it releases a 60 foot long by 5 foot wide line of razor sharp wind. This wind originates from the target creatures position. Any creature in that line, must make {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an bloody wound. The damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) each time a creature is hit by the razor wind and fails the Constitution saving throw. Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

optionalfeature.name: Skull Loss
entries: When the skull lord is reduced to two thirds of its maximum hit points, one of its heads shatters. It can no longer use one randomly determined legendary action. If it is reduced to one third of its hit point maximum, it loses the use of another legendary action. If the skull lord regains enough hit points for its hit points to go back above one or two thirds of its maximum hit points, it regains the use of one of its lost legendary actions, determined randomly. Three-Headed. The skull lord has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
optionalfeature.effect: When the skull lord is reduced to two thirds of its maximum hit points, one of its heads shatters. It can no longer use one randomly determined legendary action. If it is reduced to one third of its hit point maximum, it loses the use of another legendary action. If the skull lord regains enough hit points for its hit points to go back above one or two thirds of its maximum hit points, it regains the use of one of its lost legendary actions, determined randomly. Three-Headed. The skull lord has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

optionalfeature.name: Latch On
entries: When the skullbat hits a creature with its bite attack, its teeth burrow into the target, locking the skullbat tight to its victim's flesh. While the skullbat remains attached, the skullbat is {@condition restrained}, but the target can move and act normally. The skullbat remains attached and is moved with the creature if the creature moves or is moved. A creature can use an action to attempt a Strength (Athletics) checks to grapple and remove the skullbat from itself or another creature within 5 feet, while the skullbat may detach at will without using an action. If the skullbat is detached in any way, it is no longer {@condition restrained}. While the skullbat is attached to the target, it cannot use any actions or move. At the end of each of its turns, the skullbat automatically deals 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage to the target and regains that many hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: When the skullbat hits a creature with its bite attack, its teeth burrow into the target, locking the skullbat tight to its victim's flesh. While the skullbat remains attached, the skullbat is {@condition restrained}, but the target can move and act normally. The skullbat remains attached and is moved with the creature if the creature moves or is moved. A creature can use an action to attempt a Strength (Athletics) checks to grapple and remove the skullbat from itself or another creature within 5 feet, while the skullbat may detach at will without using an action. If the skullbat is detached in any way, it is no longer {@condition restrained}. While the skullbat is attached to the target, it cannot use any actions or move. At the end of each of its turns, the skullbat automatically deals 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage to the target and regains that many hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When the sliver hits a creature with *Eldritch Blast*, it can push the creature up to 10 feet away from it in a straight line.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver hits a creature with *Eldritch Blast*, it can push the creature up to 10 feet away from it in a straight line.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Endurance (Recharge 5-6)
entries: When the sliver is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Endurance (Recharge 6)
entries: When the sliver is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.

optionalfeature.name: Crystalline Carapac
entries: When the sliver is the target of a 1st level or greater spell or magical ability, it regains one daily use of a spell it is able to cast, for each level beyond 1st.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver is the target of a 1st level or greater spell or magical ability, it regains one daily use of a spell it is able to cast, for each level beyond 1st.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Lure
entries: When the sliver makes a successful attack, all friendly slivers within 5 feet of the target who can see the sliver can choose to make an attack against the same target as a reaction with disadvantage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver makes a successful attack, all friendly slivers within 5 feet of the target who can see the sliver can choose to make an attack against the same target as a reaction with disadvantage.

optionalfeature.name: Draining Attacks
entries: When the sliver successfully hits a creature with its *Talon* attack, the creature must make a successful {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target forgets {@dice 1d4} spells that it has prepared for that day. If the target doesn't prepare spells, it forgets one of the languages it knows for 1 hour.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver successfully hits a creature with its *Talon* attack, the creature must make a successful {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target forgets {@dice 1d4} spells that it has prepared for that day. If the target doesn't prepare spells, it forgets one of the languages it knows for 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Hive Absorption
entries: When the sliver takes damage from a source, it regains 1 hit point for each other friendly sliver within 30 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver takes damage from a source, it regains 1 hit point for each other friendly sliver within 30 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Fungal Growth
entries: When the sliver takes damage from an attack, it gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and AC (to a maximum of +5). If the sliver hasn't been attacked by a hostile creature since its last turn or taken damage since then, the bonus fades.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sliver takes damage from an attack, it gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and AC (to a maximum of +5). If the sliver hasn't been attacked by a hostile creature since its last turn or taken damage since then, the bonus fades.

optionalfeature.name: Phoenix Spark (1/day)
entries: When the sorcerer is reduced to 0 hit points, it can instead choose to drop to 1 hit point. If it does so, each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: When the sorcerer is reduced to 0 hit points, it can instead choose to drop to 1 hit point. If it does so, each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Sticky Secretions
entries: When the spider drake is hit with a melee attack, the attacker's weapon becomes stuck to the web fluid secreted from its scales. If the attacker didn't use a weapon, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or become {@condition restrained} in the webbing. As an action, a creature can make a {@dc 16} Strength check, escaping or freeing its weapon from the secretions on a success.
optionalfeature.effect: When the spider drake is hit with a melee attack, the attacker's weapon becomes stuck to the web fluid secreted from its scales. If the attacker didn't use a weapon, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or become {@condition restrained} in the webbing. As an action, a creature can make a {@dc 16} Strength check, escaping or freeing its weapon from the secretions on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Servitude
entries: When the spore spreader reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies. If the body isn't destroyed, the creature returns to life in {@dice 1d4} hours as a {@creature spore servant}.
optionalfeature.effect: When the spore spreader reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies. If the body isn't destroyed, the creature returns to life in {@dice 1d4} hours as a {@creature spore servant}.

optionalfeature.name: Silent Sniper
entries: When the stalker is hidden from a creature, making a ranged weapon attack doesn't reveal its position.
optionalfeature.effect: When the stalker is hidden from a creature, making a ranged weapon attack doesn't reveal its position.

optionalfeature.name: Plagued
entries: When the swarm hits with an attack, it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).
optionalfeature.effect: When the swarm hits with an attack, it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

optionalfeature.name: War Magic
entries: When the this caster uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one melee attack as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the this caster uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one melee attack as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Agonizing Blast
entries: When the tlincalli casts eldritch blast, she adds her Charisma modifer to the damage it deals on a hit.
optionalfeature.effect: When the tlincalli casts eldritch blast, she adds her Charisma modifer to the damage it deals on a hit.

optionalfeature.name: Great Hunter's Inspiration (Recharges 5-6)
entries: When the tlincalli hits an enemy with a melee weapon attack and deals damage to it, it can use a bonus action to target all allies it can see within 30 feet of it. The target gains advantage to its next melee weapon attack made until the start of the tlincalli's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the tlincalli hits an enemy with a melee weapon attack and deals damage to it, it can use a bonus action to target all allies it can see within 30 feet of it. The target gains advantage to its next melee weapon attack made until the start of the tlincalli's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the tlincalli makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a {@dice d10} to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.
optionalfeature.effect: When the tlincalli makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a {@dice d10} to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

optionalfeature.name: Final Croak
entries: When the toad is reduced to 0 hp, it explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere.
optionalfeature.effect: When the toad is reduced to 0 hp, it explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere.

optionalfeature.name: Rain of Blows
entries: When the tomb guardian hits a creature with a melee attack, all following attacks it makes this turn against the same creature have advantage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the tomb guardian hits a creature with a melee attack, all following attacks it makes this turn against the same creature have advantage.

optionalfeature.name: Tendril Curtain
entries: When the tusked skyfish is flying, its wispy, electrified tendrils dangle beneath it and touch all creatures within 20 feet directly below its space as it moves. Any creatures in the path of its movement take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage, or half damage with a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: When the tusked skyfish is flying, its wispy, electrified tendrils dangle beneath it and touch all creatures within 20 feet directly below its space as it moves. Any creatures in the path of its movement take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage, or half damage with a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Death Defier (3/Day)
entries: When the undying succeeds on a death saving throw or stabilises a creature with {@spell spare the dying}, it regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: When the undying succeeds on a death saving throw or stabilises a creature with {@spell spare the dying}, it regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Seize
entries: When the vampiric mist hits a creature with its blood draining touch, its incorporeal tendrils seize the opponent. The target is not {@condition grappled}, but it cannot move away from the vampiric mist while seized and the vampiric mist can hit the seized creature with its blood draining touch automatically. The seized creature may use its action to attempt a {@dc 15} Dexterity (Acrobatics) or Stength (Athletics) check to end the effect on itself. If the target is moved out of the vampiric mist's reach or the vampiric mist is {@condition incapacitated}, the effect ends.
optionalfeature.effect: When the vampiric mist hits a creature with its blood draining touch, its incorporeal tendrils seize the opponent. The target is not {@condition grappled}, but it cannot move away from the vampiric mist while seized and the vampiric mist can hit the seized creature with its blood draining touch automatically. The seized creature may use its action to attempt a {@dc 15} Dexterity (Acrobatics) or Stength (Athletics) check to end the effect on itself. If the target is moved out of the vampiric mist's reach or the vampiric mist is {@condition incapacitated}, the effect ends.

optionalfeature.name: Collapsing Star
entries: When the void dragon is killed it explodes in a swath of celestial destruction. Each creature and object within 1 mile of the dragon take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage, 55 ({@damage 10d10}) cold damage, and 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage. Each damage type can be reduced by half with a successful {@dc 21} saving throw: Dexterity vs. bludgeoning, Constitution vs. cold, and Wisdom vs. psychic. Additionally, a creature that fails two or three of the saving throws is affected by a plane shift spell and sent to a random plane. If it is sent to the plane it currently occupies, it appears {@dice 5d100} miles away in a random direction.
optionalfeature.effect: When the void dragon is killed it explodes in a swath of celestial destruction. Each creature and object within 1 mile of the dragon take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage, 55 ({@damage 10d10}) cold damage, and 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage. Each damage type can be reduced by half with a successful {@dc 21} saving throw: Dexterity vs. bludgeoning, Constitution vs. cold, and Wisdom vs. psychic. Additionally, a creature that fails two or three of the saving throws is affected by a plane shift spell and sent to a random plane. If it is sent to the plane it currently occupies, it appears {@dice 5d100} miles away in a random direction.

optionalfeature.name: Horizon Collapse
entries: When the voidwracked mage is reduced to 0 hp, its event horizon collapses after 1 minute. Creatures trapped in the void when the event horizon collapses are lost and can only be restored by a wish or true resurrection spell.
optionalfeature.effect: When the voidwracked mage is reduced to 0 hp, its event horizon collapses after 1 minute. Creatures trapped in the void when the event horizon collapses are lost and can only be restored by a wish or true resurrection spell.

optionalfeature.name: Beloved By The Gods
entries: When the white stag dies, the deity that created it curses the creature that dealt the killing blow. The cursed creature finds the natural world working against it.
optionalfeature.effect: When the white stag dies, the deity that created it curses the creature that dealt the killing blow. The cursed creature finds the natural world working against it.

optionalfeature.name: Flaming Body
entries: When the wicker man becomes exposed to fire (coming in contact with fire or being hit by an attack or spell that deals fire damage for example), it becomes sheathed in flames. Because it is immune to fire damage, the wicker man takes no damage from these flames. Creatures that start their turn witin 15 feet of a burning wicker man must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage on a failed save. A creature touching the wicker man must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature grappling or {@condition grappled} by the wicker man must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw at the start of each of its turns, taking 15 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature encaged inside the wicker man takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, with no saves allowed.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wicker man becomes exposed to fire (coming in contact with fire or being hit by an attack or spell that deals fire damage for example), it becomes sheathed in flames. Because it is immune to fire damage, the wicker man takes no damage from these flames. Creatures that start their turn witin 15 feet of a burning wicker man must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage on a failed save. A creature touching the wicker man must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature grappling or {@condition grappled} by the wicker man must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw at the start of each of its turns, taking 15 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature encaged inside the wicker man takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, with no saves allowed.

optionalfeature.name: Pilfer
entries: When the wild melynx steals an item, it will use its movement to flee from the target as if it was {@condition frightened}. Once it is 60 feet away from all enemies, it will burrow underground and travel to its "base."
optionalfeature.effect: When the wild melynx steals an item, it will use its movement to flee from the target as if it was {@condition frightened}. Once it is 60 feet away from all enemies, it will burrow underground and travel to its "base."

optionalfeature.name: Aspect of the Destroyer
entries: When the wilden hits an abberation, fiend, humanoid, ooze or undead with a weapon attack, it may choose to make a smite attack. If it does so, it deals an additional amount of damage equal to its proficiency bonus (+2) to the target. Once the wilden has used this smite, it must finish a Short or Long Rest before it can use the smite again.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wilden hits an abberation, fiend, humanoid, ooze or undead with a weapon attack, it may choose to make a smite attack. If it does so, it deals an additional amount of damage equal to its proficiency bonus (+2) to the target. Once the wilden has used this smite, it must finish a Short or Long Rest before it can use the smite again.

optionalfeature.name: Arrow Bane
entries: When the wind demon is targeted by an attack or spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a 6, the wind demon is unaffected, and the attack is reflected back at the attacker as though it originated from the wind demon, turning the attacker into the target.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wind demon is targeted by an attack or spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a 6, the wind demon is unaffected, and the attack is reflected back at the attacker as though it originated from the wind demon, turning the attacker into the target.

optionalfeature.name: Windy Speed (Whirlwind Form Only)
entries: When the wind weasel is subjected to the slow spell, it doesn't suffer the effects of the spell but instead is forced into its true form and {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wind weasel is subjected to the slow spell, it doesn't suffer the effects of the spell but instead is forced into its true form and {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Catoptric Travel
entries: When the wraith is within 5 feet of a reflective surface that it can see, it can use a bonus action to shift to the Material Plane, the Ethereal Plane, or its demiplane. When it would enter the Ethereal Plane, it can instead immediately appear in front of a different reflective surface that it can see in the Material Plane if that mirror is within 60 feet of it.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wraith is within 5 feet of a reflective surface that it can see, it can use a bonus action to shift to the Material Plane, the Ethereal Plane, or its demiplane. When it would enter the Ethereal Plane, it can instead immediately appear in front of a different reflective surface that it can see in the Material Plane if that mirror is within 60 feet of it.

optionalfeature.name: Ring Of Feather Falling
entries: When the wyvern knight falls while wearing this ring, it descends 60 feet per round and takes no damage from falling.
optionalfeature.effect: When the wyvern knight falls while wearing this ring, it descends 60 feet per round and takes no damage from falling.

optionalfeature.name: Ingest Weapons
entries: When the xanka is hit by a melee weapon and the final, adjusted attack roll is 19 or less, the weapon gains a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls, after inflicting damage for this attack. If the penalty reaches −5, the weapon is destroyed. Even magic weapons are subject to this effect.
optionalfeature.effect: When the xanka is hit by a melee weapon and the final, adjusted attack roll is 19 or less, the weapon gains a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls, after inflicting damage for this attack. If the penalty reaches −5, the weapon is destroyed. Even magic weapons are subject to this effect.

optionalfeature.name: Raxivort's Blessing
entries: When the xvart reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the xvart gains 4 temporary hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: When the xvart reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the xvart gains 4 temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Lighting Grasp (3/Day)
entries: When the yagnoloth hits a creature with a claw attack, it can deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the yagnoloth hits a creature with a claw attack, it can deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Overrun
entries: When the ychen bannog takes the Dash action, it can move through the space of a Large or smaller creature, treating the creature's space as difficult terrain. As it moves through the creature's space, the ychen bannog can make a stomp attack as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: When the ychen bannog takes the Dash action, it can move through the space of a Large or smaller creature, treating the creature's space as difficult terrain. As it moves through the creature's space, the ychen bannog can make a stomp attack as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Beyond Death (3/Day)
entries: When the zealot is reduced to 0 hit points by an attack that isn't a critical hit, and the zealot is not killed outright, it can choose to fall to 1 hit point instead.
optionalfeature.effect: When the zealot is reduced to 0 hit points by an attack that isn't a critical hit, and the zealot is not killed outright, it can choose to fall to 1 hit point instead.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Aura
entries: When the zinogre uses Charge, it becomes shrouded in an aura of lightning. If a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the zinogre, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.
optionalfeature.effect: When the zinogre uses Charge, it becomes shrouded in an aura of lightning. If a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the zinogre, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Spore Death
entries: When the zombie is reduced to 0 hp and doesn't survive with its Undead Fortitude, it explodes in a cloud of spores. Each creature within 5 feet of the zombie must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage and contract iumenta pox (see Iumenta Pox sidebar).
optionalfeature.effect: When the zombie is reduced to 0 hp and doesn't survive with its Undead Fortitude, it explodes in a cloud of spores. Each creature within 5 feet of the zombie must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage and contract iumenta pox (see Iumenta Pox sidebar).

optionalfeature.name: Confusion Aura (1/Day)
entries: When three huggermuggers gather in a group, they automatically generate an aura of confusion. All creatures within 40 feet of any one of the huggermuggers must make a successful {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be affected the same as if by a confusion spell for {@dice 1d6} rounds. Each of the huggermuggers generating the effect must be no more than 30 feet from both of the other two; if one of them moves outside that range or is killed, {@condition incapacitated}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}, the aura and the effect end immediately. If another huggermugger is within range of the other two, however, it can instantly assume the fallen huggermugger's role in maintaining the confusion aura, so there is no break in the aura's effect. An individual huggermugger can contribute to creating one confusion aura per day. A creature that successfully saves against the aura is immune to all huggermugger confusion auras until the end of their next long rest.
optionalfeature.effect: When three huggermuggers gather in a group, they automatically generate an aura of confusion. All creatures within 40 feet of any one of the huggermuggers must make a successful {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be affected the same as if by a confusion spell for {@dice 1d6} rounds. Each of the huggermuggers generating the effect must be no more than 30 feet from both of the other two; if one of them moves outside that range or is killed, {@condition incapacitated}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}, the aura and the effect end immediately. If another huggermugger is within range of the other two, however, it can instantly assume the fallen huggermugger's role in maintaining the confusion aura, so there is no break in the aura's effect. An individual huggermugger can contribute to creating one confusion aura per day. A creature that successfully saves against the aura is immune to all huggermugger confusion auras until the end of their next long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Group Actions
entries: When three pattern dancers are within 60 feet of each other,
optionalfeature.effect: When three pattern dancers are within 60 feet of each other,

optionalfeature.name: Spine Trap
entries: When underground with its spines exposed, the sandwyrm can snap its spines closed on one Large, two Medium, or four Small or Tiny creatures above it. Each creature must make a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to make a {@dc 15} Strength check to free itself or another {@condition restrained} creature, ending the effect on a success. Creatures {@condition restrained} by this trait move with the sandwyrm. The sandwyrm's stinger attack has advantage against creatures {@condition restrained} by this trait.
optionalfeature.effect: When underground with its spines exposed, the sandwyrm can snap its spines closed on one Large, two Medium, or four Small or Tiny creatures above it. Each creature must make a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to make a {@dc 15} Strength check to free itself or another {@condition restrained} creature, ending the effect on a success. Creatures {@condition restrained} by this trait move with the sandwyrm. The sandwyrm's stinger attack has advantage against creatures {@condition restrained} by this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Overflow
entries: When you draw a card with Overflow, if you then have 5 or more cards, you may exile that card to trigger the associated effect.
optionalfeature.effect: When you draw a card with Overflow, if you then have 5 or more cards, you may exile that card to trigger the associated effect.

optionalfeature.name: Coalesce
entries: Whenever a bonepowder ghoul drains life force from victims with Gravedust, it can use that energy transform its shape into a more solid form and maintain it. The new form is Small and semi-transparent but roughly the shape of a normal ghoul. In this form, the ghoul isn't amorphous and can't form a whirlwind, but it can speak normally and manipulate objects. The altered form lasts for 1 minute for every point of necrotic damage it delivered against living foes.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a bonepowder ghoul drains life force from victims with Gravedust, it can use that energy transform its shape into a more solid form and maintain it. The new form is Small and semi-transparent but roughly the shape of a normal ghoul. In this form, the ghoul isn't amorphous and can't form a whirlwind, but it can speak normally and manipulate objects. The altered form lasts for 1 minute for every point of necrotic damage it delivered against living foes.

optionalfeature.name: Shatter Weapons
