entries: Whenever a character strikes a caryatid column with a melee weapon and the attack roll is a natural 1, 2, or 3, the character must make a Str check. The character's Str bonus is added to the roll, but the character's proficiency bonus and the weapon's magical bonus (if any) are subtracted from the roll. If the result is 15 or less, there is no effect. If the result is 16 or higher, the weapon shatters and becomes useless.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a character strikes a caryatid column with a melee weapon and the attack roll is a natural 1, 2, or 3, the character must make a Str check. The character's Str bonus is added to the roll, but the character's proficiency bonus and the weapon's magical bonus (if any) are subtracted from the roll. If the result is 15 or less, there is no effect. If the result is 16 or higher, the weapon shatters and becomes useless.

optionalfeature.name: Erode Sanity
entries: Whenever a creature fails an Intelligence or Wisdom saving throw while within 120 feet of the lodestar, note that fact. When such a creature finishes its next short or long rest, it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or gain a form of madness from the Dungeon Master's Guide as shown below:
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a creature fails an Intelligence or Wisdom saving throw while within 120 feet of the lodestar, note that fact. When such a creature finishes its next short or long rest, it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or gain a form of madness from the Dungeon Master's Guide as shown below:

optionalfeature.name: Healed By Blood
entries: Whenever a creature is reduced to 0 hp within 60 feet of the execrable shrub, the shrub regains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hp.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a creature is reduced to 0 hp within 60 feet of the execrable shrub, the shrub regains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hp.

optionalfeature.name: Frostblight
entries: Whenever a creature takes cold damage from one of the beotodus attacks or is within 5 feet of the beotodus when it moves for the first time on its turn, it must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted with {@disease Iceblight|mhmm} for 1 minute on a failed save. A creature that is resistant or immune to cold damage automatically succeeds on their saving throw.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a creature takes cold damage from one of the beotodus attacks or is within 5 feet of the beotodus when it moves for the first time on its turn, it must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted with {@disease Iceblight|mhmm} for 1 minute on a failed save. A creature that is resistant or immune to cold damage automatically succeeds on their saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Angelic Avenger
entries: Whenever a friendly creatures is reduced to 0 hit points while within 30 feet of the valkyrie, the valkyrie can use its reaction to move up to its speed wowards the creature that attacked them and make a melee weapon attack against that creature. On a hit, this attack deals an additional 4 {@dice 1d8} radiant damage to the target. If this attack reduces the creature to 0 hit points, the friendly creature is revibed with 1 hit point.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a friendly creatures is reduced to 0 hit points while within 30 feet of the valkyrie, the valkyrie can use its reaction to move up to its speed wowards the creature that attacked them and make a melee weapon attack against that creature. On a hit, this attack deals an additional 4 {@dice 1d8} radiant damage to the target. If this attack reduces the creature to 0 hit points, the friendly creature is revibed with 1 hit point.

optionalfeature.name: Fiery Insides
entries: Whenever a giant ant exoskeleton takes slashing or piercing damage, flames from its insides erupt through the wound. Everyone within 5 feet of where the attack struck must make a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a giant ant exoskeleton takes slashing or piercing damage, flames from its insides erupt through the wound. Everyone within 5 feet of where the attack struck must make a successful {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

optionalfeature.name: Corrosive Insides
entries: Whenever a giant beetle exoskeleton takes slashing or piercing damage, corrosive vapor from its insides erupts through the wound. Everyone within 5 feet of where the attack struck must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a giant beetle exoskeleton takes slashing or piercing damage, corrosive vapor from its insides erupts through the wound. Everyone within 5 feet of where the attack struck must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Insides
entries: Whenever a giant crab exoskeleton takes slashing or piercing damage, lightning from its insides erupts through the wound and ripples across its entire body. Every creature within 5 feet of the giant crab exoskeleton must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. Anyone riding inside the creature is immune to this damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a giant crab exoskeleton takes slashing or piercing damage, lightning from its insides erupts through the wound and ripples across its entire body. Every creature within 5 feet of the giant crab exoskeleton must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. Anyone riding inside the creature is immune to this damage.

optionalfeature.name: Bitter Spite
entries: Whenever a hostile creature within 30 feet of the shard is reduced to 0 hit points, it can use a reaction to lance out with a fragment of its being, dealing {@dice 1d8} radiant damage to a target of its choosing within 30 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a hostile creature within 30 feet of the shard is reduced to 0 hit points, it can use a reaction to lance out with a fragment of its being, dealing {@dice 1d8} radiant damage to a target of its choosing within 30 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Reanimating Presence
entries: Whenever a humanoid dies within 60 feet of the archlich, it rises at the start of the archlich's next turn as a {@creature zombie} under its control. If the humanoid's body was protected against raising or was too heavily damaged before being raised, such as through the disintegrate spell, the gentle repose spell, or decapitation, the rising fails.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a humanoid dies within 60 feet of the archlich, it rises at the start of the archlich's next turn as a {@creature zombie} under its control. If the humanoid's body was protected against raising or was too heavily damaged before being raised, such as through the disintegrate spell, the gentle repose spell, or decapitation, the rising fails.

optionalfeature.name: Absorb the Dead
entries: Whenever a Small or larger non-undead creature dies within 20 feet of the corpse mound, that creature's remains join its form and the corpse mound regains 10 hit points.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a Small or larger non-undead creature dies within 20 feet of the corpse mound, that creature's remains join its form and the corpse mound regains 10 hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Redirect Spells
entries: Whenever a spell is cast within 120 feet of the dreadnought that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self or touch, the dreadnought magically redirects the spell and becomes the target. If the spell could not normally affect the dreadnought, the spell fails. The creator of the dreadnought can designate creatures that won't be affected by this trait.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever a spell is cast within 120 feet of the dreadnought that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self or touch, the dreadnought magically redirects the spell and becomes the target. If the spell could not normally affect the dreadnought, the spell fails. The creator of the dreadnought can designate creatures that won't be affected by this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Stalwart Defense
entries: Whenever an enemy attacks the animate shield, they take 2 psychic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever an enemy attacks the animate shield, they take 2 psychic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Brood Hive Aura
entries: Whenever another friendly sliver within 60 feet deals 15 or more damage to a creatures in a single turn, roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 20, this sliver can use its *Spawn Broodling* ability as a reaction.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever another friendly sliver within 60 feet deals 15 or more damage to a creatures in a single turn, roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 20, this sliver can use its *Spawn Broodling* ability as a reaction.

optionalfeature.name: Essence of the Hive
entries: Whenever another sliver within 30 feet regains hit points, this sliver gains 1 hit point for every 3 hit points gained.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever another sliver within 30 feet regains hit points, this sliver gains 1 hit point for every 3 hit points gained.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Dancer
entries: Whenever Chittr'k'k is subjected to fire or necrotic damage, he takes no damage and instead is unaffected by spells and other magical effects that would impede his movement.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever Chittr'k'k is subjected to fire or necrotic damage, he takes no damage and instead is unaffected by spells and other magical effects that would impede his movement.

optionalfeature.name: Rune-Tattooed
entries: Whenever Oregg casts a spell of 1st level or higher, he gains a number of temporary hit points equal to X{@dice d10}, where X is the level of the spell.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever Oregg casts a spell of 1st level or higher, he gains a number of temporary hit points equal to X{@dice d10}, where X is the level of the spell.

optionalfeature.name: Durable
entries: Whenever the animate shield would take damage from an attack, reduce that damage by 3. Additionally, it has advantage on Constitution saving throws.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the animate shield would take damage from an attack, reduce that damage by 3. Additionally, it has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Shearing
entries: Whenever the arborcyte suffers 10 or more damage from a single attack, a length of its vines breaks free. This animated tendril is under the arborcyte's control, moving and acting as an extension of the creature. Each tendril has AC 14, 10 hp, and a speed of 10 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the arborcyte suffers 10 or more damage from a single attack, a length of its vines breaks free. This animated tendril is under the arborcyte's control, moving and acting as an extension of the creature. Each tendril has AC 14, 10 hp, and a speed of 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Shed
entries: Whenever the bazelguese makes a melee weapon attack it dislodges an explosive scale which lands in an unoccupied space with 5 feet of its location.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the bazelguese makes a melee weapon attack it dislodges an explosive scale which lands in an unoccupied space with 5 feet of its location.

optionalfeature.name: Bloodsucking Vines
entries: Whenever the bloodless wanderer deals slashing or piercing damage, it recovers hit points equal to the damage dealt. This does not apply if the target is a construct.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the bloodless wanderer deals slashing or piercing damage, it recovers hit points equal to the damage dealt. This does not apply if the target is a construct.

optionalfeature.name: Sanguine Feast
entries: Whenever the crimson mist deals necrotic damage to a living creature with blood in its body, the creature's hp maximum is reduced by the same amount and the mist regains hp equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the crimson mist deals necrotic damage to a living creature with blood in its body, the creature's hp maximum is reduced by the same amount and the mist regains hp equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Pervasive Unholy Smite
entries: Whenever the doomspeaker deals damage with a melee weapon attack, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack). This damage increases to 13 ({@dice 3d8}) if the target is a celestial, a good-aligned dragon, or a fey.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the doomspeaker deals damage with a melee weapon attack, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack). This damage increases to 13 ({@dice 3d8}) if the target is a celestial, a good-aligned dragon, or a fey.

optionalfeature.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: Whenever the enforcer hits with a melee attack, the target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition frightened} of the enforcer until the end of its next turn. The enforcer's allies have advantage on attack rolls against creatures {@condition frightened} in this way.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the enforcer hits with a melee attack, the target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition frightened} of the enforcer until the end of its next turn. The enforcer's allies have advantage on attack rolls against creatures {@condition frightened} in this way.

optionalfeature.name: Psychic Scream
entries: Whenever the gloomflower takes damage, each creature within 10 feet of the gloomflower must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the gloomflower takes damage, each creature within 10 feet of the gloomflower must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Expulsion
entries: Whenever the golem takes acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage, all creatures within 20 feet of the golem must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking damage equal to the damage the golem took on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the golem takes acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage, all creatures within 20 feet of the golem must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking damage equal to the damage the golem took on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Healing
entries: Whenever the igneous strider is subjected to fire damage, it may attempt a {@dc 16} Constitution check. On a success, it regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the igneous strider is subjected to fire damage, it may attempt a {@dc 16} Constitution check. On a success, it regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Aggressive Adhesion
entries: Whenever the karensee touches a creature, it can choose to adhere to them as a reaction. If it does, it sticks to the target. A creature can make a {@dc 13} Strength (Athletics) check to scrape the karensee off of them. While a karensee is adhered to a creature, it has advantage on attack rolls against that target.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the karensee touches a creature, it can choose to adhere to them as a reaction. If it does, it sticks to the target. A creature can make a {@dc 13} Strength (Athletics) check to scrape the karensee off of them. While a karensee is adhered to a creature, it has advantage on attack rolls against that target.

optionalfeature.name: Frenetic Tittering
entries: Whenever the mad slasher hits with a talon attack, creatures within 10 feet of it that can hear the mad slasher, must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or attacks against them have advantage until the beginning of the mad slasher's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the mad slasher hits with a talon attack, creatures within 10 feet of it that can hear the mad slasher, must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or attacks against them have advantage until the beginning of the mad slasher's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Melodious Recharge
entries: Whenever the mytholabe is hit by a magical weapon attack, it recharges its Purifying Resonance ability.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the mytholabe is hit by a magical weapon attack, it recharges its Purifying Resonance ability.

optionalfeature.name: Vermin Shield
entries: Whenever the rat hermit is hit by an attack, as a reaction it can have an allied rat or swarm of rats within 5 feet become the target of the attack instead.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the rat hermit is hit by an attack, as a reaction it can have an allied rat or swarm of rats within 5 feet become the target of the attack instead.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Dancer
entries: Whenever the rattok demon is subjected to fire or necrotic damage, it takes no damage and instead is unaffected by spells and other magical effects that would impede its movement. This trait works like the freedom of movement spell, except it only lasts for 1 minute.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the rattok demon is subjected to fire or necrotic damage, it takes no damage and instead is unaffected by spells and other magical effects that would impede its movement. This trait works like the freedom of movement spell, except it only lasts for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Curse
entries: Whenever the shadar-kai becomes {@condition incapacitated}, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or lose a portion of its soul to the shadow plane. Its hit point maximum becomes permanently reduced by 4 ({@dice 1d8}). A shadar-kai whose hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect dies and cannot be resurrected, except with a true resurrection spell. A wish spell can restore the shadar-kai to its full hit point maximum.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the shadar-kai becomes {@condition incapacitated}, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or lose a portion of its soul to the shadow plane. Its hit point maximum becomes permanently reduced by 4 ({@dice 1d8}). A shadar-kai whose hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect dies and cannot be resurrected, except with a true resurrection spell. A wish spell can restore the shadar-kai to its full hit point maximum.

optionalfeature.name: Vampiric Attacks
entries: Whenever the sliver deals damage to another creature with a weapon attack, it regains 1 hit point for every 2 points of damage dealt.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the sliver deals damage to another creature with a weapon attack, it regains 1 hit point for every 2 points of damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Leeching Attacks
entries: Whenever the sliver deals damage to another creature with a weapon attack, the sliver regains 1 hit point, and the target's maximum hit points are reduced by 1. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a short rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the sliver deals damage to another creature with a weapon attack, the sliver regains 1 hit point, and the target's maximum hit points are reduced by 1. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a short rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

optionalfeature.name: Force Disruption
entries: Whenever the spectral hunt takes force damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the spectral hunt takes force damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Shifting Floor
entries: Whenever the swarm moves into a creature's space or starts its turn in another creature's space, that other creature must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} creature must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to stand up in a space occupied by the swarm.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the swarm moves into a creature's space or starts its turn in another creature's space, that other creature must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} creature must make a successful {@dc 13} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to stand up in a space occupied by the swarm.

optionalfeature.name: Psychic Absorption
entries: Whenever the tormentor is subjected to psychic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the psychic damage dealt.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the tormentor is subjected to psychic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the psychic damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Tides
entries: Whenever the waverider casts a spell of 1st level or higher that affects a nonhostile creature, that creature regains 3 hit points (in addition to any healing the spell may provide).
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the waverider casts a spell of 1st level or higher that affects a nonhostile creature, that creature regains 3 hit points (in addition to any healing the spell may provide).

optionalfeature.name: Nature's Aspect
entries: Whenever the wilden finishes a Long Rest it chooses one of the following aspects of nature to manifest.
optionalfeature.effect: Whenever the wilden finishes a Long Rest it chooses one of the following aspects of nature to manifest.

optionalfeature.name: Silent Step
entries: While {@condition invisible}, as a bonus action, the chameleos teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space.
optionalfeature.effect: While {@condition invisible}, as a bonus action, the chameleos teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space.

optionalfeature.name: Poison Susceptibility
entries: While {@condition poisoned}, the kushala daora's Wind Barrier is deactivated, it must land on its next turn, and is unable to fly until the {@condition poisoned} is removed. Once the {@condition poisoned} condition is removed, the kushala daora's Wind Barrier once again takes effect.
optionalfeature.effect: While {@condition poisoned}, the kushala daora's Wind Barrier is deactivated, it must land on its next turn, and is unable to fly until the {@condition poisoned} is removed. Once the {@condition poisoned} condition is removed, the kushala daora's Wind Barrier once again takes effect.

optionalfeature.name: Poison Susceptibility
entries: While {@condition poisoned}, the lunastra's Fire Aura is deactivated, it must land on its next turn, and is unable to fly until the {@condition poisoned} is removed. Once the {@condition poisoned} condition is removed, the lunastra's Fire Aura once again takes effect.
optionalfeature.effect: While {@condition poisoned}, the lunastra's Fire Aura is deactivated, it must land on its next turn, and is unable to fly until the {@condition poisoned} is removed. Once the {@condition poisoned} condition is removed, the lunastra's Fire Aura once again takes effect.

optionalfeature.name: Thin As Light
entries: While a witchlight is not incorporeal, it can pass through any opening that light can.
optionalfeature.effect: While a witchlight is not incorporeal, it can pass through any opening that light can.

optionalfeature.name: Necrotic Regeneration
entries: While attached to a living host, a necrotic tick leaks negative energy into the host's bloodstream, quickly closing over the creature's wounds with scabrous, necrotic flesh. If the host doesn't already have regeneration, it regains 2 hp at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.
optionalfeature.effect: While attached to a living host, a necrotic tick leaks negative energy into the host's bloodstream, quickly closing over the creature's wounds with scabrous, necrotic flesh. If the host doesn't already have regeneration, it regains 2 hp at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

optionalfeature.name: Subsonic Speech
entries: While capable of speaking Primordial, Gulgar's voices are in a subsonic range that they can still hear, but most other creatures can't.
optionalfeature.effect: While capable of speaking Primordial, Gulgar's voices are in a subsonic range that they can still hear, but most other creatures can't.

optionalfeature.name: Four Claw Flurry
entries: While grappling a creature, the su monster can make two claw attacks against the {@condition grappled} creature as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: While grappling a creature, the su monster can make two claw attacks against the {@condition grappled} creature as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Lure
entries: While hidden, the gobul can use the lure on its head to create a mesmerizing flash of lights. Any creature that can see the lure, must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute by the gobul or until the gobul something harmful to the creature. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature may only use its turn to move towards the lure.
optionalfeature.effect: While hidden, the gobul can use the lure on its head to create a mesmerizing flash of lights. Any creature that can see the lure, must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute by the gobul or until the gobul something harmful to the creature. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature may only use its turn to move towards the lure.

optionalfeature.name: Feral Rage
entries: While in bear form, the bearskin has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and a +2 bonus to melee weapon damage (already included in its bite and claw attacks).
optionalfeature.effect: While in bear form, the bearskin has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and a +2 bonus to melee weapon damage (already included in its bite and claw attacks).

optionalfeature.name: Scintillating Carapace
entries: While in bright light, the jeweled drone's carapace shines and glitters. When a non-tosculi creature that can see the drone starts its turn within 30 feet of the drone, the drone can force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw if the drone isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failure, the creature is {@condition blinded} until the start of its next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: While in bright light, the jeweled drone's carapace shines and glitters. When a non-tosculi creature that can see the drone starts its turn within 30 feet of the drone, the drone can force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw if the drone isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failure, the creature is {@condition blinded} until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Umbral Shroud
entries: While in darkness, the gloom stalker is {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on Darkvision to see it in that darkness.
optionalfeature.effect: While in darkness, the gloom stalker is {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on Darkvision to see it in that darkness.

optionalfeature.name: Living Shadow
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the drow can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the drow can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

optionalfeature.name: Coalescing Darkness
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the kithlord can turn {@condition invisible} as a bonus action. The effect ends when the kithlord uses a bonus action to end it or enters a space in bright light or stronger.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the kithlord can turn {@condition invisible} as a bonus action. The effect ends when the kithlord uses a bonus action to end it or enters a space in bright light or stronger.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Blend
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Blend
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff pack lord can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff pack lord uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff pack lord attacks, is in bright light, or is {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff pack lord can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff pack lord uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff pack lord attacks, is in bright light, or is {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Shadowy Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the sluagh swarm can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the sluagh swarm can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Being
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the wraith has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the wraith has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Shade Strike (1/Turn)
entries: While in dim light or darkness, when the dawnkiller hits a target with a weapon attack, the dawnkiller can use a bonus action to magically deal an extra 26 ({@damage 4d12}) necrotic damage to the target. In addition, the target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dawnkiller's next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: While in dim light or darkness, when the dawnkiller hits a target with a weapon attack, the dawnkiller can use a bonus action to magically deal an extra 26 ({@damage 4d12}) necrotic damage to the target. In addition, the target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dawnkiller's next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Forest Quickness
entries: While in forest surroundings, a vila receives a +4 bonus on initiative checks.
optionalfeature.effect: While in forest surroundings, a vila receives a +4 bonus on initiative checks.

optionalfeature.name: Magical Light Sensitivity
entries: While in magical light, the firegeist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
optionalfeature.effect: While in magical light, the firegeist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

optionalfeature.name: Sunlight Powerlessness
entries: While in natural sunlight, the spectral steed is completely powerless and cannot use its soul charge ability or take actions other than Dodge and Dash.
optionalfeature.effect: While in natural sunlight, the spectral steed is completely powerless and cannot use its soul charge ability or take actions other than Dodge and Dash.

optionalfeature.name: Snow Armor (3/day)
entries: While in snowy terrain, the beotodus can use its bonus action to cover itself in a thick layer of snow. While covered in this snow, it gains a +2 bonus to its AC and it has resistance to bludgeoning damage. Additionally when a creature touches the beotodus or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it they must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted with {@disease Iceblight|mhmm} until the end of their next turn.
optionalfeature.effect: While in snowy terrain, the beotodus can use its bonus action to cover itself in a thick layer of snow. While covered in this snow, it gains a +2 bonus to its AC and it has resistance to bludgeoning damage. Additionally when a creature touches the beotodus or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it they must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become afflicted with {@disease Iceblight|mhmm} until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fear of Sunlight
entries: While in sunlight, the vampire is {@condition frightened} and has disadvantage on all saving throws.
optionalfeature.effect: While in sunlight, the vampire is {@condition frightened} and has disadvantage on all saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Fog Crawler
entries: While in the fog, The dolgotha can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.
optionalfeature.effect: While in the fog, The dolgotha can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

optionalfeature.name: Countershading
entries: While in water, the plesioth can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: While in water, the plesioth can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Pack Frenzy
entries: While it can see two allied creatures within 30 feet of it, the dire corby alpha gains advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed}, and all melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks rolls against it have advantage.
optionalfeature.effect: While it can see two allied creatures within 30 feet of it, the dire corby alpha gains advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed}, and all melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks rolls against it have advantage.

optionalfeature.name: Fury
entries: While it has 100 hit points or lower, or the full moon is up in the sky, the werewolf has advantage on attack rolls. Additionally, the werewolf's melee attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.
optionalfeature.effect: While it has 100 hit points or lower, or the full moon is up in the sky, the werewolf has advantage on attack rolls. Additionally, the werewolf's melee attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

optionalfeature.name: Love of Heavy Weapons
entries: While moss lurkers can use heavy weapons, they have disadvantage while wielding them.
optionalfeature.effect: While moss lurkers can use heavy weapons, they have disadvantage while wielding them.

optionalfeature.name: Mounted Warrior
entries: While mounted, the dragonborn's mount can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.
optionalfeature.effect: While mounted, the dragonborn's mount can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Mounted Advantage
entries: While mounted, the goblin has advantage on melee attack rolls against a Medium or smaller creature.
optionalfeature.effect: While mounted, the goblin has advantage on melee attack rolls against a Medium or smaller creature.

optionalfeature.name: Ride-By
entries: While mounted, the horseman and its mount don't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.
optionalfeature.effect: While mounted, the horseman and its mount don't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

optionalfeature.name: Iceskidder
entries: While on icy or snowy surfaces, the whitespawn iceskidder can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: While on icy or snowy surfaces, the whitespawn iceskidder can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Bladesong
entries: While the bladesinger isn't wearing Medium or Heavy armor or using a shield, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier, and it has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on a spell.
optionalfeature.effect: While the bladesinger isn't wearing Medium or Heavy armor or using a shield, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier, and it has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on a spell.

optionalfeature.name: Mountain Step (1/Day)
entries: While the dokufu is in contact with rocky or snowy terrain, it can use a bonus action to teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space where there is also rocky or snowy terrain. When it does so, it appears to be burrowing into the ground and instantly bursts up from the ground at a different location.
optionalfeature.effect: While the dokufu is in contact with rocky or snowy terrain, it can use a bonus action to teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space where there is also rocky or snowy terrain. When it does so, it appears to be burrowing into the ground and instantly bursts up from the ground at a different location.

optionalfeature.name: Inanimate
entries: While the doll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from any ordinary doll.
optionalfeature.effect: While the doll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from any ordinary doll.

optionalfeature.name: Divine Retribution
entries: While the eidolon's hallowed stance is in effect, if the eidolon takes damage or an ally of the eidolon is reduced to 0 hit points, the eidolon can as a reaction force the creature that caused the damage to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage on a failed save.
optionalfeature.effect: While the eidolon's hallowed stance is in effect, if the eidolon takes damage or an ally of the eidolon is reduced to 0 hit points, the eidolon can as a reaction force the creature that caused the damage to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage on a failed save.

optionalfeature.name: Expelled Spirit
entries: While the fellforged body was made to bind spirits, the wraith within is vulnerable to turning attempts. Any successful turn attempt exorcises the wraith from its clockwork frame. The expelled wraith retains its current hp total and fights normally. The construct dies without an animating spirit.
optionalfeature.effect: While the fellforged body was made to bind spirits, the wraith within is vulnerable to turning attempts. Any successful turn attempt exorcises the wraith from its clockwork frame. The expelled wraith retains its current hp total and fights normally. The construct dies without an animating spirit.

optionalfeature.name: Reknit Flesh
entries: While the fleshling has half of its hit points or fewer, it gains 5 temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.
optionalfeature.effect: While the fleshling has half of its hit points or fewer, it gains 5 temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: While the gobul remains motionless on river bed, lake bottom, or sea floor, it is indistinguishable from common water plants.
optionalfeature.effect: While the gobul remains motionless on river bed, lake bottom, or sea floor, it is indistinguishable from common water plants.

optionalfeature.name: Full Belly
entries: While the great jagras has a creature swallowed its belly expands, reducing its movement speed by 10 feet., rolls one additional weapon damage die on Strength-based weapon attacks, and it can use its Roll attack.
optionalfeature.effect: While the great jagras has a creature swallowed its belly expands, reducing its movement speed by 10 feet., rolls one additional weapon damage die on Strength-based weapon attacks, and it can use its Roll attack.

optionalfeature.name: Feign Death
entries: While the gypceros is playing dead, a creature can make a Intelligence (Investigation) check against the gypceros's Charisma (Performance) check to determine that it is alive. The gypceros is {@condition blinded} and {@condition prone} while under the effects of feign death, but may still use its passive perception for hearing, smell, and touch. This effect lasts up to 1 hour or until the gypceros uses thrash action.
optionalfeature.effect: While the gypceros is playing dead, a creature can make a Intelligence (Investigation) check against the gypceros's Charisma (Performance) check to determine that it is alive. The gypceros is {@condition blinded} and {@condition prone} while under the effects of feign death, but may still use its passive perception for hearing, smell, and touch. This effect lasts up to 1 hour or until the gypceros uses thrash action.

optionalfeature.name: Monolithic
entries: While the hill troll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a small hillock.
optionalfeature.effect: While the hill troll remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a small hillock.

optionalfeature.name: Swarm Mind
entries: While the kikimore can see a warrior or queen kikimore friendly to it, the kikimore ignores the effects of being {@condition frightened}.
optionalfeature.effect: While the kikimore can see a warrior or queen kikimore friendly to it, the kikimore ignores the effects of being {@condition frightened}.

optionalfeature.name: Both Guard and Ward
entries: While the lieutenant is within 5 feet of the attuned owner of the codex automata, any attack targeting the codex's owner has a 50% chance to instead target the machine lieutenant.
optionalfeature.effect: While the lieutenant is within 5 feet of the attuned owner of the codex automata, any attack targeting the codex's owner has a 50% chance to instead target the machine lieutenant.

optionalfeature.name: Expert Rider
entries: While the Lord of the Hunt is mounted, any attack directed at his steed targets the rider instead. The steed uses the Lord of the Hunt's saving throws. If the mount succeeds on a saving throw against a damaging effect, it takes no damage.
optionalfeature.effect: While the Lord of the Hunt is mounted, any attack directed at his steed targets the rider instead. The steed uses the Lord of the Hunt's saving throws. If the mount succeeds on a saving throw against a damaging effect, it takes no damage.

optionalfeature.name: Perfect Metal
entries: While the magister wears armor made of metal, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier.
optionalfeature.effect: While the magister wears armor made of metal, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Invisibility
entries: While the phantom fungus is alive, it is {@condition invisible}. This ability cannot be dispelled.
optionalfeature.effect: While the phantom fungus is alive, it is {@condition invisible}. This ability cannot be dispelled.

optionalfeature.name: Living Paper
entries: While the record-hunter remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary origami figurine or pile of papers.
optionalfeature.effect: While the record-hunter remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary origami figurine or pile of papers.

optionalfeature.name: Churning Ribs
entries: While the serpentir is grappling a creature, it deals 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage to the creature at the start of each of the serpentir's turn.
optionalfeature.effect: While the serpentir is grappling a creature, it deals 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage to the creature at the start of each of the serpentir's turn.

optionalfeature.name: Heart of the Swarm
entries: While the thornheart is alive, the other nekkers within 60 feet of it have advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the thornheart's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.
optionalfeature.effect: While the thornheart is alive, the other nekkers within 60 feet of it have advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the thornheart's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Appearance
entries: While the wirbeln remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.
optionalfeature.effect: While the wirbeln remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

optionalfeature.name: Sensitive Ears
entries: While underground the cephadrome ears are very sensitive, Thunder skills or spells used within 60 feet force the cephadrome to use its reaction to move towards the surface. If it reaches the surface while still having movement left, it launches into the air and lands {@condition prone} on the ground.
optionalfeature.effect: While underground the cephadrome ears are very sensitive, Thunder skills or spells used within 60 feet force the cephadrome to use its reaction to move towards the surface. If it reaches the surface while still having movement left, it launches into the air and lands {@condition prone} on the ground.

optionalfeature.name: Jet
entries: While underwater, the krake spawn can take the withdraw action to jet backward at a speed of 140 feet. It must move in a straight line while using this ability.
optionalfeature.effect: While underwater, the krake spawn can take the withdraw action to jet backward at a speed of 140 feet. It must move in a straight line while using this ability.

optionalfeature.name: Watery Stealth
entries: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
optionalfeature.effect: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Arboreal
entries: While up in trees, the asanbosam can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
optionalfeature.effect: While up in trees, the asanbosam can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

optionalfeature.name: Forge Soul
entries: While wearing heavy armor, the priest gains a +1 bonus to AC.
optionalfeature.effect: While wearing heavy armor, the priest gains a +1 bonus to AC.

optionalfeature.name: Swift Caster
entries: While wielding the Ruby Rod, the Aspect of Asmodeus can use a bonus action to cast a spell that has a casting time of one action.
optionalfeature.effect: While wielding the Ruby Rod, the Aspect of Asmodeus can use a bonus action to cast a spell that has a casting time of one action.

optionalfeature.name: Storm Wings
entries: While within 1 mile of a storm, the cyclops gains a fly speed of 60 feet.
optionalfeature.effect: While within 1 mile of a storm, the cyclops gains a fly speed of 60 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Wormkiller Rage
entries: Wild dogmole juggernaut packs are famed for their battles against the monsters of the dark caverns of the world. If a dogmole juggernaut draws blood against vermin, purple worms, or other underground invertebrate, it gains a +4 bonus to Strength and Constitution but suffers a −2 penalty to AC. The wormkiller rage lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1 + its Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round). It cannot end the rage voluntarily while the creatures that sent it into a rage still live.
optionalfeature.effect: Wild dogmole juggernaut packs are famed for their battles against the monsters of the dark caverns of the world. If a dogmole juggernaut draws blood against vermin, purple worms, or other underground invertebrate, it gains a +4 bonus to Strength and Constitution but suffers a −2 penalty to AC. The wormkiller rage lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1 + its Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round). It cannot end the rage voluntarily while the creatures that sent it into a rage still live.

optionalfeature.name: Defenseless
entries: Witch grass plants automatically fail saving throws.
optionalfeature.effect: Witch grass plants automatically fail saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Seeds
entries: Witch grass seeds attach themselves to anything they come in contact with. Seeds have the same magic damping effect as the plants, but their range is only 10 feet and the DC to overcome their effect is always 11. The effect lasts for 12 hours, then the seeds lose their potency. A close inspection of clothing and gear, plus a successful {@dc 8} Intelligence (Nature) check, reveals the presence of the seeds. Once theyre identified, seeds can be eliminated by spending an hour washing and thoroughly cleaning clothes, animals, and equipment.
optionalfeature.effect: Witch grass seeds attach themselves to anything they come in contact with. Seeds have the same magic damping effect as the plants, but their range is only 10 feet and the DC to overcome their effect is always 11. The effect lasts for 12 hours, then the seeds lose their potency. A close inspection of clothing and gear, plus a successful {@dc 8} Intelligence (Nature) check, reveals the presence of the seeds. Once theyre identified, seeds can be eliminated by spending an hour washing and thoroughly cleaning clothes, animals, and equipment.

optionalfeature.name: Voice of the Archimandrite
entries: With a ringing shout, the deep one archimandrite summons all deep ones within a mile to come to his aid. This is not a spell but a command that ocean creatures and deep ones heed willingly.
optionalfeature.effect: With a ringing shout, the deep one archimandrite summons all deep ones within a mile to come to his aid. This is not a spell but a command that ocean creatures and deep ones heed willingly.

optionalfeature.name: Rise Again
entries: Within a day of being slain, the tulpa reforms within 500 feet of its creator. It doesn't reform if its creator is slain, or if the creator's mental disturbance is healed. The tulpa is immune to all damage dealt to it by its creator.
optionalfeature.effect: Within a day of being slain, the tulpa reforms within 500 feet of its creator. It doesn't reform if its creator is slain, or if the creator's mental disturbance is healed. The tulpa is immune to all damage dealt to it by its creator.

optionalfeature.name: Root Mind
entries: Within a vine lord's forest or jungle, the tendril puppet's blindsight extends to 60 feet, it succeeds on all Wisdom (Perception) checks, and it can't be surprised.
optionalfeature.effect: Within a vine lord's forest or jungle, the tendril puppet's blindsight extends to 60 feet, it succeeds on all Wisdom (Perception) checks, and it can't be surprised.

optionalfeature.name: Root Mind
entries: Within its home forest or jungle, the vine lord's blindsight extends to 60 ft., it succeeds on all Wisdom (Perception) checks, and it can't be surprised.
optionalfeature.effect: Within its home forest or jungle, the vine lord's blindsight extends to 60 ft., it succeeds on all Wisdom (Perception) checks, and it can't be surprised.

optionalfeature.name: Highly Charged
entries: Worker amphorons carry a high static electrical charge. Any living creature that begins its turn within 10 feet of a worker amphoron takes 2 electrical damage from static discharge.
optionalfeature.effect: Worker amphorons carry a high static electrical charge. Any living creature that begins its turn within 10 feet of a worker amphoron takes 2 electrical damage from static discharge.

optionalfeature.name: Constructed Nature
entries: Xanka do not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
optionalfeature.effect: Xanka do not require air, food, drink, or sleep.

optionalfeature.name: Landfall
entries: Your cards with Landfall have their associated effects triggered whenever you match 4 or more gems of the specified color, or any color if no color is specified.
optionalfeature.effect: Your cards with Landfall have their associated effects triggered whenever you match 4 or more gems of the specified color, or any color if no color is specified.

optionalfeature.name: Scent Tracker.
entries: Your mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track a creature based on smell.
optionalfeature.effect: Your mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track a creature based on smell.

optionalfeature.name: Disintegration
entries: Zombie ravens disintegrate into dust and feathers when destroyed. Whenever five zombie ravens have been destroyed in a confined space (or 10 in the open), all living creatures involved in the fight must make successful {@dc 10} Constitution saving throws. The saving throw must be repeated every time another five (or 10 in the open) zombie ravens are destroyed. The first failed saving throw causes a creature to have tactical disadvantage on attack rolls against targets that are more than 5 feet away (if the attack is a spell that relies on a saving throw, the target has tactical advantage on the saving throw). The second failed saving throw applies tactical disadvantage to all attacks, regardless of range. The third failed saving throw blinds the creature. These penalties last until the affected creature leaves the confined space (or the area) where the fight occurred, or until five minutes have passed.

optionalfeature.name: Zombie Keeper
entries: Zombies created by a grave behemoth's Flesh Wound and Hurl Flesh share a telepathic link with it, are under its control, are immune to necrotic damage, and act immediately and on the grave behemoth's initiative.
optionalfeature.effect: Zombies created by a grave behemoth's Flesh Wound and Hurl Flesh share a telepathic link with it, are under its control, are immune to necrotic damage, and act immediately and on the grave behemoth's initiative.
